entries.access_fee: This ability allows you to place an access fee on any public building you own.  Entry to a building with an access fee set is restricted to players who have paid the fee.
entries.accuse: /accuse: You point accusingly at everyone else. /accuse self: Have you been bad? Tsk, tsk. /accuse target: You point accusingly at (target name).
entries.ache: /ache: You ache all over. /ache self: Eat something bad? Your stomach grumbles and aches. /ache target: You let (target name) know that your body aches for (him, her, or it).
entries.actionhit: Action Hit This melee attack does no damage but reduces an opponent's Action Ability points.
entries.actionshot: Action Shot This ranged attack does no damage but reduces an opponent's Action Ability points.
entries.actionshot1: This ranged attack can wreak havoc with a target's Action pool drain and regeneration rates.
entries.actionshot2: This area ranged attack can wreak havoc with a target's Action pool drain and regeneration rates.  This is more powerful than Action Shot 1.
entries.activateclone: This command is used to activate a clone and send the user to the nearest Cloning Facility after death.
entries.actofwar: Act Of War Offense is the best defense.   This offensive move is especially destructive.
entries.actofwar_1: Callous Act Of War Offense is the best defense.   This offensive move is especially destructive.
entries.actofwar_2: Overt Act Of War Offense is the best defense.   This offensive move is especially destructive.
entries.ad_fees_1: The merchant gains a reduction in the cost of maintaining a vendor registered on the planetary map.
entries.adjust: /adjust: You adjust your outfit. There you go. Perfect! /adjust self: You tighten down your gear and get ready for action. /adjust target: You adjust (target name)'s outfit for (him, her, or it).
entries.adn: /adn: You openly show that your patience has expired. /adn self: A bit frustrated with yourself? /adn target: You encourage (target name) to hurry. Any day now!
entries.adrenalboost: Adrenal Boost This medical enhancement ability allows the temporary enhancement of the target's combat speed.
entries.adrenalboost_1: This enhancement to the Adrenal Boost ability will grant a higher enhancement value.
entries.afk: /afk: You notify everyone around you that you are going AFK. Hurry back, now! /afk self: OK... You are really AFK now. /afk target: You point out that (target name) is AFK.
entries.afk4drink: /afk4drink: We'll be waiting! You announce you are AFK to get a drink. /afk4drink self: You let everyone know that you will be going to grab a drink next break. /afk4drink target: You remind everyone that (target name) went AFK to go get a beverage.
entries.afk4food: /afk4food: Your stomach will thank you.  You announce you are AFK to grab a bite. /afk4food self: You announce that you will be AFK to grab some food at the next break in the action. /afk4food target: You let everyone know that (target name) went AFK to find sustenance.
entries.agree: /agree: You nod in agreement. /agree self: You agree with yourself. /agree target: You agree with (target name).
entries.aim: Aim This combat move allows you to give up an attack round in order to gain better accuracy on your next ranged attack.
entries.aim_1: This enhancement to the Aim ability gives an increased the accuracy boost for the next several shots.
entries.aim_2: This enhancement to the Aim ability gives an increased the accuracy boost for the next several shots.
entries.aimedshot: Aimed Shot This ranged attack ability grants an accuracy bonus as well as an increase in damage output.
entries.airguitar: /airguitar: You rock the crowd. /airguitar self: You rock out. /airguitar target: You rock out for (target name).
entries.alert: Alert This command utilizes the alert ability.
entries.amaze: /amaze: That was amazing! How did they do that? /amaze self: You amaze yourself! /amaze target: You try to amaze (target name) with a magic trick.
entries.amazing: /amazing: That was amazing! How did they do that?
entries.ambush: Ambush Delivers an unexpected attack to your enemy with an extra high chance to cause critical damage.
entries.ambush_1: Relentless Ambush Delivers an unexpected attack to your enemy with an extra high chance to cause critical damage.
entries.ambush_2: Merciless Ambush Delivers an unexpected attack to your enemy with an extra high chance to cause critical damage.
entries.animalattack: Animal Attack This ability allows a Jedi to enter the mind of his or her look-at target and cause it to attack the current combat target. Note that this ability will only work on creatures.
entries.animalcalm: Animal Calm This ability will cause a target that is in combat to stop attacking, returning to its normal peaceful state. Note that this ability will only work on creatures.
entries.animalscare: Animal Scare This ability allows a Jedi to enter the mind of the target and fill it with unease, scaring the target away. Note that this ability will only work on creatures.
entries.anon: This command allows the user to go anonymous.
entries.anxious: /anxious: You feel anxious. /anxious self: You look around anxiously. /anxious target: You look anxiously at (target name).
entries.apologize: /apologize: OOPS!! Sorry everyone!! /apologize self: You apologize to yourself. But, what good is that going to do unless you forgive yourself too? /apologize target: You apologize to (target name) and beg (his, her, or its) forgiveness.
entries.applaud: /applaud: You give a hearty round of applause. /applaud self: You give yourself a hand. Go ahead, you deserve it! /applaud target: Bravo! Bravo! You give (target name) an ovation.
entries.applydisease: Apply Disease This command will enable you to attack your target with disease, if you have the proper item.
entries.applypoison: Apply Poison This command will enable you to attack your target with poison, if you have the proper item.
entries.arch: /arch: You arch your back like a cat. /arch self: You arch your back in an effort to work the kinks out. SNAP! CRACK! POP! /arch target: You arch your back seductively for (target name).
entries.areataunt: Area Taunt This ability increases aggression levels towards you of all opponents in melee range.
entries.areataunt_1: Improved Area Taunt This enhancement to the Area Taunt ability increases the amount of aggression generated.
entries.areatrack: Area Track Gives the Ranger the ability to study tracking clues in the area to figure out what kind of creatures or people have been in the region recently.
entries.areatrack_animal: Gives the Ranger the ability to scan animal activity.
entries.areatrack_direction: Gives the Ranger the ability to judge the approximate direction of a target.
entries.areatrack_distance: Gives the Ranger the ability to judge the approximate distance of targets.
entries.areatrack_npc: Enhances the Ranger's tracking skills to hunt down non-player characters.
entries.areatrack_player: Gives the Ranger the ability to track players.
entries.armorbreak: Armor Break This melee ability reduces your target's armor effectiveness.
entries.armorbreak_1: Improved Armor Break This enhancement to the Armor Break ability is more effective at reducing your target's armor effectiveness.
entries.armorbreak_2: Advanced Armor Break This enhancement to the Armor Break ability is the most effective at reducing your target's armor effectiveness.
entries.assault: Assault Uses special tactics to cause increased damage to your opponent.
entries.assault_1: Relentless Assault Uses special tactics to cause increased damage to your opponent.
entries.assault_2: Merciless Assault Uses special tactics to cause increased damage to your opponent.
entries.assault_accuracy_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Assault type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 20% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.assault_accuracy_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Assault type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 30% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.assault_accuracy_mitigate_3: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Assault type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 40% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.assault_firerate_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of weapon speed reduction imposed from wearing Assault type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 10% and lower Rate of Fire Hindrance values.
entries.assault_firerate_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of weapon speed reduction imposed from wearing Assault type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 20% and lower Rate of Fire Hindrance values.
entries.assault_move_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of movement speed reduction imposed from wearing Assault type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 30% and lower Movement Speed Hindrance values.
entries.assault_move_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of movement speed reduction imposed from wearing Assault type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 40% and lower Movement Speed Hindrance values.
entries.assault_move_mitigate_3: This ability counters the amount of movement speed reduction imposed from wearing Assault type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 60% and lower Movement Speed Hindrance values.
entries.assist: Assist lets you immediately Combat Target somebody else's current target.
entries.associatedroidcontroldevicewithship: Associate a droid with a ship, so that it's loaded in your ship when you launch into space.
entries.astromech_droid_cert_1: This certification allows you to equip an Astromech with a level 1 data storage module, or a v1 Flight Computer, on your starship.
entries.astromech_droid_cert_2: This certification allows you to equip an Astromech with a level 2 data storage module, or a v2 Flight Computer, on your starship.
entries.astromech_droid_cert_3: This certification allows you to equip an Astromech with a level 3 data storage module, or a v3 Flight Computer, on your starship.
entries.astromech_droid_cert_4: This certification allows you to equip an Astromech with a level 4 data storage module, or a v4 Flight Computer, on your starship.
entries.astromech_droid_cert_5: This certification allows you to equip an Astromech with a level 5 data storage module, or a v5 Flight Computer, on your starship.
entries.astromech_droid_cert_6: This certification allows you to equip an Astromech with a level 6 data storage module, or a v6 Flight Computer, on your starship.
entries.attack: Attack This initiates combat against your current target.
entries.attend: /attend: You listen hard. /attend self: You listen to something only you can hear. /attend target: You listen to (target name).
entries.autodeclineduelrequests: This command will cause you to automatically decline any duel requests that you receive. Using the command again will allow you to receive duel requests normally.
entries.avoidincapacitation: Avoid Incapacitation This ability allows a Jedi to prevent themselves from going into an unconscious state.  Due to the intense concentration this ability uses, the Jedi's movement speed shall be severely reduced.  This power only lasts for a short time and can quickly deplete a Jedi of Force power if they try to remain conscious for a lengthy period of time.
entries.ayt: /ayt: You try to figure out who is AFK and who is not. /ayt self: I don't know.  Are you really here? /ayt target: Hello? (target name)? Well, it seems (his, her, or its) lights are on, but is anyone home?
entries.backhand: /backhand: You raise your hand as if to backhand slap someone. /backhand self: You backhand slap your other palm, emphasizing your point. /backhand target: You slap (him, her, or it) in the face with a swift backhand.
entries.bactainfusion: Bacta Infusion This heal over time ability allows a doctor to heal themselves or the targeted player.  The heal gradually heals the target over a small period of time.  The greater the skill of the doctor the more damage will be healed.
entries.bactainfusion_1: Improved Bacta Infusion This enhancement to the Bacta Infusion ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactainfusion_2: Advanced Bacta Infusion This enhancement to the Bacta Infusion ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactajab: Bacta Jab This healing ability allows a doctor to heal themselves or the targeted player.
entries.bactajab_1: Improved Bacta Jab This enhancement to the Bacta Jab ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactajab_2: Advanced Bacta Jab This enhancement to the Bacta Jab ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactashot: Bacta Shot This healing ability allows someone with medical skills to heal themselves or the targeted player.
entries.bactashot_1: Improved Bacta Shot This enhancement to the Bacta Shot ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactashot_2: Advanced Bacta Shot This enhancement to the Bacta Shot ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactaspray: Bacta Spray This point blank area effect healing ability allows someone with medical skills to heal themselves and all others who are within a small distance of them.
entries.bactaspray_1: Concentrated Bacta Spray This enhancement to the Bacta Spray ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactaspray_2: High Volume Bacta Spray This enhancement to the Bacta Spray ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactatoss: Bacta Toss This ranged healing ability allows someone with medical skills to heal themselves or their target who are within a medium distance of them.
entries.bactatoss_1: Improved Bacta Toss This enhancement to the Bacta Toss ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bactatoss_2: Advanced Bacta Toss This enhancement to the Bacta Toss ability allows the healing of more damage.
entries.bad: /bad: Uh. What just went horribly wrong? /bad self: Just how bad have you been? /bad target: You make it obvious that you think (target name) has been bad.
entries.badfeeling: /badfeeling: You have a bad feeling about this... /badfeeling self: You start to express your bad feeling and think better of it. /badfeeling target: You signal to (him, her, or it) that you have a bad feeling about this...
entries.bah: /bah: BAH! /bah self: You take one look at your surroundings and think aloud, "BAH!" /bah target: You look (target name) up and down and utter, "BAH!"
entries.bak: /bak: You let everyone know that you are back at your keyboard. /bak self: You smile contentedly as you realize you are back to your old self again! /bak target: You wish that (target name) would come back to (his, her, or its) keyboard.
entries.bandage: Bandage This healing ability grants the doctor a chance to reduce the bleeding effects on a target.
entries.bandage_1: Improved Bandage This enhancement to the Bandage ability reduces the bleeding effect on the target even more than the basic ability.
entries.bandfill: This ability allows you to play songs with the Bandfill instrument.
entries.bang: /bang: You bang your head to the music. /bang self: You bang your head against the wall. /bang target: You bang (target name)'s head against the wall.
entries.bark: /bark: You get on all fours and bark like a dog. /bark self: You bark at yourself. /bark target: BARK BARK!  You bark at (target name).
entries.barrage: Barrage Hits multiple targets in front of you with an extra powerful attack.
entries.barrage_1: Advanced Barrage Hits multiple targets in front of you with an extra powerful attack.
entries.barrage_2: Superior Barrage Hits multiple targets in front of you with an extra powerful attack.
entries.bat: /bat: And just whom are you trying to impress?  You bat your lashes. /bat self: You practice batting your lashes. /bat target: You bat your lashes at (target name).
entries.batlashes: /batlashes:  And just whom are you trying to impress?   You bat your lashes. /batlashes self:  You practice batting your lashes. /batlashes target:  You bat your lashes at (target name).
entries.battle_accuracy_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 20% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.battle_accuracy_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 30% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.battle_accuracy_mitigate_3: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 40% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.battle_firerate_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of weapon speed reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 20% and lower Rate of Fire Hindrance values.
entries.battle_firerate_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of weapon speed reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 30% and lower Rate of Fire Hindrance values.
entries.battle_firerate_mitigate_3: This ability counters the amount of weapon speed reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 40% and lower Rate of Fire Hindrance values.
entries.battle_move_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of movement speed reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 20% and lower Movement Speed Hindrance values.
entries.battle_move_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of movement speed reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 30% and lower Movement Speed Hindrance values.
entries.battle_move_mitigate_3: This ability counters the amount of movement speed reduction imposed from wearing Battle type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 40% and lower Movement Speed Hindrance values.
entries.battlefield: The battlefield command displays information for player versus player combat battlefields.  If your faction is declared as Rebel or Imperial and you are level 75 or higher, you may join battlefields for player versus player combat.
entries.battlefieldstatus: Battlefield Status This command allows the user to view a battlefield's status.
entries.bbl: /bbl: You tell everyone you will be back later... See ya soon! /bbl self: Trying to have an out of body experience, are we? /bbl target: You let (target name) know that you will be back later.
entries.beam: /beam: Feeling radiant, are we? /beam self: You beam at yourself. /beam target: You beam at (target name).
entries.bearhug: /bearhug: You hold your arms out wide and look for a target to bear-hug. /bearhug self: You bear-hug yourself and stretch out your shoulders. /bearhug target: You give (target name) a great, big bear-hug that lifts (him, her, or it) off the ground.
entries.beckon: /beckon: You do your best to gather everyone around you. /beckon self: You summon your inner strength. /beckon target: You motion at (target name) to come here.
entries.belch: /belch: You let out a resounding belch! Feel better? /belch self: You try to muffle your belch. /belch target: You belch in (target name)'s face.
entries.berserk: Berserk This ability allows you to do more damage than normal with melee attacks however a defense penalty will be incurred.
entries.berserk1: While berserk, you cause more melee damage to your targets but get hit more often in return.
entries.berserk2: While berserk, you cause more melee damage to your targets but get hit more often in return.  This is more powerful than Berserk 1.
entries.berserk_1: Improved Berserk This enhancement to the Berserk ability increases the amount of damage done while in a Berserk state.
entries.bet: After joining a suitable gambling station, you may target the station and use the /bet command to set your wager.
entries.bh_ae_dm_1: Burn (Mark 1): A powerful level 46 flame attack that envelops multiple opponents at once in a cone of fire.
entries.bh_ae_dm_2: Burn (Mark 2): A powerful level 74 flame attack that envelops multiple opponents at once in a cone of fire.
entries.bh_ae_dm_3: Incinerate: A powerful flame attack that envelops multiple opponents at once in a cone of fire.
entries.bh_ae_dm_4: Raze: A powerful flame attack that envelops multiple opponents at once in a cone of fire.
entries.bh_ae_dm_5: Nova: A powerful flame attack that envelops all opponents surrounding the bounty hunter.
entries.bh_armor_duelist_1: Duelist Stance (Mark 1): Hidden Bacta Injectors in the Bounty Hunters Assault Armor will react to impacts and instantly try to heal damaged organs. The effect can only be sustained for a short amount of time before the armor has to recharge itself.
entries.bh_armor_duelist_2: Duelist Stance (Mark 2): Hidden Bacta Injectors in the Bounty Hunters Assault Armor will react to impacts and instantly try to heal damaged organs. The effect can only be sustained for a short amount of time before the armor has to recharge itself.
entries.bh_armor_duelist_3: Duelist Stance (Mark 3): Hidden Bacta Injectors in the Bounty Hunters Assault Armor will react to impacts and instantly try to heal damaged organs. The effect can only be sustained for a short amount of time before the armor has to recharge itself.
entries.bh_armor_duelist_4: Duelist Stance (Mark 4): Hidden Bacta Injectors in the Bounty Hunters Assault Armor will react to impacts and instantly try to heal damaged organs. The effect can only be sustained for a short amount of time before the armor has to recharge itself.
entries.bh_armor_duelist_5: Duelist Stance (Mark 5): Hidden Bacta Injectors in the Bounty Hunters Assault Armor will react to impacts and instantly try to heal damaged organs. The effect can only be sustained for a short amount of time before the armor has to recharge itself.
entries.bh_armor_sprint_1: Power Assisted Sprint: When used servos built into your armor gives you the ability to run very fast and removes or prevents snaring effects.
entries.bh_conceal_1: Conceal Device: This level 90 ability allows you to hide concealable devices such as traps from view.  No one will see the device but you.
entries.bh_cover_1: Take Cover: You gain protection versus ranged attacks and turn invisible to enemy radar when this ability is used.
entries.bh_del_cc_1: Tangle Bomb (Mark 1): A level 38 trap that is used to lower the target's movement speed.
entries.bh_del_cc_2: Tangle Bomb (Mark 2): A level 62 trap that is used to lower the target's movement speed.
entries.bh_del_cc_3: Tangle Bomb (Mark 3): A level 86 trap that is used to lower the target's movement speed.
entries.bh_del_dm_cc_dot_1: Razor Net (Mark 1): A level 50 attack that lowers the target's movement speed while causing a bleeding wound.
entries.bh_del_dm_cc_dot_2: Razor Net (Mark 2): A level 70 attack that lowers the target's movement speed while causing a bleeding wound.
entries.bh_del_dm_cc_dot_3: Razor Net (Mark 3): A level 90 attack that lowers the target's movement speed while causing a bleeding wound.
entries.bh_detect_camouflage_1: Detect Camouflage: This level 90 ability allows you to make an attempt to detect concealed creatures or people in the area.
entries.bh_dm_1: Assault (Mark 1): A high powered level 1 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.bh_dm_2: Assault (Mark 2): A high powered level 10 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.bh_dm_3: Assault (Mark 3): A high powered level 22 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.bh_dm_4: Assault (Mark 4): A high powered level 30 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.bh_dm_5: Assault (Mark 5): A high powered level 42 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.bh_dm_6: Assault (Mark 6): A high powered level 54 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.bh_dm_7: Assault (Mark 7): A high powered level 66 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.bh_dm_8: Assault (Mark 8): A high powered level 78 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.bh_dm_cc_1: Cripple (Mark1): A level 7 attack that inflicts bonus damage and lowers the target's movement speed.
entries.bh_dm_cc_2: Cripple (Mark2): A level 18 attack that inflicts bonus damage and lowers the target's movement speed.
entries.bh_dm_cc_3: Cripple (Mark3): A level 26 attack that inflicts bonus damage and lowers the target's movement speed.
entries.bh_dm_crit_1: Ambush (Mark 1): A quick high powered level 4 attack that increases your target's vulnerability to critical hits.
entries.bh_dm_crit_2: Ambush (Mark 2): A quick high powered level 14 attack that increases your target's vulnerability to critical hits.
entries.bh_dm_crit_3: Ambush (Mark 3): A quick high powered attack that increases your target's vulnerability to critical hits and reduces their armor rating.
entries.bh_dm_crit_4: Ambush (Mark 4): A quick high powered attack that increases your target's vulnerability to critical hits and reduces their armor rating.
entries.bh_dm_crit_5: Ambush (Mark5): A quick high powered attack that increases your target's vulnerability to critical hits and reduces their armor rating.
entries.bh_dm_crit_6: Ambush (Mark 6): A quick high powered attack that increases your target's vulnerability to critical hits and reduces their armor rating.
entries.bh_dm_crit_7: Ambush (Mark 7): A quick high powered attack that increases your target's vulnerability to critical hits and reduces their armor rating.
entries.bh_dm_crit_8: Ambush (Mark 8): A quick high powered attack that increases your target's vulnerability to critical hits and reduces their armor rating.
entries.bh_dread_strike_1: Dread Strike: An attack that instills a sense of dread in your target, reduces their damage potential and reduces their ability to heal.
entries.bh_dread_strike_2: Dread Strike (Mark 2): An attack that instills a sense of dread in your target and reduces their damage potential.
entries.bh_dread_strike_3: Dread Strike (Mark 3): An attack that instills a sense of dread in your target and reduces their damage potential.
entries.bh_dread_strike_4: Dread Strike (Mark 4): An attack that instills a sense of dread in your target and reduces their damage potential.
entries.bh_dread_strike_5: Dread Strike (Mark 5): An attack that instills a sense of dread in your target and reduces their damage potential.
entries.bh_flawless_strike: Flawless Strike: Applies the Flawless Bead buff. This will result in the next special attack becoming a flawless strike. Flawless Strike cannot be Dodged, Parried or Blocked and cannot be a Glancing Blow. This ability is acquired from the Flawless item set.
entries.bh_fumble_1: Fumble: This attack does little damage but unnerves your target so much that their attacks are more likely to be glancing blows. This attack generates a large amount of hate and is likely to cause the target to attack you rather than your allies.
entries.bh_fumble_2: Fumble (Mark 2): This attack does little damage but unnerves your target so much that their attacks are more likely to be glancing blows. This attack generates a large amount of hate and is likely to cause the target to attack you rather than your allies.
entries.bh_fumble_3: Fumble (Mark 3): This attack does little damage but unnerves your target so much that their attacks are more likely to be glancing blows. This attack generates a large amount of hate and is likely to cause the target to attack you rather than your allies.
entries.bh_fumble_4: Fumble (Mark 4): This attack does little damage but unnerves your target so much that their attacks are more likely to be glancing blows. This attack generates a large amount of hate and is likely to cause the target to attack you rather than your allies.
entries.bh_fumble_5: Fumble (Mark 5): This attack does little damage but unnerves your target so much that their attacks are more likely to be glancing blows. This attack generates a large amount of hate and is likely to cause the target to attack you rather than your allies.
entries.bh_fumble_6: Fumble (Mark 6): This attack does little damage but unnerves your target so much that their attacks are more likely to be glancing blows. This attack generates a large amount of hate and is likely to cause the target to attack you rather than your allies.
entries.bh_innate_assault_1: Innate Assault: Your Assault specials have a chance to cost 0 action when fired.
entries.bh_intimidate_1: Intimidating Strike (Mark 1): An attack that saps your opponent's will to fight and drains them of action.
entries.bh_intimidate_2: Intimidating Strike (Mark 2): An attack that saps your opponent's will to fight and drains them of action.
entries.bh_intimidate_3: Intimidating Strike (Mark 3): An attack that saps your opponent's will to fight and drains them of action.
entries.bh_intimidate_4: Intimidating Strike (Mark 4): An attack that saps your opponent's will to fight and drains them of action.
entries.bh_intimidate_5: Intimidating Strike (Mark 5): An attack that saps your opponent's will to fight and drains them of action.
entries.bh_intimidate_6: Intimidating Strike (Mark 6): An attack that saps your opponent's will to fight and drains them of action.
entries.bh_prescience: Prescience: Careful attention paid to the target allows the bounty hunter to avoid most of their attacks for the duration of the effect.
entries.bh_relentless_1: Relentless Onslaught: When activated this ability will dramatically reduce or eliminate all action costs for a short period of time.
entries.bh_return_fire_1: Return Fire: When activated this ability will automatically execute a bonus attack against any enemy that strikes you.
entries.bh_return_fire_command_1: Return Fire: When activated this ability will automatically execute a bonus attack against any enemy that strikes you.
entries.bh_sh_0: Heal (Mark 1): A level 7 healing ability used to recover a small amount of health.
entries.bh_sh_1: Heal (Mark 2): The bounty hunter uses their knowledge to apply first aid and recover some of their health for a level 34 heal.
entries.bh_sh_2: Heal (Mark 3): The bounty hunter uses their knowledge to apply first aid and recover some of their health for a level 58 heal.
entries.bh_sh_3: Heal (Mark 4): The bounty hunter uses their knowledge to apply first aid and recover some of their health for a level 82 heal.
entries.bh_shields_1: Shields: Surrounds you in a powerful energy shield that absorbs incoming attacks. Absorbed attacks will weaken the shield but that power is directed into your own outgoing attacks. This bonus damage will fade after a short time.
entries.bh_sniper_1: Sniper Shot (Mark 1): A deadly high damage attack.
entries.bh_sniper_2: Sniper Shot (Mark 2): A deadly high damage attack.
entries.bh_sniper_3: Sniper Shot (Mark 3): A deadly high damage attack.
entries.bh_sniper_4: Sniper Shot (Mark 4): A deadly high damage attack.
entries.bh_sniper_5: Sniper Shot (Mark 5): A deadly high damage attack.
entries.bh_sniper_6: Sniper Shot (Mark 6): A deadly high damage attack.
entries.bh_stun_1: Stun: This attack does little damage but stuns the target rendering them unable to move or attack effectively for a short period of time. This ability generates a large amount of hate and may cause your target to focus on attacking you rather than your allies.

entries.bindingstrike: Binding Strike This ranged attack reduces an opponent's Action regeneration rate.
entries.bindingstrike_1: Improved Binding Strike This enhancement to the Binding Strike ability reduces an opponent's Action regeneration rate.
entries.bite: /bite: You snap your teeth at everyone around you. /bite self: You bite your lip nervously. /bite target: You bite (target name) on the leg.
entries.blame: /blame: You blame everyone else. /blame self: You blame yourself. /blame target: You blame (target name).
entries.blastaway: Blast Away Keeps a group of opponents from approaching you by firing a barrage of gun fire at them.
entries.blastaway_1: Improved Blast Away Keeps a group of opponents from approaching you by firing a barrage of gun fire at them.
entries.blastaway_2: Advanced Blast Away Keeps a group of opponents from approaching you by firing a barrage of gun fire at them.
entries.blazeofglory: Blaze of Glory This group ability gives all group members a chance to score a critical hit and increase damage by 50%.  Only one group enhancement can be active at time.
entries.bleed: /bleed: MEDIC!!  You bleed on the ground. /bleed self: You bleed all over yourself and make a nice pool of blood at your feet. /bleed target: You bleed all over (target name).
entries.bleedattack: Bleed Attack This melee attack causes bleeding wounds that continue to damage the target even after the initial strike.
entries.bleedattack_1: Improved Bleed Attack This enhancement to the Bleed Attack causes additional bleeding damage to the opponent.
entries.bleedattack_2: Advanced Bleed Attack This enhancement to the Bleed Attack causes additional bleeding damage to the opponent.
entries.bleedingshot: Bleeding Shot This ranged attack is of medium power, but can cause its target to bleed.
entries.blendin: Blend In This ability allows you to run into a crowd of humanoids and blend in, effectively disappearing.  This can be done both wilderness and urban environments.
entries.blindattack: Blind Attack This melee attack does minimal damage but has a high chance of blinding an opponent, severely reducing their accuracy.
entries.blindattack_1: Improved Blind Attack This enhancement to the Blind Attack ability has an increased chance of blinding the opponent.
entries.blindattack_2: Advanced Blind Attack This enhancement to the Blind Attack ability has an almost guaranteed chance to blind the opponent.
entries.blindrecovery: Blind Recovery This ability allows you to recover immediately from being blinded if you have enough ability points.
entries.blink: /blink: You blink. /blink self: You blink in disbelief. /blink target: You blink in disbelief at (target name).
entries.blow: /blow: You pull out a string and some soapy water and proceed to blow bubbles. /blow self: You blow your hair out of your face. /blow target: You blow in (target name)'s ear.
entries.blowkiss: /blowkiss: You blow kisses. /blowkiss self: Got it! You catch a kiss. /blowkiss target: You blow a kiss to (target name).
entries.blueglowie: Force Ghost: Your corporeal form becomes one with the Force.
entries.blush: /blush: You blush. /blush self: You blush in embarrassment. /blush target: You blush at (target name).

This ability is also used to attempt to learn an ability a creature is using against you as well as to observe an ability the creature is using on themselves that you may later teach to your Beast Master pets.

entries.bmoc: /bmoc: You look around for the BMOC. /bmoc self: You are "THE MAN"!! You declare yourself BMOC. /bmoc target: You cast your BMOC vote for (target name).
entries.boardshuttle: This command allows the user to board a shuttle.
entries.bob: /bob: You bob your head to the beat. /bob self: You go bobbing for apples. /bob target: You bob up from behind (target name).
entries.bodyhit: Body Hit This melee attack causes a targeted hit to an opponent's torso and arms and has a slight accuracy penalty.
entries.bodyhit_1: Improved Body Hit This enhancement to the Body Hit ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.bodyhit_2: Advanced Body Hit This enhancement to the Body Hit ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.bodyshot: Body Shot This ranged attack causes a targeted hit to an opponent's torso and arms and has a slight accuracy penalty.
entries.bodyshot1: This ranged attack targets an opponent's body in order to damage their Health pool.
entries.bodyshot2: This advanced ranged attack targets an opponent's body in order to damage their Health pool.  This is more powerful than Body Shot 1.
entries.bodyshot3: This powerful ranged attack targets an opponent's body in order to devastate their Health pool.  This is the most powerful Body Shot attack.
entries.bodyshot_1: Improved Body Shot This enhancement to the Body Shot ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.bodyshot_2: Advanced Body Shot This enhancement to the Body Shot ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.bodyslam: /bodyslam: Unable to find a target, you pull a stuffed animal from your pack and bodyslam it! TAKE THAT! /bodyslam self: You pick yourself up and throw yourself on the ground. /bodyslam target: You try to pick up (target name) and body slam (him, her, or it).
entries.boggle: /boggle: You boggle at that concept. /boggle self: You boggle at yourself. What were you thinking?! /boggle target: You boggle at (target name). What did (he, she or it) just say?
entries.bonk: /bonk: Bonk! bOnk! BoNk! /bonk self: You bonk yourself on the head. Look at all the birdies!! /bonk target: You bonk (target name) on the head. What were they thinking?!
entries.boogie: /boogie: Get down! You boogie-woogie-oogie. /boogie self: You tell yourself it's time to boogie. /boogie target: You tell (target name) that you are going to boogie.
entries.boostmorale: Boost Morale This very powerful Squad Leader ability allows the Squad Leader to boost the morale of their troopers by re-distributing all party wounds evenly among all of its members.  This ability takes a heavy toll on the Squad Leader's Action and Mind pools.  Use the /setboostmorale <message> command to set the message the Squad Leader shouts when this ability is used.  The Squad Leader must be the leader of the group for this to work.
entries.bored: /bored: Bored! /bored self: You go stir-crazy from boredom. /bored target: You tell (target name) that you are bored of (him, her, or it).
entries.bothan_ability_1: Blend-In: You blend in with your immediate surroundings, becoming almost undetectable. Though you can creep about slowly any posture changes, such as sitting or kneeling, will reveal your presence. This special ability is a trait of the Bothan species.
entries.bounce: /bounce: You bounce around with excitement! /bounce self: You try to bounce yourself off the ground. /bounce target: You bounce circles around (target name).
entries.bountycheck: Bounty Check: Determines whether a target is a dangerous fugitive in disguise. If it is, a sizeable bounty will be paid upon termination.
entries.bouquet: /bouquet: Wow! Great trick! You pull a flower bouquet out of thin air. /bouquet self: You grab a flower bouquet and inhale deeply of the flowers' smell. /bouquet target: Awww. How nice of you! You give a flower bouquet to (target name).
entries.bow: /bow: You bow. /bow self: You gracefully perform a flourished bow. /bow target: You bow to (target name).
entries.bow2: /bow2: You bow. /bow2 self: You gracefully perform a flourished bow. /bow2 target: You bow to (target name).
entries.bow3: /bow3: You bow. /bow3 self: You gracefully perform a flourished bow. /bow3 target: You bow to (target name).
entries.bow4: /bow4: You bow. /bow4 self: You gracefully perform a flourished bow. /bow4 target: You bow to (target name).
entries.bowhead: /bowhead: You bow your head. /bowhead self: You bow your head and focus yourself. /bowhead target: You bow your head to (target name).
entries.brandish: /brandish: You brandish your weapon at the general area. /brandish self: You look exasperated and sarcastically brandish your weapon at yourself. /brandish target: You brandish your weapon menacingly at (target name).
entries.brb: /brb: Be Right Back! /brb self: You take a leave of absence from reality. /brb target: You tell (target name) that you will be right back.
entries.brt: /brt: BRT! /brt self: Not much farther now!! /brt target: You tell (target name) to go on and that you will be right there.
entries.bstrike1: Bomber Strike 1 This ability allows a pilot to call in a TIE Bomber strike package against their current target, assuming it is valid.
entries.bstrike2: Bomber Strike 2 This ability allows a pilot to call in a TIE Bomber strike force against their current target, assuming it is valid.
entries.bstrike3: Bomber Strike 3 This ability allows a pilot to call in a TIE Bomber strike wing against their current target, assuming it is valid.
entries.buff_invis_1sm: Hide: If you stand perfectly still, you may elude your enemies for a short period of time by briefly disappearing from view.
entries.bump: /bump: You offer an open invitation for bumping. /bump self: You bump with yourself. /bump target: You bump with (target name).
entries.burp: /burp: You burp loudly and look toward the judges. /burp self: Was it tasty? You burp to yourself and get a bitter, acidic taste in your mouth. /burp target: You burp in (target name)'s face.
entries.burstrun: Burst Run Burst Run lets you run rapidly for a short duration by expending some of your Health, Action, and Mind pools at once.
entries.burstshot: Burst Shot This ranged area attack has a chance of stunning a group of opponents preventing them from regenerating ability points for a short period of time.
entries.burstshot1: Advanced Burst Shot This ranged attack is more damaging than the default attack.
entries.burstshot2: Advnaced Burst Shot This area ranged attack is more damaging than Burst Shot 1.
entries.burstshot_1: Improved Burst Shot This enhancement to the Burst Shot ability has a higher chance of stunning the targets.
entries.bye: /bye: BYE! /bye self: BYE-BYE! /bye target: You wish (target name) well and hope to see (him, her, or it) soon.
entries.cackle: /cackle: You cackle. /cackle self: You cackle insanely at yourself. /cackle target: You cackle in (target name)'s face.
entries.calledshot: Called Shot This ability allows a Squad Leader to call out a specific target.  The next attack to that target from the Squad Leaders group will have a significant increase to Accuracy and Damage.  The amount of the improvement increases as the Squad Leader becomes more skilled.
entries.callforg9riggerpickup: Call For G9 Rigger Pickup: Calls a Corellian G9 Rigger Freighter to pick you up and take you to up to 3 previously set locations throughout the Galaxy.
entries.callforpickup: Call For Pickup: Calls a ship to pick you up and take you to another location on the planet you are currently on.
entries.callforprivateerpickup: Call For Privateer Pickup: Calls a privateer ship to pick you up and take you to another location on the planet you are currently on.
entries.callforrattletrappickup: Call For Rattletrap Pickup: Calls a Rattletrap ship to pick you up and take you to another location on the planet you are currently on.
entries.callforroyalpickup: Call For Royal Ship Pickup: Calls a royal ship to pick you up and take you to another location on the planet you are currently on.
entries.callforsolarsailerpickup: Call For Solar Sailer Pickup: Calls a Geonosian Solar Sailer to pick you up and take you to your place of residence from any planet in the Galaxy.
entries.callretreat: /callretreat: RETREAT!! /callretreat self: You prepare to retreat. /callretreat target: You give (target name) the signal to retreat.
entries.callstop: /callstop:  Everybody stop! /callstop self:  You bravely try to stop the onrushing world. /callstop target:  You order (target name) to stop.
entries.calltoarms: Call To Arms This group ability increases the armor rating of all group members.  Only one group enhancement can be active at time.
entries.calm: /calm: You try to calm everyone down. /calm self: Take a deep breath and count to 10. 1.. 2.. 3.. /calm target: You try to calm (target name) down.
entries.camouflageally: Using the proper camouflage kit, this ability allows you to render a friend invisible in the wilderness.
entries.camouflageself: Camouflage Self This ability allows you to make use of a Camouflage Kit to hide yourself from view.   This ability only works in wilderness environments.  Remember that taking nearly any action, including moving about, will break your camouflage.
entries.cancelcraftingsession: This command cancels a crafting session.
entries.catchbreath: /catchbreath: You wheeze and gasp for air as you try to catch your breath. /catchbreath self: You rest your hands on your knees and try to catch your breath. /catchbreath target: You signal to (target name) that you will be just a moment as you catch your breath.
entries.censor: /censor: You are appalled at the usage of obscenities. /censor self: You scold yourself and wash your own mouth with soap. /censor target: You censor (target name).
entries.centerofbeing: Center Of Being Focus your inner being to increase your combat defenses for a period of time.
entries.centerofbeing_1: Honed Center Of Being Focus your inner being to increase your combat defenses for a period of time.
entries.centerofbeing_2: Greater Center Of Being Focus your inner being to increase your combat defenses for a period of time.
entries.centerstage: /centerStage: Performs a center stage lighting effect.

entries.cert_carbine_cdef: This certification allows you to wield a CDEF Carbine.

entries.cert_carbine_dh17_short: This certification allows you to wield a DH17 Short Carbine.

entries.cert_carbine_dxr6: This certification allows you to wield a DXR6 Carbine.

entries.channelforce: Channel Force This ability allows a Jedi to quickly convert some of his natural life energy into usable Force power.
entries.charge: Charge! This group ability significantly increases the Run speed of all group members for a short period of time.  The Squad Leader will suffer a significant Defense penatly for a period due to the attention drawn on to the Squad Leader by activating this ability.  Only one group enhancement can be active at time.
entries.chargeshot: Charge Shot This ranged attack has a chance to knock down an opponent.
entries.chargeshot1: This ranged attack can knock a target down.
entries.chargeshot2: This ranged attack can knock multiple targets down at once.
entries.chargeshot_1: This enhancement to the Charge Shot ability increases the chance of knocking down an opponent.
entries.chase: /chase: You don't have to go home, but you can't stay here! /chase self: You turn circles, chasing your own tail. /chase target: You chase (target name) around the area.

entries.cheapshot: Cheap Shot Hits your opponent where it hurts the most, causing extra damage in the process.
entries.cheapshot_1: Improved Cheap Shot Hits your opponent where it hurts the most, causing extra damage in the process.
entries.cheapshot_2: Advanced Cheap Shot Hits your opponent where it hurts the most, causing extra damage in the process.
entries.cheek: /cheek: You turn your head and expose your cheek looking for a kiss. /cheek self: You point to your cheek indicating where to kiss. /cheek target: You give (target name) a tender kiss on the cheek.
entries.cheer: /cheer: You cheer wildly. /cheer self: You cheer for yourself! YAY ME!! /cheer target: YAY!! You cheer for (target name).
entries.chestpound: /chestpound: You pound on your chest! /chestpound self: You pound on your chest, daring anyone to take you on. /chestpound target: You pound your chest. Will (target name) take you on?
entries.chestpuff: /chestpuff: You puff up your chest and attempt to look imposing. /chestpuff self: You chest-puff and pump up your own ego a bit. /chestpuff target: You realize that (target name) is just chest-puffing and let (him, her, or it) know that (he, she or it) full of hot air.
entries.choppedliver: /choppedliver: You wonder what is wrong with you. Are you chopped liver? /choppedliver self: What am I? Chopped liver? /choppedliver target: You ask (target name) if you are chopped liver?
entries.chortle: /chortle: You chortle. /chortle self: With a series of nasally snorts, you chortle to yourself. /chortle target: You chortle uncontrollably at the sight of (target name).
entries.chroniclergetrating: Use this command to see a Chronicler's rating.  Usage: /chroniclerGetRating <Chronicler's Name>  *If you do not enter a name, it will attempt to use your target.
entries.chroniclerventriloquism: This command allows a Chronicler Master to whisper words to storyteller NPCs in his/her story that the NPC will then say. The Chronicler Master must have control of the storyteller NPC or the NPC will ignore the command.   Usage: /chroniclerVentriloquism <Whatever you wish the storyteller NPC to say>
entries.chuckle: /chuckle: You chuckle. /chuckle self: You chuckle to yourself. /chuckle target: You chuckle politely at (target name).
entries.city_map: If the Politician is a Mayor, he can register his city on the planetary map and register the city's civic buildings with the /find command.
entries.city_spec_bm_incubator: This City Specialization reduces the time required to incubate and hatch a beast by 3 hours per session.
entries.city_spec_cloning: The cost of clone insurance in a city with the 'Clone Lab' specialization is reduced by 20%.
entries.city_spec_decor_increase: Increases the number of Civic Structures that can be placed by 33%. Increases the number of City Decorations that can be placed by 33%.
entries.city_spec_doctor: Medical healing is 10% more effective in a 'Medical Center'.
entries.city_spec_entertainer: Dancing and musical enhancement receive a bonus in an 'Entertainment District'.
entries.city_spec_industry: Crafting done in a 'Manufacturing Center' earns a 10% bonus to prototype assembly results, significantly reducing the chance of failures.
entries.city_spec_master_healing: A 'Scientific Society' gains the bonuses of both the 'Medical Center' and 'Entertainment District' specializations.
entries.city_spec_master_manufacturing: An 'Industrial Society' gains the bonuses of both the 'Manufacturing Center' and 'Research Center' specializations.
entries.city_spec_missions: Missions taken in a city with an 'Improved Job Market' grant a 15% increase to their rewards.
entries.city_spec_research: Any experimentation done within a 'Research Center' is enhanced.  A 15% bonus to the final result roll is added during the experimentation phase of crafting.
entries.city_spec_sample_rich: A sample rich city has a lot of highly accessible surface resources for manual collection.  The sample rich city bestows a 20% bonus to sample sizes and a 10% bonus to extraction skill checks during resource collection using a survey tool.
entries.city_spec_storyteller: Increases the length of time a Storyteller Item remains in your City by 12 hours.
entries.city_spec_stronghold: A 'Stronghold' has trained its militia members to the peak of their abilities in the methods of tactical defense.  Militia members in a 'Stronghold' get a 50 point bonus to all defense rolls against other players.
entries.cityban: Prevents a player from being able to buy travel tickets at the city shuttleport and prevents them from entering public civic structures like cloning facilities and the city hall.  You may only use this command if you are a militia member.
entries.citypardon: Removes the ban state from a person in your city.  You may only use this command if you are a militia member.
entries.citywarn: Warns the target to leave the city in 30 seconds or be attacked.  Players made attackable with this command cannot defend themselves, but are only attackable up to the city limits.  You may only use this command if you are a militia member.
entries.clap: /clap: You clap your hands together. /clap self: You give yourself a hand. /clap target: You clap for (target name).
entries.claw: /claw: You hiss and bare your claws. /claw self: You remove a file from your pack and begin to sharpen your claws. /claw target: You claw at (target name).
entries.close: /close: You close your eyes for a moment. /close self: You close your eyes for a moment, thinking. /close target: You close your eyes, unwilling to look at (target name).
entries.closeeyes: /closeeyes:  You close your eyes for a moment. /closeeyes self:  You close your eyes for a moment, thinking. /closeeyes target:  You close your eyes, unwilling to look at (target name).
entries.co_ae_dm_1: Sweeping Fire 1: A level 7 all out attack on all targets in front of the Commando.
entries.co_ae_dm_2: Sweeping Fire 2: A level 18 all out attack on all targets in front of the Commando.
entries.co_ae_dm_3: Sweeping Fire 3: A level 30 all out attack on all targets in front of the Commando.
entries.co_ae_hw_dot: Burn Down!: Applies an AoE DOT effect to all targets around your current target, based on your current weapon's elemental damage type. Only works with Heavy Weapons.
entries.co_armor_cracker: Armor Shredder: An ability that damages enemy armor in a radius of 10m around the target.
entries.co_base_of_operations: Base of Operations: A powerful shield surrounds your group, which increases their armor by 500.
entries.co_cluster_bomb: Cluster Bomb\^001 20 Kill Meter Points \^001 Breaks down high explosive material and seperates them into multiple smaller bomblets allowing greater area dispersal.
entries.co_conceal_device_1: Conceal Device: Allows you to hide concealable devices such as traps from view.  No one will see the device but you.
entries.co_del_ae_cc_1_1: Stun Grenade 1: A level 4 grenade used to temporarily stun the Commando's opponents.
entries.co_del_ae_cc_1_2: Stun Grenade 2: A level 14 grenade used to temporarily stun the Commando's opponents.
entries.co_del_ae_cc_1_3: Stun Grenade 3: A level 26 grenade used to temporarily stun the Commando's opponents.
entries.co_del_ae_cc_2_1: Cryoban Grenade 1: A level 50 grenade that damages and freezes all targets in the blast area, slowing their movement speed.
entries.co_del_ae_cc_2_2: Cryoban Grenade 2: A level 74 grenade that damages and coats all targets in an adhesive substance slowing their movement speed.
entries.co_del_ae_dm_1: Fragmentation Grenade 1: A level 38 grenade that causes a significant amount of damage to all targets in the blast area.
entries.co_del_ae_dm_2: Fragmentation Grenade 2: A level 62 grenade that causes a significant amount of damage to all targets in the blast area.
entries.co_del_ae_dm_3: Fragmentation Grenade 3: A level 86 grenade that causes a significant amount of damage to all targets in the blast area.
entries.co_dm_1: Focused Fire 1: A high powered level 1 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.co_dm_2: Focused Fire 2: A high powered level 10 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.co_dm_3: Focused Fire 3: A high powered level 22 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.co_dm_4: Focused Fire 4: A high powered level 42 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.co_dm_5: Focused Fire 5: A high powered level 54 attack that causes bonus damage.

entries.co_dm_7: Focused Fire 7: A high powered level 78 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.co_dm_8: Focused Fire 8: A high powered level 90 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.co_double_time: Double Time\^001 10 Kill Meter Points \^001 Temporarily increases the commando's movement speed.
entries.co_empowered_attack: Empowered Attack\^001  15 Kill Meter Points \^001 Increases damage from small arms fire.
entries.co_enrage_1: Enrage: When activated this ability causes you to lose 5000 Health while gaining +10 to your kill meter. This ability is aquired from the 5 Piece Frontman Set Bonus.
entries.co_first_aid_training: First Aid Training\^001 10 Kill Meter Points \^001 Increases potency of the commando's healing abilities.
entries.co_fld_dm_1: Mine 1: E-Mag: A level 46 proximity detonation device that damages all targets in the blast area.
entries.co_fld_dm_2: Mine 2: Plasma: A level 70 proximity detonation device that damages all targets in the blast area
