entries.co_hw_dm_2: Focused Beam 2: A high powered level 26 heavy weapon attack.
entries.co_hw_dm_3: Focused Beam 3: A high powered level 42 heavy weapon attack.
entries.co_hw_dm_4: Focused Beam 4: A high powered level 58 heavy weapon attack.
entries.co_hw_dm_5: Focused Beam 5: A high powered level 74 heavy weapon attack.
entries.co_hw_dm_6: Focused Beam 6: A high powered level 90 heavy weapon attack.
entries.co_hw_dm_crit_1: Lethal Beam 1: A high powered level heavy weapon attack that damages the opponent's health as well as a small amount of action.
entries.co_hw_dm_crit_2: Lethal Beam 2: A high powered level 26 heavy weapon attack that damages the opponent's health as well as a small amount of action.
entries.co_hw_dm_crit_3: Lethal Beam 3: A high powered level 42 heavy weapon attack that damages the opponent's health as well as a small amount of action.
entries.co_hw_dm_crit_4: Lethal Beam 4: A high powered level 58 heavy weapon attack that damages the opponent's health as well as a small amount of action.
entries.co_hw_dm_crit_5: Lethal Beam 5: A high powered level 74 heavy weapon attack that damages the opponent's health as well as a small amount of action.
entries.co_hw_dm_crit_6: Lethal Beam 6: A high powered level 90 heavy weapon attack that damages the opponent's health as well as a small amount of action.
entries.co_hw_dot: It Burns!: Applies a DOT effect to your current target based on your current weapon's elemental damage type.
entries.co_kill_trap_1: Disarm Device: This ability allows you to make an attempt to disarm hostile traps and mines.  Failing to disarm the device will usually cause the device to deliver its payload to you.
entries.co_killing_spree: Killing Spree\^001 20 Kill Meter Points  \^001 The commando will randomly attack all nearby enemies for the duration of the effect.
entries.co_mirror_armor: Mirror Armor: This ability allows your armor to cloak you from radar detection and will lower enemy aggressiveness upon activation.
entries.co_position_secured: Position Secured: This ability digs you in and increases your Precision and Strength by 200.
entries.co_remote_detonator_1: Remote Detonator 1: A level 10 remote detonation device that damages all targets in the blast area, after being triggered.
entries.co_remote_detonator_2: Remote Detonator 2: A level 30 remote detonation device that damages all targets in the blast area, after being triggered.
entries.co_remote_detonator_3: Remote Detonator 3: A level 50 remote detonation device that damages all targets in the blast area, after being triggered.
entries.co_remote_detonator_4: Remote Detonator 4: A level 70 remote detonation device that damages all targets in the blast area, after being triggered.
entries.co_remote_detonator_5: Remote Detonator 5: A level 90 remote detonation device that damages all targets in the blast area, after being triggered.
entries.co_riddle_armor: Riddle Armor: An ability to damage a target's armor.
entries.co_sh_0: Heal 1: A level 7 healing ability used to recover a small amount of health.
entries.co_sh_1: Heal 2: The commando draws on their survival training to recover some of their health for a level 34 heal.
entries.co_sh_2: Heal 3: The commando draws on their survival training to recover some of their health for a level 58 heal.
entries.co_sh_3: Heal 4: Self contained bacta packets used to recover health for a level 82 heal.
entries.co_shock_grenade_1: Shock Grenade 1: A level 10 grenade that damages and electrifies all targets in the blast area.
entries.co_shock_grenade_2: Shock Grenade 2: A level 34 grenade that damages and electrifies all targets in the blast area.
entries.co_shock_grenade_3: Shock Grenade 3: A level 58 grenade that damages and electrifies all targets in the blast area.
entries.co_shock_grenade_4: Shock Grenade 4: A level 82 grenade that damages and electrifies all targets in the blast area.
entries.co_shock_tracer_1: Shock Tracer 1: A level 10 electrical tracer shot, which shocks and electrifies a target.
entries.co_shock_tracer_2: Shock Tracer 2: A level 34 electrical tracer shot, which shocks and electrifies a target.
entries.co_shock_tracer_3: Shock Tracer 3: A level 58 electrical tracer shot, which shocks and electrifies a target.
entries.co_shock_tracer_4: Shock Tracer 4: A level 82 electrical tracer shot, which shocks and electrifies a target.
entries.co_stand_fast: Stand Fast: Lowers damage taken by the Commando by 60% (75% with 3 points in Improved Stand Fast).
entries.co_stim_armor: Stim Armor: A heal over time buff through modified armor.
entries.co_suppressing_fire: Suppressing Fire: A barrage of fire at a target which lowers their ability to fire accurately and supresses movement towards the commando.
entries.colorlights: /colorlights: Performs a series of colored light effects.
entries.colorswirl: /colorSwirl: Performs a colorful swirl around your target.
entries.comb: /comb: Looking for something? You comb the area. /comb self: You comb your hair. There! Perfect! /comb target: You comb (target name)'s hair.
entries.combarea: /combarea:  Looking for something? You comb the area. /combarea self:  There you are! /combarea target:  You comb the area searching for (target name).
entries.combatfeint: Combat Feint This enhancement decreases the amount of aggression generated by an enemy for a single target.
entries.combattarget: /combattarget:  Type /combattarget while on an attackable target to maintain that as what you will be attacking, regardless of what else you target afterwards.  This is very useful for healing other party members while fighting creatures or players.
entries.combhair: /combhair:  You claw at the knots in your hair in desperate need of a comb. /combhair self:  You comb your hair. There! Perfect! /combhair target:  You comb (target name)'s hair.
entries.comboattack: Combo Attack This moderately powerful melee attack strikes the opponent with a flurry of hits.
entries.comboattack_1: Improved Combo Attack This enhancement to the Combo Attack ability increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.comboattack_2: Advanced Combo Attack This enhancement to the Combo Attack ability increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.comfort: /comfort: You comfort everyone and let them know it will be OK. /comfort self: You subtly drop the hint that you could use some comforting. /comfort target: You comfort (him, her, or it).
entries.command_pvp_adrenaline_ability: Adrenaline Rush: Through countless battles, fear has been replaced by the ability to utilize your adrenaline rush and speed up your combat skills in the face of danger.
entries.command_pvp_adrenaline_rebel_ability: Adrenaline Rush: Through countless battles, fear has been replaced by the ability to utilize your adrenaline rush and speed up your combat skills in the face of danger.
entries.command_pvp_last_man_ability: Last Man Standing: Many a time you have been the deciding factor between victory and defeat, pushing yourself beyond the ability of mere mortals to be the last man standing.
entries.command_pvp_last_man_rebel_ability: Last Man Standing: Many a time you have been the deciding factor between victory and defeat, pushing yourself beyond the ability of mere mortals to be the last man standing.
entries.command_pvp_retaliation_ability: Retaliation: After years in the battlefield your mind has instinctively learned to retaliate pain by immediately counter attacking the source of your wounds.
entries.command_pvp_retaliation_rebel_ability: Retaliation: After years in the battlefield your mind has instinctively learned to retaliate pain by immediately counter attacking the source of your wounds.
entries.command_pvp_unstoppable_ability: Unstoppable: Your body has become so used to pain and wounds that you ignore all but the most severe; allowing you to keep fighting when a mere mortal would be on his knees begging for mercy.
entries.command_pvp_unstoppable_rebel_ability: Unstoppable: Your body has become so used to pain and wounds that you ignore all but the most severe; allowing you to keep fighting when a mere mortal would be on his knees begging for mercy.
entries.conceal: Conceal This command allows you to apply a camouflage kit to become far less detectable by NPCs and creatures while in the concealed state.  This can be used on other players.
entries.concealdevice: Conceal Device This ability allows you to conceal a trap that you have deployed.  Concealed traps are more likely to get the job done, especially when they are intended for use against relatively intelligent targets such as most humanoids.
entries.concealshot: Conceal Shot This ranged attack ability allows you to shoot while under cover with low probability of revealing your location.
entries.concealshot_1: Improved Conceal Shot This enhancement to the Conceal Shot ability causes more damage to an opponent.
entries.concussionshot: Concussion Shot This ranged attack ability dazes an opponent completely stopping their ability to move or attack for a short period of time.  Any damage done to the target during that time will bring them back to their sense and allow them to react again.
entries.concussionshot_1: Improved Concussion Shot This enhancement to the Concussion Shot ability increases the duration of the daze effect.
entries.confusionshot: Confusion Shot This ranged attack is designed to confuse its target, and can stun and dizzy its target as well.
entries.confusionshot_1: Improved Confusion Shot This enhancement to the Confusion Shot ability has a higher chance of stunning or making an opponent dizzy.
entries.confussionshot: Confusion Shot This ranged attack has a change of making an opponent dizzy thus reducing their accuracy and defense abilities as well as possibly stunning them and removing their capability of regenerating ability points for a period of time.
entries.confussionshot_1: Improved Confusion Shot This enhancement to the Confusion Shot ability has a higher chance of stunning or making an opponent dizzy.
entries.congratulate: /congratulate: Congrats to all! /congratulate self: You give yourself a pat on the back. /congratulate target: You congratulate (him, her, or it).
entries.consent: Give a player consent to drag your body.
entries.consider: This allows you to determine the relative difficulty of your current target.
entries.contemplate: /contemplate: You contemplate. /contemplate self: You contemplate your future. /contemplate target: You contemplate (target name)'s future.
entries.corpse: /corpse: Using this command with a corpse targeted will move the corpse closer to you.  If it is not your corpse, you will need /consent from the player who died.
entries.costume_4lom: A 4-LOM Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_battle_droid: A Battle Droid costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_chevin: A Chevin Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_dantari_f: A Dantari Female Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_dantari_m: A Dantari Male Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_darktrooper: A Dark Trooper Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_droid_8t88: An 8T88 Droid Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_droideka: A Droideka costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_ewok: An Ewok costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_gamorrean_guard: A Gamorrean Guard costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_gungan: A Gungan costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_ig106: An IG-106 Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_jawa: A Jawa costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_loveday_ewok_cupid: An Ewok Festival of Love costume. To use this costume, you must have a Holiday Holoshroud.
entries.costume_monkey_lizard: A Monkey-lizard costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_muftak: A Talz Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_mustafarian_01: A Mustafar Lava Miner Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_royal_guard: An Imperial Guard Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_spider_droid: A B'omarr Monk Costume costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_super_battle_droid: A Super Battle Droid Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_toydarian: A Toydarian costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.cough: /cough: *COUGH* *COUGH* /cough self: *cough* *ahem* You hack out a stifled cough. Trying to tell someone something? /cough target: You cough in (his, her, or its) face.
entries.counterattack: Counterattack This command utilizes the counter attack sequence.
entries.countertoxin: Countertoxin This medical ability allows for the possibility of curing an ally who has become poisoned.
entries.countertoxin_1: Improved Countertoxin This enhancement to the Countertoxin ability has a much greater chance of curing the target.
entries.countertoxinspray: Countertoxin Spray This medical ability allows for the possibility of curing a group of allies near the doctor who have become poisoned.
entries.cover: Cover This ability allows you to take cover using obstructions in the immediate area.  While under cover you will be very difficult to see and will not appear on the radar.  You must be prone and remain prone to stay under cover and almost all normal actions will break the cover.
entries.covercharge: /covercharge <amount>: Sets the amount of money that you want to charge patrons for your inspiration buffs.  Set <amount> to 0 to stop charging a cover.
entries.covereyes: /covereyes: You cover your eyes. /covereyes self: You hide your eyes behind your crossed arms. /covereyes target: You cover (his, her, or its) eyes.
entries.cower: /cower: You cower. /cower self: You cower submissively. /cower target: You cower away from (him, her, or it).
entries.createmanfschematic: This command is used to create a manufacture schematic.
entries.createprototype: This command allows the user to create a prototype.
entries.creature_milking_buff: Exceptional Milking - You are an expert at creature milking and can extract milk at a higher rate.
entries.cringe: /cringe: EEP! You cringe. /cringe self: You cringe at the thought. /cringe target: You cringe away from (target name) in fear.
entries.crippleattack: Cripple Attack This melee attack to an opponent's legs does minimal damage but impedes their movement rate for a short time.
entries.crippleattack_1: Improved Cripple Attack This enhancement to the Cripple Attack ability causes a higher reduction in movement rate.
entries.crippleshot: Crippling Shot Aims for your targets legs, causing them to move slower for a period of time.
entries.crippleshot_1: Relentless Crippling Shot Aims for your targets legs, causing them to move slower for a period of time.
entries.crippleshot_2: Merciless Shot Aims for your targets legs, causing them to move slower for a period of time.
entries.cripplingshot: Crippling Shot This ranged attack to an opponent's legs does minimal damage but impedes their movement rate for a short time.
entries.cripplingshot_1: Improved Crippling Shot This enhancement to the Crippling Shot ability increases the duration that an opponents movement is reduced.
entries.criticalshot: Critical Shot This ranged attack ability grants an increased chance to score a critical hit.
entries.criticalshot_1: Improved Critical Shot This enhancement to the Critical Shot ability grants an increased chance to score a critical hit.
entries.criticalshot_2: Advanced Critical Shot This enhancement to the Critical Shot ability grants an increased chance to score a critical hit.
entries.criticalstrike: Critical Strike This melee attack does higher than normal damage with chance to critical doing serious amounts of damage.
entries.criticalstrike_1: Improved Critical Strike This enhancement to the Critical Strike ability has an increased chance of causing critical damage.
entries.cry: /cry: You burst into tears. /cry self: You cry uncontrollably. /cry target: You cry on (his, her, or its) shoulder.
entries.cu: /cu: See ya later. /cu self: "Not if I see you first!" /cu target: See ya later, (target name).
entries.cuckoo: /cuckoo: These people are cuckoo. /cuckoo self: You just realized that you are cuckoo. /cuckoo target: You think (target name) is cuckoo.
entries.culater: /culater:  See ya later. /culater self:  "Not if I see you first!" /culater target:  See ya later, (target name).
entries.curedisease: Cure Disease This command enables you to cure disease from a target, if you have the appropriate medical equipment.
entries.curepoison: Cure Poison This command enables you to cure poison from a target, if you have the appropriate medical equipment.
entries.curious: /curious: You look around inquisitively. /curious self: You look curiously at yourself, as if something has changed. /curious target: You peer curiously over (his, her, or its) shoulder.
entries.curse: /curse: You spew obscenities. /curse self: You quietly curse to yourself. /curse target: You spew obscenities at (target name), and let (him, her, or it) have it.
entries.curtsey: /curtsey: You curtsey for your audience. /curtsey self: You perform a very formal curtsey. /curtsey target: You curtsey to (target name).
entries.customizedroid: This command allows the user to attempt to customize the target droid.
entries.cyborgburstrun: Cyborg Burst Run Temporarily overload your cybernetic enhancement to briefly increase your run speed.
entries.cyborgcriticalsnipe: Cyborg Critical Snipe Overload your cybernetic enhancement to ensure victory with a single, deadly shot.
entries.cyborgkickdown: Cyborg Kickdown Overload your cybernetic enhancement to deliver a powerful kick attack.
entries.cyborglightning: Cyborg Lightning With your cybernetic arm, you can unleash an electrical attack on nearby opponents.
entries.cyborgrevive: Cyborg Revive Using a great deal of your cybernetic enhancement's capacitors, revive a patient from near-death.
entries.cyborgstrengthbuff: Cyborg Strength Buff Temporarily overload your cybernetic enhancement to increase your melee damage.
entries.cyborgsureshot: Cyborg Sure Shot Overload your cybernetic enhancement's capabilities to deliver a powerful ranged attack.
entries.dance: /dance: You dance about the area. /dance self: You dance with yourself. /dance target: You grab (target name) and drag (him, her, or it) to the dance-floor.
entries.dancefloor: /danceFloor: Performs a lighted dance floor effect.
entries.dancer: This ability allows you to perform dance commands.
entries.dazzle: /dazzle: Performs a dazzling effect of color and lights.
entries.deadbang: Dead Bang Shot Shortens the range of all area effect weapons whilst simultaneously increasing the damage slightly within the area of effect.
entries.deadbang_1: Improved Dead Bang Shot Shortens the range of all area effect weapons whilst simultaneously increasing the damage within the area of effect.
entries.deadbang_2: Advanced Dead Bang Shot Shortens the range of all area effect weapons whilst simultaneously increasing the damage significantly within the area of effect.
entries.declareovert: This command allows a covert faction member to declare overt faction status. Usage of this command is restricted to a 50m radius around friendly player-placed faction headquarters.
entries.decontaminate: Decontaminate This medical ability allows for the possibility of curing a group of allies near the doctor who have become diseased.
entries.deepbow: /deepbow: You bow deeply. /deepbow self: You bow deeply before yourself and almost fall over. /deepbow target: You bow deeply before (target name), showing great respect.
entries.defaultattack: /defaultattack: This is the most basic attack action.
entries.defend: /defend: You try to stand imposingly, exhibiting your intent to defend the area. /defend self: You prepare to defend yourself. /defend target: You step in front of (target name), ready to defend (him, her, or it).
entries.defuseminefield: Defuse Minefield This command allows the user to defuse a mine field.
entries.demolition: Demolition Uses your tactical training to deliver an especially powerful attack.
entries.demolition_1: Advanced Demolition Uses your tactical training to deliver an especially powerful attack.
entries.demolition_2: Superior Demolition Uses your tactical training to deliver an especially powerful attack.
entries.demolitionshot: Demolition Shot This attack does extra damage when targeting mechanical objects such as droids, vehicles or structures.  When targeting anything else with this attack, the damage bonus for this attack is greatly diminished.
entries.demolitionshot_1: Improved Demolition Shot This attack does extra damage when targeting mechanical objects such as droids, vehicles or structures.  When targeting anything else with this attack, the damage bonus for this attack is greatly diminished.
entries.demolitionshot_2: Advanced Demolition Shot This attack does extra damage when targeting mechanical objects such as droids, vehicles or structures.  When targeting anything else with this attack, the damage bonus for this attack is greatly diminished.
entries.demure: /demure: You blush shyly. /demure self: You blush, smiling secretly. /demure target: You blush shyly at (target name).
entries.deride: /deride: Playing the town fool? You ridicule everyone about you. /deride self: You deride yourself. /deride target: You laugh at (target name) with contempt.
entries.detectcamouflage: Detect Camouflage This skill allows you discover hidden people and objects in your immediate area.
entries.deuteriumtoss: Deuterium Toss This offensive medical ability delivers a chemical fire at range which inflicts health damage over time.
entries.deuteriumtoss_1: Improved Deuterium Toss This enhancement to the Deuterium Toss ability delivers a strong chemical fire at range which inflicts health damage.
entries.diagnose: Diagnose This ability reveals the attribute wounds of your target so that you can focus your healing efforts where they are most needed. The wounds shown are a snapshot of your target at the time you diagnose them. If you wish to update your target's wound information to reflect recent healing or damage, simply diagnose them again.
entries.dies: /dies: Death to all of them! /dies self: You contemplate the meaning of life. /dies target: You grimly dictate the fate of (target name).
entries.disagree: /disagree: You politely disagree. /disagree self: You change your mind and disagree with your last statement. /disagree target: You disagree with (target name).
entries.disarmingshot: Disarming Shot This ranged attack causes an opponent to fumble with their weapon for a short period of time preventing them from being able to attack.
entries.disarmingshot1: Improved Disarming Shot This ranged attack is used to hit your opponent's weapon.
entries.disarmingshot2: This ranged attack is used to hit your opponent's weapon.  This is more powerful than Disarming Shot 1.
entries.disarmingshot_1: Improved Disarming Shot This enhancement to the Disarming Shot increases the amount of time it before an opponent can use their weapon again.
entries.disarmtrap: Disarm Trap This skill allows you to attempt to disarm a trap that was placed by someone else.   If your knowledge of anti-personnel devices is inferior to that of the person who set the trap, you will probably fail your disarm attempt with tragic consequences.
entries.diseaseinnoculation: Disease Inoculation This medical enhancement allows a person with the correct medical skill to temporarily enhance the Disease Resist of themselves or their target.
entries.diseaseinnoculation_1: Improved Disease Inoculation This enhancement to the Disease Inoculation ability will grant a higher enhancement value.
entries.disinfect: Disinfect This medical ability allows for the possibility of curing an ally who has become diseased.
entries.disinfect_1: Improved Disinfect This enhancement to the Disinfect ability has a much greater chance of curing the target.
entries.dismiss: /dismiss: You dismiss everyone. /dismiss self: You dismiss the notion. /dismiss target: You dismiss (target name) with a quick gesture.
entries.dismount: Dismount from a vehicle or creature.
entries.distract: /distract: Performs a distracting effect of color and lights.
entries.diveshot: Dive Shot A diving shot will cause you to dive and attack at the same time, leaving you in a prone position.
entries.dizzyattack: Dizzy Attack This melee attack does minimal damage but has a high chance of making an opponent dizzy, reducing their accuracy and defense.
entries.dizzyattack_1: Improved Dizzy Attack This enhancement to the Dizzy Attack ability increases the chance of making an opponent dizzy.
entries.dizzyattack_2: Advanced Dizzy Attack This enhancement to the Dizzy Attack ability gives an almost guaranteed dizzy effect to the opponent.
entries.dizzyrecovery: Dizzy Recovery This ability allows you to recover immediately from being dizzy if you have enough ability points.
entries.do_cm_6: Burst Shot: A high powered attack that causes bonus damage
entries.dock: Dock Dock with or undock from a space station.
entries.doh: /doh: Doh! /doh self: DOH DOH DOH! /doh target: You look at (him, her, or it) and say "DOH!"
entries.dominatemind: Dominate Mind This ability allows a Jedi to enter the mind of a mob in combat and increase the aggro that it has towards you. This ability is useful to get mobs to attack you instead of other party members.
entries.dominatemind_1: Improved Dominate Mind This enhancement to the Dominate Mind ability has a greater chance of increasing the aggro that a mob in combat has towards you.
entries.doubletap: Double Tap This ranged attack fires two bolts at once, damaging your target more than the default attack.
entries.doubletime: Double Time This group ability reduces the cooldown timers of actions for all group members.  Only one group enhancement can be active at time.
entries.down: /down: You point at the ground. /down self: You're staying right here! /down target: You tell (target name) to stay right here.
entries.dragincapacitatedplayer: Drag Incapacitated Player This command allows you to drag an incapacitated player's body to a safer location.
entries.dragplayer: Drag Player This command allows you to drag an incapacitated player's body to a safer location.  You must be somewhat close for this command to work.
entries.drainforce: Drain Force This attack allows a Jedi to drain stored Force power from another player Jedi.
entries.dream: /dream: You float away on a fluffy white cloud. /dream self: Daydreaming again? /dream target: Dreamy, isn't (he, she or it)?
entries.droid+droidcommand_engineefficiencyfour: Engines consume less power, at the cost of a bit less thrust.
entries.droid+droidcommand_engineefficiencyone: Engines consume less power, at the cost of a bit less thrust.
entries.droid+droidcommand_engineefficiencythree: Engines consume less power, at the cost of a bit less thrust.
entries.droid+droidcommand_engineefficiencytwo: Engines consume less power, at the cost of a bit less thrust.
entries.droid+droidcommand_engineoverloadfour: Makes engines provide more thrust, but is rather wasteful in energy.
entries.droid+droidcommand_engineoverloadone: Makes engines provide more thrust, but is rather wasteful in energy.
entries.droid+droidcommand_engineoverloadthree: Makes engines provide more thrust, but is rather wasteful in energy.
entries.droid+droidcommand_engineoverloadtwo: Makes engines provide more thrust, but is rather wasteful in energy.
entries.droid+droidcommand_mutedroid: Toggles off and on the flight droid or flight-computer's auditory feedback mode, giving the pilot some control over how talkative and responsive they are.
entries.droid+droidcommand_reactornormalize: Reset reactor back to default settings.
entries.droid+droidcommand_reactoroverloadfour: Reactor to generate more energy, at the cost of over-stressing it.
entries.droid+droidcommand_reactoroverloadone: Reactor to generate more energy, at the cost of over-stressing it.
entries.droid+droidcommand_reactoroverloadthree: Reactor to generate more energy, at the cost of over-stressing it.
entries.droid+droidcommand_reactoroverloadtwo: Reactor to generate more energy, at the cost of over-stressing it.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldadjustfrontfour: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger front shields than rear.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldadjustfrontone: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger front shields than rear.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldadjustfrontthre: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger front shields than rear.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldadjustfronttwo: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger front shields than rear.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldadjustrearfour: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger rear shields than front.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldadjustrearone: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger rear shields than front.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldadjustrearthree: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger rear shields than front.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldadjustreartwo: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger rear shields than front.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldbacktofronteigh: Divert most of the stored charge from the rear shields to the front.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldbacktofrontfift: Divert some of the stored charge from the rear shields to the front.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldbacktofronthund: Divert all of the stored charge from the rear shields to the front.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldbacktofronttwen: Divert some of the stored charge from the rear shields to the front.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldemergencyfront: This program immediately leeches the majority of rear shield energy and current weapon capacitor charge and diverts it all to the front shield facing. This is an instantaneous command with no lasting effects on any of the ship's systems involved.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldemergencyrear: This program immediately leeches the majority of front shield energy and current weapon capacitor charge and diverts it all to the rear shield facing. This is an instantaneous command with no lasting effects on any of the ship's systems involved.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldfronttobackeigh: Divert most of the stored charge from the front shields to the rear.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldfronttobackfift: Divert some of the stored charge from the front shields to the rear.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldfronttobackhund: Divert all of the stored charge from the front shields to the rear.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldfronttobacktwen: Divert some of the stored charge from the front shields to the rear.
entries.droid+droidcommand_shieldnormalize: Resets shields back to their defaults.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weapcapequalize: Resets the weapon capacitor energy settings back to their defaults.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weapcappowerupfour: Tell the droid to run more power through the weapon capacitor than it is rated for, leading to enhanced performance.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weapcappowerupone: Tell the droid to run more power through the weapon capacitor than it is rated for, leading to enhanced performance.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weapcappowerupthree: Tell the droid to run more power through the weapon capacitor than it is rated for, leading to enhanced performance.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weapcappoweruptwo: Tell the droid to run more power through the weapon capacitor than it is rated for, leading to enhanced performance.

entries.droid+droidcommand_weapcaptoshieldone: This program allows the droid to use back-up power-routing systems to shunt power currently stored in the weapon capacitor directly to the shield generator systems.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weapcaptoshieldthree: This program allows the droid to use back-up power-routing systems to shunt power currently stored in the weapon capacitor directly to the shield generator systems.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weapcaptoshieldtwo: This program allows the droid to use back-up power-routing systems to shunt power currently stored in the weapon capacitor directly to the shield generator systems.

entries.droid+droidcommand_weaponeffeciencyone: Re-tune the weapons to use less power, at the cost of performance.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weaponeffeciencythree: Re-tune the weapons to use less power, at the cost of performance.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weaponeffeciencytwo: Re-tune the weapons to use less power, at the cost of performance.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weaponnormalize: Reset the weapon power to defaults.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weaponoverload1: This command will increase the damage out put of your weapons by 25%. It will increase the energy requirements as well.
entries.droid+droidcommand_weaponoverloadfour: Increase weapon performance, at the cost of efficiency and possible system stress.

entries.droid_attack: Droid Attack: Orders your droid to attack a target.
entries.droid_battery_dump_1: Battery Dump stores a large amount of electrical charge in dump capacitors.  The capacitors empty their charge into arc projectors on a droid, which sends an electrical charge in a halo around the droid.
entries.droid_battery_dump_2: Battery Dump stores a large amount of electrical charge in dump capacitors.  The capacitors empty their charge into arc projectors on a droid, which sends an electrical charge in a halo around the droid.
entries.droid_battery_dump_3: Battery Dump stores a large amount of electrical charge in dump capacitors.  The capacitors empty their charge into arc projectors on a droid, which sends an electrical charge in a halo around the droid.
entries.droid_droideka_shield_1: Droideka Shields are primarily used on Droidekas, but can be modified for limited usage on other droids to protect them from small arms fire.
entries.droid_droideka_shield_2: Droideka Shields are primarily used on Droidekas, but can be modified for limited usage on other droids to protect them from small arms fire.
entries.droid_droideka_shield_3: Droideka Shields are primarily used on Droidekas, but can be modified for limited usage on other droids to protect them from small arms fire.
entries.droid_electrical_shock_1: An Electrical Shock is emitted from arc projectors on a droid, which can cause serious electrical damage to a target.
entries.droid_electrical_shock_2: An Electrical Shock is emitted from arc projectors on a droid, which can cause serious electrical damage to a target.
entries.droid_electrical_shock_3: An Electrical Shock is emitted from arc projectors on a droid, which can cause serious electrical damage to a target.
entries.droid_find: Droid Find This Bounty Hunter innate ability enables your probe droid to indicate to you where you should go next to find your quarry.
entries.droid_flame_jet_1: Flame jets are fired from a reactive gas module and ignited using a volatile chemical reaction and incinerate most materials in their path.
entries.droid_flame_jet_2: Flame jets are fired from a reactive gas module and ignited using a volatile chemical reaction and incinerate most materials in their path.
entries.droid_flame_jet_3: Flame jets are fired from a reactive gas module and ignited using a volatile chemical reaction and incinerate most materials in their path.
entries.droid_follow: Droid Follow: Orders your droid to follow you.
entries.droid_follow_other: Droid Follow Other: Orders your droid to follow a target.
entries.droid_friend: Droid Friend: Orders your droid to store a target to its friend list.
entries.droid_group: Droid Group: Orders your droid to join your current group.
entries.droid_guard: Droid Guard: Orders your droid to guard a target.
entries.droid_patrol: Droid Patrol: Orders your droid to start a pre-selected droid patrol path.
entries.droid_patrol_clear: Droid Patrol Clear: Clears the patrol points stored in a droid's memory.
entries.droid_patrol_point: Droid Patrol Point: Orders your droid to store a position in its memory for future patrolling.
entries.droid_regenerative_plating_1: Regenerative Plating is connected to a smartpump, which detects damage and pumps a liquid metal patch material to the site of the damage.  Droids equipped with this complex device literally reform their armor back.
entries.droid_regenerative_plating_2: Regenerative Plating is connected to a smartpump, which detects damage and pumps a liquid metal patch material to the site of the damage.  Droids equipped with this complex device literally reform their armor back.
entries.droid_regenerative_plating_3: Regenerative Plating is connected to a smartpump, which detects damage and pumps a liquid metal patch material to the site of the damage.  Droids equipped with this complex device literally reform their armor back.
entries.droid_stay: Droid Stay: Orders your droid to stay at its current position.
entries.droid_store: Droid Store: Stores your droid back in your datapad.
entries.droid_torturous_needle_1: Torturous Needles are contained in a torture droid's panel.  Modification to the module that houses the needles allows a droid to fire toxins at a target.
entries.droid_torturous_needle_2: Torturous Needles are contained in a torture droid's panel.  Modification to the module that houses the needles allows a droid to fire toxins at a target.
entries.droid_torturous_needle_3: Torturous Needles are contained in a torture droid's panel.  Modification to the module that houses the needles allows a droid to fire toxins at a target.
entries.droid_track: Droid Track This advanced Bounty Hunter innate ability enables you to receive a continual update on where your probe droid is indicating your quarry has recently been.
entries.droid_transfer: Droid Transfer: Begins the transfer process of the droid in your control to another person.
entries.droid_trick_1: Droid Trick 1: Orders your droid to perform a trick, if it currently has the ability to perform the trick.
entries.droid_trick_2: Droid Trick 2: Orders your droid to perform a trick, if it currently has the ability to perform the trick.
entries.droid_trick_3: Droid Trick 3: Orders your droid to perform a trick, if it currently has the ability to perform the trick.
entries.droid_trick_4: Droid Trick 4: Orders your droid to perform a trick, if it currently has the ability to perform the trick.
entries.droidcommand_engineefficiencyfour: Engines consume less power, at the cost of a bit less thrust.
entries.droidcommand_engineefficiencyone: Engines consume less power, at the cost of a bit less thrust.
entries.droidcommand_engineefficiencythree: Engines consume less power, at the cost of a bit less thrust.
entries.droidcommand_engineefficiencytwo: Engines consume less power, at the cost of a bit less thrust.
entries.droidcommand_engineoverloadfour: Makes engines provide more thrust, but is rather wasteful in energy.
entries.droidcommand_engineoverloadone: Makes engines provide more thrust, but is rather wasteful in energy.
entries.droidcommand_engineoverloadthree: Makes engines provide more thrust, but is rather wasteful in energy.
entries.droidcommand_engineoverloadtwo: Makes engines provide more thrust, but is rather wasteful in energy.
entries.droidcommand_mutedroid: Toggles off and on the flight droid or flight-computer's auditory feedback mode, giving the pilot some control over how talkative and responsive they are.
entries.droidcommand_reactornormalize: Reset reactor back to default settings.
entries.droidcommand_reactoroverloadfour: Reactor to generate more energy, at the cost of over-stressing it.
entries.droidcommand_reactoroverloadone: Reactor to generate more energy, at the cost of over-stressing it.
entries.droidcommand_reactoroverloadthree: Reactor to generate more energy, at the cost of over-stressing it.
entries.droidcommand_reactoroverloadtwo: Reactor to generate more energy, at the cost of over-stressing it.
entries.droidcommand_shieldadjustfrontfour: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger front shields than rear.
entries.droidcommand_shieldadjustfrontone: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger front shields than rear.
entries.droidcommand_shieldadjustfrontthree: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger front shields than rear.
entries.droidcommand_shieldadjustfronttwo: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger front shields than rear.
entries.droidcommand_shieldadjustrearfour: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger rear shields than front.
entries.droidcommand_shieldadjustrearone: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger rear shields than front.
entries.droidcommand_shieldadjustrearthree: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger rear shields than front.
entries.droidcommand_shieldadjustreartwo: Changes the shield generators to generate stronger rear shields than front.
entries.droidcommand_shieldbacktofronteighty: Divert most of the stored charge from the rear shields to the front.
entries.droidcommand_shieldbacktofrontfifty: Divert some of the stored charge from the rear shields to the front.
entries.droidcommand_shieldbacktofronthundred: Divert all of the stored charge from the rear shields to the front.
entries.droidcommand_shieldbacktofronttwenty: Divert some of the stored charge from the rear shields to the front.
entries.droidcommand_shieldemergencyfront: This program immediately leeches the majority of rear shield energy and current weapon capacitor charge and diverts it all to the front shield facing. This is an instantaneous command with no lasting effects on any of the ship's systems involved.
entries.droidcommand_shieldemergencyrear: This program immediately leeches the majority of front shield energy and current weapon capacitor charge and diverts it all to the rear shield facing. This is an instantaneous command with no lasting effects on any of the ship's systems involved.
entries.droidcommand_shieldfronttobackeighty: Divert most of the stored charge from the front shields to the rear.
entries.droidcommand_shieldfronttobackfifty: Divert some of the stored charge from the front shields to the rear.
entries.droidcommand_shieldfronttobackhundred: Divert all of the stored charge from the front shields to the rear.
entries.droidcommand_shieldfronttobacktwenty: Divert some of the stored charge from the front shields to the rear.
entries.droidcommand_shieldnormalize: Resets shields back to their defaults.
entries.droidcommand_weapcapequalize: Resets the weapon capacitor energy settings back to their defaults.
