entries.drool: /drool: You drool incessantly, creating a small puddle at your feet. /drool self: You drool all over yourself. /drool target: You drool all over (him, her, or it).
entries.duck: /duck: You duck! /duck self: Quack! Quack! /duck target: You duck behind (target name).
entries.duel: This command will allow you to engage a player in combat, if they desire to.  Be warned, if you duel somebody before they duel you, you can not attack them until they hit you first.  A duel can be stopped if both sides use the end duel command on each other, otherwise it is to the death.
entries.dueliststance: Duelist Stance This stance grants a defensive benefit as well as reflecting a portion of the incoming damage back at the source.
entries.dueliststance_1: This enhancement to the Duelist Stance ability grants an even larger defensive benefit as well as a larger portion of the damage reflected.
entries.dumppausedcommands: Dump all pending paused or looping commands.
entries.echo: Echo some text to your chat window.
entries.echuta: /echuta: E chu ta! /echuta self: You foam at the mouth, driveling as you curse under your breath. /echuta target: You spray (target name) with spittle as you curse at (him, her, or it) in (his, her, or its) face.
entries.eek: /eek: Eek! /eek self: You take one look at yourself and exclaim "EEK!" /eek target: You look at (target name) and exclaim "EEK!"
entries.eject: Eject This command will remove you from a balcony or raised part of a building if you are unable to get to the ground.
entries.elbow: /elbow: You try to clear the immediate area about you by throwing out your elbows. /elbow self: You cringe in pain as you hit your funny bone. /elbow target: You elbow (target name) in (his, her, or its) side.
entries.electrolytedrain: Electrolyte Drain This offensive ranged medical ability causes a reduction in movement speed to the target.
entries.electrolytedrain_1: Improved Electrolyte Drain This enhancement to the Electrolyte Drain ability has a greater chance of reducing the movement speed.
entries.emboldenpets: Embolden Pets This causes your pets to become bolder, at some cost to you.
entries.embrace: /embrace: You hold your arms out offering a gentle embrace. /embrace self: You give yourself a warm embrace. /embrace target: You gently hold (target name) in your arms and give (him, her, or it) a warm embrace.
entries.en_dm_1: Snap Shot:  A high powered level 1 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_dm_2: Rapid Shot:  A high powered level 10 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_dm_3: Swift Shot:  A high powered level 22 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_dm_4: Aimed Shot:  A high powered level 42 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_dm_5: Critical Shot:  A high powered level 54 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_dm_6: Vital Shot:  A high powered level 66 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_dm_7: Debilitating Shot:  A high powered level 78 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_dm_8: Precision Shot:  A high powered level 90 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_flush_with_success_buff_package: An inspiration buff effect increasing experience earned.
entries.en_go_with_the_flow_buff_package: An inspiration buff effect that increases movement rate.
entries.en_harvest_faire_buff_package: An inspiration buff effect that increases the number of resources collected while using harvesters.
entries.en_healer_buff_package: An inspiration buff effect that increases healing potency.
entries.en_holographic_image: Create Holographic Backup Image: A level 26 command that calls 1 Holographic backup image to perform with the Entertainer.
entries.en_holographic_recall: Holographic Recall: Destroys all of your Holographic Backup Images.
entries.en_project_will_0: Project Will 1: A level 18 H2H attack with extended range of 20m.
entries.en_project_will_1: Project Will 2: A level 30 H2H attack with extended range of 20m.
entries.en_project_will_2: Project Will 3: A level 42 H2H attack with extended range of 20m.
entries.en_project_will_3: Project Will 4: A level 54 H2H attack with extended range of 20m.
entries.en_project_will_4: Project Will 5: A level 66 H2H attack with extended range of 20m.
entries.en_project_will_5: Project Will 6: A level 78 H2H attack with extended range of 20m.
entries.en_project_will_6: Project Will 7: A level 90 H2H attack with extended range of 20m.
entries.en_second_chance_buff_package: An inspiration buff effect giving the recipient a chance to automatically heal when struck in combat.
entries.en_sh_1: First Aid: A level 34 self-healing ability that recovers some health.
entries.en_sh_2: Remedy: A level 58 self-healing ability that recovers some health.
entries.en_sh_3: Treatment: A level 82 self-healing ability that recovers some health.
entries.en_spiral_kick_0: Spiral Kick 1: A level 34 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and snares the target.
entries.en_spiral_kick_1: Spiral Kick 2: A level 48 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and snares the target.
entries.en_spiral_kick_2: Spiral Kick 3: A level 62 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and snares the target.
entries.en_spiral_kick_3: Spiral Kick 4: A level 76 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and snares the target.
entries.en_spiral_kick_4: Spiral Kick 5: A level 90 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and snares the target.
entries.en_strike_0: Strike 1: A level 10 basic H2H attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_strike_1: Strike 2: A level 22 basic H2H attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_strike_2: Strike 3: A level 34 basic H2H attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_strike_3: Strike 4: A level 46 basic H2H attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_strike_4: Strike 5: A level 58 basic H2H attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_strike_5: Strike 6: A level 70 basic H2H attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_strike_6: Strike 7: A level 82 basic H2H attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.en_sweeping_pirouette_0: Sweeping Pirouette 1: A level 26 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and roots the target.
entries.en_sweeping_pirouette_1: Sweeping Pirouette 2: A level 38 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and roots the target.
entries.en_sweeping_pirouette_2: Sweeping Pirouette 3: A level 50 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and roots the target.
entries.en_sweeping_pirouette_3: Sweeping Pirouette 4: A level 62 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and roots the target.
entries.en_sweeping_pirouette_4: Sweeping Pirouette 5: A level 74 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and roots the target.
entries.en_sweeping_pirouette_5: Sweeping Pirouette 6: A level 86 H2H attack that causes bonus damage and roots the target.
entries.en_thrill: Thrill: A level 10 ability that thrills the target.  A thrilled target is more likely to do glancing blows on all attacks.
entries.en_unhealthy_fixation: Unhealthy Fixation: A level 26 ability that causes the target to fixate on the Entertainer and thus be rooted and stunned for the duration.
entries.en_void_dance: Void Dance: Makes all incoming attacks have a 30% chance to be a glancing blow for 10 seconds.
entries.encourage: /encourage: Go Team Go!! /encourage self: You can do it! /encourage target: You encourage (him, her, or it).
entries.endduel: This command disallows you from attacking the other party in a duel.  If both parties select this command, a duel is ended.
entries.endorphineinjection: Endorphine Injection This medical enhancement ability allows the temporary enhancement of the Action pool.
entries.endorphineinjection_1: Improved Endorphin Injection This enhancement to the Endorphin Injection ability grants a larger amount of Action enhanced as well as a small boost to Action regeneration rate.
entries.enragepets: Enrage Pets This command causes all of your pets to go berserk for a time, causing more damage but also taking more.
entries.entrench: Entrenchment Increases your combat defenses for a period of time thus decreasing the amount of damage you take.
entries.entrench_1: Improved Entrenchment Increases your combat defenses for a period of time thus decreasing the amount of damage you take.
entries.entrench_2: Advanced Entrenchment Increases your combat defenses for a period of time thus decreasing the amount of damage you take.
entries.epulse1: /epulse1: This command triggers an energy discharge that can damage nearby vessels.  This command will not target PvP players.
entries.epulse2: /epulse2: This command triggers a tuned energy pulse that can damage nearby vessels, and is likely to cause subsystem damage to them as well.  This command will not target PvP players.
entries.epulse3: /epulse3: This command triggers an indiscriminant massive energy discharge from the shields and energy capacitor that is quite likely to damage all nearby vessels and their subsystems.  This command will not target PvP players.
entries.equilibrium: Equilibrium Equalizes all three pool attributes to the same value. If the equalize value is greater than the pool's maximum, the value is truncated to the pools maximum.
entries.eshields: Emergency Power to Shields Vastly increases shield protection for a short period of time by diverting power from other systems such as weapons and engines to shields, to the point of disabling some of them.
entries.ethrust: Emergency Power to Engines  Vastly increases engine thrust for a short period of time by diverting power from other systems such as weapons and shields to the engines, to the point of disabling some of them.
entries.evilgrin: /evilgrin: You crack an evil grin. /evilgrin self: You grin evilly at your thoughts. /evilgrin target: You flash a wicked grin at (target name).
entries.eweapons: Emergency Power to Weapons Vastly increases weapon power for a short period of time by diverting power from other systems such as shielding and engines to weapons, to the point of disabling some of them.
entries.exhausted: /exhausted: You collapse to the ground exhausted. /exhausted self: You signal that you are absolutely exhausted. /exhausted target: You inform (target name) that you are exhausted and must rest.
entries.extinguishfire: Extinguish Fire This medical ability allows for the possibility of curing an ally near the doctor who is on fire.
entries.extinguishfire_1: Improved Extinguish Fire This enhancement to the Extinguish Fire ability has a much greater chance of extinguishing flames.
entries.eyebrow: /eyebrow: You raise an eyebrow. /eyebrow self: You raise an eyebrow at yourself. /eyebrow target: You raise an eyebrow at (him, her, or it). What is (he, she or it) up to?
entries.eyeroll: /eyeroll: You roll your eyes. /eyeroll self: You roll your eyes and they fall back into your skull. /eyeroll target: You rolls your eyes at (target name).
entries.eyeshot: Eye Shot This ranged attack causes a targeted hit to the head and has a high probability of blinding them severely reducing their accuracy.
entries.eyeshot_1: Improved Eyeshot This enhancement to the Eye Shot ability has a higher chance of blinding a target.
entries.faint: /faint: You faint. /faint self: You look pale, as if about to faint. /faint target: You faint into (his, her, or its) arms.
entries.false: /false: You believe that is false. /false self: On second thought, you don't believe what you just said is true. /false target: You refuse to believe what (he, she or it) is saying.
entries.fanfar: This ability allows you to play songs with the Fanfar instrument.
entries.fanshot: Fan Shot This ranged attack uses several shots in quick succession to hit multiple targets in a tight cone in front of you.
entries.fanshot_1: Improved Fan Shot This enhancement of the Fan Shot ability increases the amount of damage done.
entries.faq: /faq: You direct everyone to the FAQ. /faq self: You reference the FAQ. /faq target: You direct (target name) to the FAQ.
entries.fastblast: Fast Blast This ranged attack uses a series of quick shots to cause damage to multiple areas on an opponent.
entries.fastblast_1: Improved Fast Blast This enhancement to the Fast Blast ability increases the amount of damage done.
entries.fastblast_2: Advanced Fast Blast This enhancement to the Fast Blast ability increases the amount of damage done.
entries.fear: /fear: You tremble with fear. /fear self: You become paralyzed with fear. /fear target: You scream in terror at the sight of (him, her, or it).
entries.featuredsolo: Featured Solo Performs a featured solo spot light effect.
entries.feel: /feel: You feel blindly at your surroundings. /feel self: You feel about yourself, checking for holes. /feel target: You feel (his, her, or its) bicep. What do you think?
entries.feh: /feh: FEH! /feh self: You look at the condition of your gear and exclaim, "FEH!" /feh target: You look disgustedly at (target name) and utter, "FEH!"
entries.feigndeath: Feign Death This command allows the smuggler the ability to pretend he has been incapacitated.  Enemies might just leave the smuggler alone...
entries.fence: Fence Items: Your connection to the shifty underworld of the Empire allows you to contact a Fence and sell items from anywhere.
entries.fiddle: /fiddle: You fiddle with random objects. /fiddle self: You pull a puzzle cube from your pack and fiddle with it. /fiddle target: You fiddle with (target name)'s gear.
entries.fidget: /fidget: You fidget restlessly. /fidget self: You fidget restlessly in anticipation. /fidget target: You fidget restlessly at (target name).
entries.find: Find Helps you locate various points of interest within a city
entries.fireacidcone1: This ranged area attack splashes acid in a cone in front of the player, damaging multiple opponents at once with its terrifying onslaught.
entries.fireacidcone2: This powerful ranged area attack splashes acid in a cone in front of the player, damaging multiple opponents at once with its terrifying onslaught.  This is more powerful than Acid Cone 1.
entries.fireacidsingle1: This ranged attack douses a target in acid, causing high amounts of damage.
entries.fireacidsingle2: This powerful ranged attack douses a target in acid, causing very high damage.  This is more powerful than Acid Single 1.
entries.firearmstrike: Firearm Strike This melee attack with your ranged weapon is useful for close encounters.
entries.firearmstrike_1: Improved Fire Arm Strike This enhancement to the Firearm Strike ability does more damage.
entries.firearmstrike_2: Advanced Fire Arm Strike This enhancement to the Firearm Strike ability does more damage.
entries.fireheavyweapon: This command allows the user to fire a heavy weapon.
entries.firejet: Fire Jet Performs a fire effect.
entries.firejet2: FireJet 2 Performs a fire jet column effect.
entries.firelightningcone1: This ranged area attack fires a cone in front of the player, damaging multiple opponents at once with a huge electrical blast.
entries.firelightningcone2: This powerful ranged area attack fires in a cone in front of the player, damaging multiple opponents at once with a huge electrical blast.  This is more powerful than Lightning Cone 1.
entries.firelightningsingle1: This ranged attack blasts a target with a high jolt of electricity, causing good damage.
entries.firelightningsingle2: This powerful ranged attack blast a target with a big jolt of electricity, causing high damage.  This is more powerful than Lightning Single 1.
entries.firstaid: Firstaid This Medic ability lets you stop a target's bleeding.
entries.fish: This command allows the user to fish.
entries.fistpalm: /fistpalm: You pound your fist into your palm. Curses! /fistpalm self: You slam your palm with your fist, muttering under your breath. /fistpalm target: You slam your palm with your fist, muttering under your breath about (target name)'s idiocy.
entries.fizz: This ability allows you to play songs with the Fizzz instrument.
entries.flail: /flail: You flail wildly. /flail self: You flail wildly at yourself, as if trying to get something off your body. /flail target: You flail wildly at (target name).
entries.flame: /flame: You take a deep breath and exhale verbal flames everywhere. /flame self: You put on your flame-proof suit. /flame target: You verbally flame (target name).
entries.flamecone1: This ranged area attack envelops a number of multiple opponents at once with a large sheet of flame.
entries.flamecone2: This powerful ranged area attack envelops a number of multiple opponents at once with a horrifying sheet of flame.  This attack causes more damage than Flame Cone 1.
entries.flamesingle1: This ranged attack sends a blast of flame towards a single target and does considerable damage.
entries.flamesingle2: This powerful ranged attack sends a blast of flame towards a target, causing high damage once it strikes.  This is more powerful than Flame Single 1.
entries.flee: /flee: FLEE!! /flee self: Time to flee? /flee target: GO! RUN AWAY! FLEE!!
entries.flex: /flex: You flex your muscles. /flex self: You flex your bicep and secretly push it up with your other hand. /flex target: You flex for (him, her, or it).
entries.flip: /flip: You flip a coin. /flip self: You flip head-over-heels. /flip target: You flip head-over-heels for (target name).
entries.flipcoin: /flipcoin: You flip a coin. /flipcoin self: You flip a coin. /flipcoin target: You flip (target name) for it.
entries.flirt: /flirt: You flirt with danger. /flirt self: You flirt with yourself. A little self-involved are we? /flirt target: You flirt with (him, her, or it).
entries.floorlights: Floor Lights Performs a lighted dance floor effect.
entries.flourish: This command allows the user to flourish.
entries.flourish+1: Perform the first of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flourish+2: Perform the second of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flourish+3: Perform the third of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flourish+4: Perform the fourth of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flourish+5: Perform the fifth of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flourish+6: Perform the sixth of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flourish+7: Perform the seventh of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flourish+8: Perform the eighth of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flourish+9: Perform the ninth of your Dance or Music Flourishes.
entries.flower: /flower: You pull a delicate flower from your pack and hold it gently. /flower self: You inhale deeply trying to smell the flower's sweet scent. /flower target: You give a delicate flower to (target name).
entries.flurryshot1: This ranged attack can make a single target dizzy.
entries.flurryshot2: This ranged attack can make multiple targets dizzy at once.
entries.flushingshot1: This ranged attack ability allows you to attempt to startle and stun a single opponent simultaneously.
entries.flushingshot2: This ranged area attack ability allows you to attempt to startle and stun multiple opponents simultaneously.
entries.flutedroopy: This ability allows you to play songs with the Chidinkalu Horn instrument.
entries.flutter: /flutter: Your heart flutters wildly. /flutter self: Your heart flutters wildly as you clench your chest hand-over-hand. /flutter target: Your heart flutters at the sight of (him, her, or it).
entries.focusfire: Focus Fire Decreases the width of the cone for all area effect weapons while simultaneously increasing the damage slightly within the affected area.
entries.focusfire_1: Improved Focus Fire Decreases the width of the cone for all area effect weapons while simultaneously increasing the damage within the affected area.
entries.focusfire_2: Advanced Focus Fire Decreases the width of the cone for all area effect weapons while simultaneously increasing the damage significantly within the affected area.
entries.follow: This allows you to automatically follow somebody without having to control your character.
entries.fool: /fool: You look around for your FOOL brand. /fool self: You brand yourself the fool. /fool target: You brand (target name) as the FOOL!
entries.forage: Forage Searches the area for anything useful.
entries.forceabsorb: Force Absorb This ability allows a Jedi to absorb some of the Force power from an incoming Force attack and feeds a portion into your Force pool.
entries.forceabsorb1: Advanced Force Absorb This ability allows a Jedi to absorb some of the Force power from an incoming Force attack and feeds a portion into your Force pool.
entries.forceabsorb2: This ability allows a Jedi to absorb some of the Force power from an incoming Force attack and feeds a portion into your Force pool.  This ability will absorb more Force power than Force Absorb 1.
entries.forceabsorb_1: Improved Force Absorb This enhancement to the Force Absorb ability will absorb more Force power.
entries.forcearmor: Force Armor This ability allows a Jedi to create a protective barrier around themselves that will stop a portion of incoming damage.  This ability will only stop non Force damage types.
entries.forcearmor1: This ability allows a Jedi to create a protective barrier around themselves that will stop a portion of incoming damage.  This ability will only stop non Force damage types.
entries.forcearmor2: This ability allows a Jedi to create a protective barrier around themselves that will stop a significant portion of incoming damage.  This ability will only stop non Force damage types.
entries.forcearmor_1: Improved Force Armor This enhancement to the Force Armor ability will stop more damage and is more Force efficient.
entries.forceaura: Force Aura This ability allows a Jedi to focus on avoiding combat blows.
entries.forceaura_1: Improved Force Aura This enhancement to the Force Aura ability allows the Jedi to better avoid enemy attacks.
entries.forcebreach: Force Breach This ability allows a Jedi to break the concentration of a target Jedi eliminating all of the target's Force buffs.
entries.forcechoke: Force Choke This ability allows a Jedi to use the Force to constrict the air passage of the target, doing a considerable amount of damage.
entries.forcecloak: Force Cloak This ability allows a Jedi to cloud the minds of those nearby into not seeing the Jedi.  This ability will cause considerable drain on Force if there are multiple players or mobs in the area.
entries.forcecuredisease: Force Cure Disease Cures the target of any disease state effects.
entries.forcecurepoison: Force Cure Poison Cures the target of any poison state effects.
entries.forceextinguish: Force Extinguish This ability allows a Jedi the possibility of curing themselves or an ally near the Jedi who is on fire.
entries.forceextinguish_1: Improved Force Extinguish This enhancement to the Force Extinguish ability has a much greater chance of extinguishing flames.
entries.forcefeedback: Force Feedback This ability causes a Jedi to reflect damage immediately back to the source of the attack, only Force type attacks will cause feedback.
entries.forcefeedback1: This ability causes a Jedi to reflect damage immediately back to the source of the attack, only Force type attacks will cause feedback.
entries.forcefeedback2: This ability causes a Jedi to reflect damage immediately back to the source of the attack, only Force type attacks will cause feedback. This ability reflects back a greater amount of damage from a Force attack than Force Feedback 1.
entries.forcefeedback_1: Improved Force Feedback This enhancement to the Force Feedback ability reflects back a greater amount of damage from a Force attack.
entries.forcefocus: Force Focus Focuses the power of the Force within yourself, allowing you increase the amount of damage you can do to your enemy for a period of time.
entries.forcefocus_1: Honed Force Focus Focuses the power of the Force within yourself, allowing you increase the amount of damage you can do to your enemy for a period of time.
entries.forcefocus_2: Greater Force Focus Focuses the power of the Force within yourself, allowing you increase the amount of damage you can do to your enemy for a period of time.
entries.forceheal: Force Heal The Jedi uses the Force to heal a moderate amount of damage to the Jedi's target.
entries.forceheal_1: Improved Force3 Heal This enhancement to the Force Heal ability increases the amount of health healed.
entries.forceheal_2: Advanced Forceheal This enhancement to the Force Heal ability increases the amount of health healed.
entries.forcehit: Force Hit This is the most basic ranged Force attack with very low damage potential and very low Force cost.
entries.forceinfusion: Force Infusion This heal over time ability allows a Jedi to heal themselves and others who are nearby.  The heal gradually heals the target over a small period of time.
entries.forceinfusion_1: Improved Force Infusion This enhancement to the Force Infusion ability increases the amount of healing.
entries.forceintimidate: Force Intimidate Causes all enemies within a cone emanating from the Jedi to become intimidated.
entries.forceintimidate1: Causes all enemies within a cone emanating from the Jedi to become intimidated.
entries.forceintimidate2: Causes all enemies within a 16-meter radius around the target to become intimidated.
entries.forceintimidate_1: Improved Force Intimidate This enhancement to the Force Intimidate ability causes all enemies within a 16-meter radius around the target to become intimidated.
entries.forceknockdown: Force Knockdown This attack allows a Jedi to release a kinetic burst from his or her palm. This will not damage the target but it is enough to knock them down.
entries.forceknockdown1: This attack allows a Jedi to release a kinetic burst from his or her palm. This will not damage the target but it is enough to knock them down.
entries.forceknockdown2: This attack allows a Jedi to release a large kinetic burst from his or her palm. This will knock down multiple targets in a cone emanating from the Jedi, but will not do any damage.
entries.forceknockdown3: This attack allows a Jedi to release a large kinetic burst from his or her palm. This will knock down multiple targets in the area, but will not do any damage.
entries.forceknockdown_1: Improved Force Knockdown This enhancement to the Force Knockdown ability will knock down multiple targets in a cone emanating from the Jedi, but will not do any damage.
entries.forceknockdown_2: Advanced Force Knockdown This enhancement to the Force Knockdown ability will knock down multiple targets in the area, but will not do any damage.
entries.forcelightning: Force Lightning This attack allows a Jedi to direct an arc of electricity to the target.
entries.forcelightning_1: Improved Force Lightning This enhancement to the Force Lightning ability will inflict more damage.
entries.forcelightningarea: Force Lightning Area This attack allows a Jedi to direct a fork of lightning to hit multiple targets.
entries.forcelightningarea_1: Improved Force Lightning Area This enhancement to the Force Lightning Area ability will inflict more damage.
entries.forcelightningcone1: This attack allows a Jedi to direct a fork of lightning to hit multiple targets.
entries.forcelightningcone2: This attack allows a Jedi to direct a lightning strike against a multitude of targets. While doing more damage than Force Lightning Cone 1, this attack also has a chance of causing all targets struck by the lightning to become dizzy.
entries.forcelightningsingle1: This attack allows a Jedi to direct an arc of electricity to the target.
entries.forcelightningsingle2: This attack allows a Jedi to direct a bolt of lightning towards the target. This has a chance of stunning the target as well as doing more damage than Force Lightning Single 1.
entries.forcemeditate: Force Meditate This ability allows a Jedi to enter a state where their stored Force power can replenish faster than normal.  A Jedi is very vulnerable while in this meditative state. This command must be executed while the Jedi is sitting on the ground.
entries.forceofwill: Force of Will This meditative art allows the incapacitated user to attempt to channel their mental energies back into their conscious mind thereby returning the user to an activate state much sooner than normally attainable.
entries.forceresistbleeding: Force Resist Bleeding This ability allows a Jedi to use their Force power to increase their body's natural resistance to bleeding.
entries.forceresistdisease: Force Resist Disease This ability allows a Jedi to use their Force power to increase their body's natural resistance to diseases.
entries.forceresistpoison: Force Resist Poison This ability allows a Jedi to use their Force power to increase their body's natural resistance to poisons.
entries.forceresiststates: Force Resist States This ability allows a Jedi to use their Force power to increase their body's natural resistance to various state attacks such as Stun, Blind, and Dizziness.
entries.forcerun: Force Run: This level 18 ability increases your run speed for a short duration and removes most snare or root effects currently affecting you.  Force Run also attempts to grant you immunity to further snares or roots while active.
entries.forcerun1: Increases your run speed for a short duration.
entries.forcerun2: Increases your run speed for a short duration. This ability allows you to run faster than with Force Run 1.
entries.forcerun3: Increases your run speed for a short duration. This ability allows you to run with blinding speed.
entries.forcerun_1: Improved Force Run This enhancement to the Force Run ability will make you run faster.
entries.forcerun_2: Advanced Force Run This enhancement to the Force Run ability will make you run faster.
entries.forcesap: Force Sap This ability allows a Jedi to reduce the mind and action regeneration of the target.
entries.forcesap_1: Improved Force Sap This enhancement to the Force Sap ability will cause a much greater reduction of regeneration rates to the target.
entries.forceshield: Force Shield This ability allows a Jedi to create a barrier around themselves that will stop a portion of incoming Force attacks.
entries.forceshield1: This ability allows a Jedi to create a barrier around themselves that will stop a portion of incoming Force attacks.
entries.forceshield2: This ability allows a Jedi to create a barrier around themselves that will stop a significant portion of incoming Force attacks.  This ability will stop more damage than Force Shield 1.
entries.forceshield_1: Improved Force Shield This enhancement to the Force Shield ability will stop an increased amount of incoming Force attacks.
entries.forceshock: Force Shock This ability allows a Jedi to reduce their target's state defenses.
entries.forceshock_1: Improved Force Shock This enhancement to the Force Shock ability will increase amount of reduction to the target's state defenses.
entries.forcespeed: Force Speed This ability allows a Jedi to perform all combat actions faster than normal.
entries.forcespeed1: This ability allows a Jedi to perform all combat actions faster than normal.
entries.forcespeed2: This ability allows a Jedi to perform all combat actions much faster than normal.  This ability allows the Jedi to move faster than with Force Speed 1.
entries.forcespeed_1: Improved Force Speed This enhancement to the Force Speed ability will further increase the combat speed of the Jedi.
entries.forcestrike: Force Strike Channels the power of the Force to increase the effectiveness of your attack.
entries.forcestrike_1: Honed Force Strike Channels the power of the Force to increase the effectiveness of your attack.
entries.forcestrike_2: Greater Force Strike Channels the power of the Force to increase the effectiveness of your attack.
entries.forcesuppression: Force Suppression This attack allows a Jedi to suppress an opponent's movement and stop them in place for a very short time.
entries.forcesuppression_1: Improved Force Suppression This enhancement to the Force Suppression ability increases the amount of time an opponent is stopped from moving.
entries.forcethrow: Force Throw: A level 4 ranged attack that hurls the currently equipped melee weapon and uses the Force to return it to the wielder.
entries.forcethrow1: This attack allows a Jedi to throw nearby dirt and rocks at the target, causing a stunned state.
entries.forcethrow2: This attack allows a Jedi to throw nearby dirt and rocks at the target, and will very likely hit any enemies that are standing near the target, causing a stunned state.
entries.forcethrow_1: Improved Force Throw This enhancement to the Force Throw ability will very likely hit any enemies that are standing near the target, causing a stunned state.
entries.forcevalor: Force Valor This ability allows a Jedi to go into a defensive stance and block much of incoming ranged attacks at the cost of severely reducing their damage capabilities.
entries.forcevalor_1: Improved Force Valor This enhancement to the Force Valor ability increases the amount of ranged attacks blocked.
entries.forcewave: Force Wave This attack allows a Jedi to slow the target's movement rate for a short period of time.
entries.forcewave_1: Improved Force Wave This enhancement to the Force Wave ability increases the amount of time an opponent's movement speed is reduced.
entries.forceweaken: Force Weaken This ability allows a Jedi to debilitate his or her opponent, making the target more vulnerable to attack.
entries.forceweaken1: This ability allows a Jedi to debilitate his or her opponent, making the target more vulnerable to attack.
entries.forceweaken2: This ability allows a Jedi to severely debilitate his or her opponent, making the target more vulnerable to attack. This ability is more powerful than Force Weaken 1.
entries.forceweaken_1: Improved Force Weaken This enhancement to the Force Weaken ability will make the target much more vulnerable to attack.
entries.forcewoundheal: Force Wound Heal This ability allows a Jedi to heal a moderate amount of Health wounds.
entries.forcewoundheal_1: Improved Force Wound Heal This enhancement to the Force Wound Heal ability increases the amount of wounds healed.
entries.formup: Form Up This group ability increases the movement speed of all group members.  Only one group enhancement can be active at time.
entries.frown: /frown: You frown. /frown self: You frown at yourself. /frown target: You frown at (him, her, or it).
entries.fs_ae_dm_cc_1: Force Shock: Channel the Force into an electric shock that sends electricity burning through your opponent.  Weaker attack: Force Spark
entries.fs_ae_dm_cc_2: Force Bolt: A stronger shock attack with the Force that sends a bolt of electricity coursing through your opponent.  Weaker attacks: Force Spark and Force Shock
entries.fs_ae_dm_cc_3: Force Lightning: A strong Force attack that sends a lightning strike against your opponent.  Weaker attacks: Force Spark, Force Shock, and Force Bolt
entries.fs_ae_dm_cc_4: Force Storm: This surge of Force power shreds your opponent's Central Nervous System, causing tremendous damage.  Weaker attacks: Force Spark, Force Shock, Force Bolt, and Force Lightning
entries.fs_ae_dm_cc_5: Force Tempest: This surge of Force power shreds your opponent's Central Nervous System, causing tremendous damage.  Weaker attacks: Force Spark, Force Shock, Force Bolt, Force Lightning, and Force Storm.
entries.fs_ae_dm_cc_6: Force Hurricane: This surge of Force power shreds your opponent's Central Nervous System, causing tremendous damage.  Weaker attacks: Force Spark, Force Shock, Force Bolt, Force Lightning, Force Storm, and Force Tempest.
entries.fs_buff_ca_1: Jedi Focus: Activates all Jedi Focus combat statistics.
entries.fs_buff_ca_2: Makashi Focus: A level 14 increase to combat statistics.
entries.fs_buff_ca_3: Djem So Focus: A level 30 increase to combat statistics.
entries.fs_buff_ca_4: Sokan Focus: A level 46 increase to combat statistics.
entries.fs_buff_ca_5: Juyo Focus: A level 62 increase to combat statistics.
entries.fs_buff_ca_6: Vaapad Focus: A level 90 increase to combat statistics.
entries.fs_buff_def_1_1: Jedi Stance: Activates all Jedi Stance combat statistics.
entries.fs_buff_def_1_2: Shii-Cho Stance: A level 22 defensive stance that increases defensive statistics.
entries.fs_buff_def_1_3: Niman Stance: A level 38 defensive stance that increases defensive statistics.
entries.fs_buff_def_1_4: Makashi Stance: A level 54 defensive stance that increases defensive statistics.
entries.fs_buff_def_1_5: Soresu Stance: A level 70 defensive stance that increases defensive statistics.
entries.fs_buff_def_1_6: Shien Stance: A level 86 defensive stance that increases defensive statistics.
entries.fs_buff_def_2_1: Shii-Cho Stance: A defense stance that increases the chance to block or dodge incoming attacks, providing a level 46 defense.
entries.fs_buff_def_2_2: Niman Stance: A defense stance that increases the chance to block or dodge incoming attacks, providing a level 70 defense.
entries.fs_buff_def_2_3: Soresu Stance: A defense stance that increases the chance to block or dodge incoming attacks, providing a level 86 defense.
entries.fs_buff_invis_1: Force Cloak: This ability allows invisibility for a duration of time.  With Improved Force Cloak, Jedi can escape combat.
entries.fs_dm_1: Shiim Strike: A high-powered, level 1, melee attack that deals extra damage.
entries.fs_dm_2: Cho sun Strike: A high-powered, level 18, melee attack that deals extra damage.  Weaker Strike attack: Shiim Strike
entries.fs_dm_2_1: Force Push: A ranged attack that causes an increase in damage.
entries.fs_dm_2_2: Saber Throw: A ranged attack that causes an increase in damage.
entries.fs_dm_2_3: Force Lightning: A ranged attack that causes an increase in damage.
entries.fs_dm_3: Shiak Strike: A high-powered, level 30, melee attack that deals extra damage.  Weaker Strike attacks: Shiim Strike and Cho sun Strike
entries.fs_dm_4: Su Strike: A high-powered, level 42, melee attack that deals extra damage.  Weaker Strike attacks: Shiim Strike, Cho sun Strike and Shiak Strike
entries.fs_dm_5: Mou kei Strike: A high-powered, level 66, melee attack that deals extra damage.  Weaker Strike attacks: Shiim Strike, Cho sun Strike, Shiak Strike and Su Strike
entries.fs_dm_6: Cho mok Strike: A high-powered, level 74, attack that deals extra damage.  Weaker Strike attacks: Shiim Strike, Cho sun Strike, Shiak Strike, Su Strike and Mou kei Strike
entries.fs_dm_7: Sai Cha Strike: A high-powered, level 90, attack that deals extra damage.  Weaker Strike attacks: Shiim Strike, Cho sun Strike, Shiak Strike, Su Strike, Mou kei Strike and Cho mok Strike
entries.fs_dm_8: Vaapad Strike: A high-powered, level 90 attack that deals extra damage.
entries.fs_dm_cc_1: Grapple: A light choke attack that damages your opponent.
entries.fs_dm_cc_2: Force Grasp: A choke attack that damages your opponent.  Weaker Choke attack: Grapple
entries.fs_dm_cc_3: Force Grip: A choking attack that causes damage to your opponent.  Weaker Choke attacks: Force Grapple and Force Grasp
entries.fs_dm_cc_4: Force Choke: A Dark Side Force attack that causes your opponent to choke and take damage.  Weaker Choke attacks: Force Grapple, Force Grasp and Force Grip
entries.fs_dm_cc_5: Force Strangle: A powerful Dark Side Force attack that damages your opponent through choking.  Weaker Choke attacks: Force Grapple, Force Grasp, Force Grip, and Force Choke
entries.fs_dm_cc_6: Force Garrote: The highest choking attack a Dark Side Jedi can use to damage an opponent.  Weaker Choke attacks: Force Grapple, Force Grasp, Force Grip, Force Choke, and Force Strangle
entries.fs_dm_cc_crit: Force Shock: A level 50 critical attack that causes damage and reduces your target's movement rate.
entries.fs_dm_cc_crit_1: Force Crumple: A crushing Force cone effect attack that causes damage to your opponents in front of you.
entries.fs_dm_cc_crit_2: Force Pummel: A crushing Force cone effect attack that causes damage to opponents in front of you.  Weaker Shockwave attack: Force Crumple
entries.fs_dm_cc_crit_3: Force Crush: A crushing Force cone effect attack that causes damage to opponents in front of you.  Weaker Shockwave attacks: Force Crumple and Force Pummel
entries.fs_dm_cc_crit_4: Force Blastwave: A blast of Force cone effect attack that causes damage to opponents in front of you.  Weaker Shockwave attacks: Force Crumple, Force Pummel and Force Crush
entries.fs_dm_cc_crit_5: Force Shockwave: A blast of Force cone effect attack that causes damage to opponents in front of you.  Weaker Shockwave attacks: Force Crumple, Force Pummel, Force Crush and Force Blastwave
entries.fs_drain_1: Force Drain 1: A force power that drains health from an opponent and adds it to your own, while in a focus. This attack cannot be parried.
entries.fs_drain_2: Force Drain 2: A force power that drains health from an opponent and adds it to your own, while in a focus. This attack cannot be parried.
entries.fs_drain_3: Force Drain 3: A force power that drains health from an opponent and adds it to your own, while in a focus. This attack cannot be parried.
entries.fs_drain_4: Force Drain 4: A force power that drains health from an opponent and adds it to your own, while in a focus. This attack cannot be parried.
entries.fs_drain_5: Force Drain 5: A force power that drains health from an opponent and adds it to your own, while in a focus. This attack cannot be parried.
entries.fs_force_maelstrom: Force Maelstrom: This Dark Force power is the strongest cone effect attack in the Force Lightning series.  Unlike its weaker forms, the surge of Force channeled by a Dark Jedi into the maelstrom strikes multiple opponents with a blast of lightning.  Weaker attacks: Force Spark, Force Shock, Force Bolt, Force Lightning, Force Storm, and Force Maelstrom
entries.fs_force_spark: Force Spark: Channel the Force into a level 7 electric spark that strikes your opponent.
entries.fs_forsake_fear: Forsake Fear: A meditative state that focuses the Force to nearby party members and yourself to regenerate action.  Combat damage does not interrupt this meditative state.
entries.fs_hermetic_touch: This ability will clear up to 5 stacks of all damage over time debuffs and make the player immune to further applications for the duration.
entries.fs_maelstrom_1: Force Maelstrom 1: A cone effect Force Lightning attack.
entries.fs_maelstrom_2: Force Maelstrom 2: A cone effect Force Lightning attack.
entries.fs_maelstrom_3: Force Maelstrom 3: A cone effect Force Lightning attack.
entries.fs_maelstrom_4: Force Maelstrom 4: A cone effect Force Lightning attack.
entries.fs_maelstrom_5: Force Maelstrom 5: A cone effect Force Lightning attack.
entries.fs_mind_trick_1: Mind Trick: A level 10 ability that briefly confuses an opponent, causing them to forget you as a threat.
entries.fs_mind_trick_2: Cloud Minds: An ability that briefly confuses opponents in the area causing them to forget you as a threat.  Weaker attack: Mind Trick
entries.fs_saber_reflect_buff: Saber Reflect allows a Jedi to return a portion of an incoming attack back on the attacker within a 64m range, for a ranged or melee attack.
entries.fs_sense_danger_1: Sense Danger: This level 70 ability gives you a chance of detecting otherwise invisible creatures and objects, such as traps.
entries.fs_set_heroic_taunt_1: Guardian Strike: This quick and relatively effortless attack causes a great deal of hate increasing the likelyhood that the target will ignore others and attack you instead. This command is only available while the 5-Piece Jedi Guardian Set Bonus is active.
entries.fs_sh_0: Calming Mind: The ability to focus your mind to cause a recharge in health for a level 14 heal.
entries.fs_sh_1: Meditate: The ability to focus your mind to cause a recharge in health for a level 34 heal.
entries.fs_sh_2: Focus of Life: This ability allows the Force Sensitive to draw on the Force to heal themself for a level 58 heal.
entries.fs_sh_3: Force Regeneration: This ability allows the Force Sensitive to draw on the Force to heal themselves with a level 82 heal.
entries.fs_sweep_1: Jung Ma: A level 10 melee attack that strikes all targets in the immediate area.
entries.fs_sweep_2: Sun djem Jung Ma: A level 22 melee attack that strikes all targets in the immediate area.
entries.fs_sweep_3: Shiak Jung Ma: A level 38 melee attack that strikes all targets in the immediate area.
entries.fs_sweep_4: Jung Su Ma: A level 46 melee attack that strikes all targets in the immediate area.
entries.fs_sweep_5: Mou kei Jung Ma: A level 54 melee attack that strikes all targets in the immediate area.
entries.fs_sweep_6: Cho mak Jung Ma: A level 68 melee attack that strikes all targets in the immediate area.
entries.fs_sweep_7: Sai tok Jung Ma: A level 82 melee attack that strikes all targets in the immediate area.
entries.fs_taunt: Force Enrage: Using the Force, you manipulate your foe into being more aggressive towards you. You must be in a Stance for this have any effect.
entries.full: /full: You pat your stomach denoting you are full. /full self: You rub your stomach, feeling overstuffed. /full target: You indicate to (target name) that you are full.
entries.fullautoarea: Full Auto This ranged attack lets loose a long burst in a wide spread in front of the attacker any opponent in the affected cone could be hit.  An automatic weapon must be used for this ability.
entries.fullautoarea1: This ranged attack can hit multiple targets in a cone in front of you simultaneously.
entries.fullautoarea2: This ranged area attack can hit multiple targets in a cone in front of you simultaneously.
entries.fullautoarea_1: Improved Full Auto Area This enhancement to the Full Auto Area ability increases the amount of damage done.
entries.fullautosingle1: This ranged attack shoots multiple bolts at once at a single target.
entries.fullautosingle2: This ranged attack shoots multiple bolts at once at a single target.
entries.fume: /fume: You fume with rage. /fume self: You fume and mouth words best left unspoken. /fume target: You fume with rage at (him, her, or it).
entries.fuzzy: /fuzzy: You get that warm and fuzzy feeling inside. /fuzzy self: You squeeze yourself with a warm and fuzzy feeling inside. /fuzzy target: (target name) makes you feel warm and fuzzy inside.
entries.gag: /gag: You gag in disgust. /gag self: You stick your finger in your mouth and make gagging sounds. /gag target: You gag in disgust at (target name).
entries.gallop: This command allows your mount to run faster for a period of time.
entries.gallopstop: This command slows down a mount.
entries.gape: /gape: You gape. /gape self: Your jaw drops and hits the ground with a resounding *THUD*. /gape target: You gape at (him, her, or it).
entries.gasp: /gasp: *GASP!* /gasp self: You gasp for air! /gasp target: *GASP!* You gasp at (target name).
entries.gawk: /gawk: Looking dumbfounded, you gawk. /gawk self: You gawk at yourself. /gawk target: You gawk at (target name).
entries.gaze: /gaze: You gaze in awe at your surroundings. /gaze self: You gaze in awe at yourself /gaze target: You gaze in awe at (him, her, or it).
entries.giggle: /giggle: HEHE! /giggle self: You giggle at yourself. /giggle target: You giggle at (him, her, or it).
entries.givetem: This command utilizes the give item option.
entries.giveup: /giveup: "I GIVE UP!" /giveup self: You shake your head and murmur "I give up..." /giveup target: Apparently, (he, she or it) is not worth the trouble. "I give up!"
entries.glare: /glare: You glare about furiously. /glare self: You glare furiously out of the corner of your eyes. /glare target: You glare at (him, her, or it).
entries.gloat: /gloat: You gloat. /gloat self: You gloat quietly to yourself. /gloat target: You gloat at (him, her, or it).
entries.glow: /glow: You glow happily. /glow self: Feeling special? /glow target: You glow and  let (him, her, or it) know how happy (he, she or it) makes you.
entries.going: /going: CHARGE!! /going self: Are you sure you wanted to do that? /going target: CHARGE!! Targeting...(target name).
entries.grantstorytellerzoningrights: Grants the target the rights to place Storyteller objects in the borders of your city.  The rights last 24 hours.   This does not allow the target the rights to place Structures within the city borders.
entries.grantzoningrights: Grants the target the rights to place a commercial structure, such as a cantina, in the borders of your city.  The rights last 24 hours.
entries.greet: /greet: You greet the passers-by. /greet self: You greet yourself. /greet target: You greet (him, her, or it).
entries.grin: /grin: You grin. /grin self: You grin at yourself. /grin target: You grin at (target name).
entries.groan: /groan: You groan loudly. /groan self: You groan at yourself. /groan target: You groan loudly at (him, her, or it).
entries.groupwaypoint: Group Waypoint Ability that allows an Officer to place a waypoint for all their group to see.
entries.grovel: /grovel: You grovel in the dirt. /grovel self: You grovel fawningly. /grovel target: You grovel at (target name)'s feet.
entries.growl: /growl: GRRRRRR! /growl self: You growl at yourself. /growl target: You growl at (him, her, or it).
entries.grumble: /grumble: You grumble. /grumble self: You grumble to yourself. /grumble target: You grumble something rude about (target name).
entries.grunt: /grunt: You grunt. /grunt self: You grunt at yourself. /grunt target: You grunt at (target name).
entries.guildremove: This command allows the user to guild remove himself.
entries.guildstatus: /guildstatus: This command allows the user to view the status of his/her guild.
entries.gulp: /gulp: *GULP!!* /gulp self: Don't choke now! /gulp target: You gulp at (target name).
entries.hack: /hack: You hack. /hack self: You hack up a furball. /hack target: You hack at (target name).
entries.hail: /hail: You hail passers-by. /hail self: You hail yourself with a handful of pebbles. /hail target: You hail (target name).
entries.halfnelson: /halfnelson: You motion as if to put someone into a half-nelson. /halfnelson self: You put yourself in a half-nelson. /halfnelson target: You put (target name) in a half-nelson. "Say uncle!"
entries.halo: /halo: You smile innocently and don your halo. /halo self: You shine your halo. /halo target: You smile at (him, her, or it) and don your halo.
entries.hand: /hand: You ask if anyone can give you a hand. /hand self: You give yourself a hand. /hand target: You give (him, her, or it) a gentle kiss on the hand.
entries.handshake: /handshake: You offer a handshake. /handshake self: You shake your own hand. /handshake target: You shake (his, her, or its) hand.
entries.harvestcorpse: /harvestcorpse <corpse>: This command allows you to withdraw Meat, Hide or Bone from a harvestable creature corpse.  Not all creatures will have all 3 of these options, and some may have none.
entries.haveconsent: This command will display everybody that has your consent to move your corpse.
entries.headache: /headache: You complain about a headache. /headache self: You grab your skull and beg the pain to stop. /headache target: You toss (him, her, or it) a couple analgesics.
entries.headhit: Head Hit This melee attack causes a targeted hit to the head and has a slight accuracy penalty.
entries.headhit_1: Improved Head Hit This enhancement to the Head Hit ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.headhit_2: Advanced Head Hit This enhancement to the Head Hit ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.headlock: /headlock: You demonstrate the proper headlock technique. /headlock self: You put yourself in a headlock. /headlock target: You put (target name) in a headlock.
entries.headshot: Head Shot This ranged attack causes a targeted hit to the head and has a slight accuracy penalty.
entries.headshot1: This ranged targets an opponent's head in order to damage their Mind pool.
entries.headshot2: This ranged attack targets an opponent's head in order to damage their Mind pool.
entries.headshot3: This powerful ranged attack targets an opponent's head in order to devastate their Mind pool.
entries.headshot_1: Improved Head Shot This enhancement to the Head Shot ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.headshot_2: Advanced Head Shot This enhancement to the Head Shot ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.healactionself1: Repairs a moderate amount of your Action damage.
entries.healactionself2: Repairs a large amount of your Action damage.
entries.healactionwoundother1: Heals a moderate amount of the target player's Action wounds.
entries.healactionwoundother2: Heals a large amount of the target player's Action wounds.
entries.healactionwoundself1: Heals a moderate amount of your Action wounds.
entries.healactionwoundself2: Heals a large amount of your Action wounds.
entries.healallother1: Repairs a moderate amount of damage to all of the target player's Health, Action, and Mind pools.
entries.healallother2: Repairs a large amount of damage to all of the target player's Health, Action, and Mind pools.
entries.healallself1: Repairs a moderate amount of damage to all of your Health, Action, and Mind pools.
entries.healallself2: Repairs a large amount of damage to all of your Health, Action, and Mind pools.
entries.healbattlefatigueother1: Removes a moderate amount of the target player's Battle Fatigue.
entries.healbattlefatigueother2: Removes a large amount of the target player's Battle Fatigue.
entries.healbattlefatigueself1: Removes a moderate amount of your Battle Fatigue.
entries.healbattlefatigueself2: Removes a large amount of your Battle Fatigue.
entries.healdamage: Heal Damage This command will heal damaged stat pools, if you have the requisite skills and medicine.
entries.healenhance: Heal Enhance This command enables you to enhance another player's attributes, if you have the appropriate enhancement medpacks handy.
entries.healhealthself1: Repairs a moderate amount of your Health damage.
entries.healhealthself2: Repairs a large amount of your Health damage.
entries.healhealthwoundother1: Heals a moderate amount of the target player's Health wounds.
entries.healhealthwoundother2: Heals a large amount of the target player's Health wounds.
entries.healhealthwoundself1: Heals a moderate amount of your Health wounds.
entries.healhealthwoundself2: Heals a large amount of your Health wounds.
entries.healmind: Heal Mind This command heals mind pool damage at the cost of wounds to the medic.
entries.healmindself1: Repairs a moderate amount of your Mind damage.
entries.healmindself2: Repairs a large amount of your Mind damage.
entries.healmindwoundother1: Heals a moderate amount of the target player's Mind wounds.
entries.healmindwoundother2: Heals a large amount of the target player's Mind wounds.
entries.healmindwoundself1: Heals a moderate amount of your Mind wounds.
entries.healmindwoundself2: Heals a large amount of your Mind wounds.
entries.healstate: Heal State This command allows you to cure states (Dizzy, Stun, Blind, Intimidated, etc.) on a target, if you have the appropriate medical equipment.
entries.healstates: Heal States Removes all of your negative state effects such as Stun, Blind, Intimidate, and Dizziness.
entries.healstatesother: Heal States Other Removes all negative state effects such as Stun, Blind, Intimidate, and Dizziness from the target player.
entries.healstatesself: Heal States Self Removes all of your negative state effects such as Stun, Blind, Intimidate, and Dizziness.
entries.healthhit: This melee attack does no damage but reduces an opponent's Health Ability points.
entries.healthshot: This ranged attack does no damage but reduces an opponent's Health Ability points.
entries.healthshot1: This ranged attack can wreak havoc with a target's Health pool drain and regeneration rates.
entries.healthshot2: This advanced ranged attack can wreak havoc with a target's Health pool drain and regeneration rates.  This is a stronger attack than Health Shot 1.
entries.healwound: Heal Wound This healing command will heal wounded stat pools, if you have the requisite skill.
entries.healwound_1: This enhancement to the Heal Wounds ability will allow the healing of more wounds.
entries.healwound_2: This enhancement to the Heal Wounds ability will allow the healing of more wounds.
entries.hearnoevil: /hearnoevil: You cover your ears. /hearnoevil self: You stare blankly forward with your hands over your ears. /hearnoevil target: You cover your ears and try to block (him, her, or it) out. LA LA LA LA LA LA.
entries.help: /help: HELP! /help self: You help yourself. /help target: You look to (him, her, or it) for help.
entries.helpme: /helpme:  HELP! /helpme self:  You help yourself. /helpme target:  You look to (him, her, or it) for help.
entries.hemorrhage: Hemorrhage This offensive ranged medical ability causes a reduction in the action regeneration of the target.
entries.hemorrhage_1: Improved Hemorrhage This enhancement to the Hemorrhage ability has a greater chance of reducing the action regeneration.
entries.hero: /hero: You look for a hero to save you. /hero self: You are your own greatest hero! /hero target: MY HERO! You proclaim (target name) as your hero.
entries.hi5: /hi5: You hold your hand up to give a high-five. /hi5 self: You give yourself high-five. /hi5 target: You give (him, her, or it) a high-five. YEAH!
entries.hiccup: /hiccup: You hiccup. /hiccup self: You hiccup strongly and get a bitter-sour taste in your mouth. /hiccup target: You hiccup and beg (target name) for help to get rid of them.
entries.highyield: High Yield This enhancement increases the damage output of a single target.
entries.hipshot: Hip Shot This lightning fast move stuns your opponent for a short period of time during which they cannot perform any action.  Causing damage to your target while they are in this state breaks the stun.
entries.hipshot_1: Improved Hip Shot This lightning fast move stuns your opponent for a short period of time during which they cannot perform any action.  Causing damage to your target while they are in this state breaks the stun.
entries.hipshot_2: Advanced Hip Shot This lightning fast move stuns your opponent for a short period of time during which they cannot perform any action.  Causing damage to your target while they are in this state breaks the stun.
entries.hiss: /hiss: You hiss. /hiss self: You hiss under your breath. /hiss target: You hiss at (target name).
entries.hobble: /hobble: You hobble. /hobble self: You hobble about in circles. /hobble target: You hobble about (target name).
entries.holdon: /holdon: You hold on for dear life. /holdon self: You hold onto yourself. Need a security blanket? /holdon target: You hold onto (him, her, or it), not letting go!
entries.hop: /hop: You hop around. /hop self: You hop on one foot. /hop target: You hop around (target name).
entries.hose: /hose: You hose everyone down. /hose self: You hose yourself down. Take it easy there! /hose target: You help (target name) to cool off a bit.
entries.hot: /hot: You are too hot! /hot self: You're just too hot! /hot target: You are too hot for (target name).
entries.hoth_scout_ear_gun: Scout Ear Blaster Direct targeting blaster.
entries.hoth_scout_ear_gun_switch: Switch co-pilots default attack to the Ear Blaster.
entries.hoth_scout_rocket: Concussion Rocket Does damage to all targets in area of explosion.
entries.hoth_scout_rocket_switch: Switch co-pilots default attack to the Concussion Rocket.
entries.hoth_scout_shield: Shield Boost Temporarily increases your shields.
entries.hug: /hug: You hold your arms out and offer a hug. /hug self: You give yourself a hug. /hug target: You give (him, her, or it) a hug.
entries.huge: /huge: You hold your arms out wide and indicate it was HUGE! /huge self: You guess that it was HUGE! /huge target: You indicate to (him, her, or it) that it was HUGE!
entries.hum: /hum: You hum. /hum self: You hum a tune to yourself. /hum target: You hum a tune for (target name).
entries.human_ability_1: Human Authority: You take charge of the situation granting your group mates and you a damage bonus. This special ability is a trait of the human species.
entries.hunger: /hunger: You grow hungry. /hunger self: Your stomach rumbles with a hollow, empty sound. /hunger target: You indicate to (target name) that you are hungry.
entries.iffscramble: IFF Scramble Temporarily confuses enemy targeting systems.
entries.imagedesign: This command allows the user to image design.
entries.imagedesigner: This ability allows you to perform image design commands.
entries.imfull: /imfull: You pat your stomach denoting you are full. /imfull self: You rub your stomach, feeling overstuffed. /imfull target: You indicate to (target) that you are full.
entries.imitate: /imitate: You imitate a statue and stand perfectly still. /imitate self: You imitate yourself. Kind of pointless, isn't it? /imitate target: You imitate (target name).
entries.impale: Impale This melee attack has an improved damage capability.
entries.impale_1: Improved Impale This enhancement to the Impale ability improves the damage potential of the attack.
entries.inante: /innate: lists available innate commands /innate <innate ability>: attempts to utilize innate ability
entries.incognito: Incognito This ability allows you to temporarily appear as if though you belong to either the Imperial or Rebel factions.  Depending on your level of knowledge of military protocols, you may be able to infiltrate various areas controlled by enemy personnel.  You can even make use of some factional items whilst you are Incognito.  Be careful not be Interrogated, however, as this could lead to a tragic discovery of your clandestine objectives.
entries.infect: Infect This offensive medical ability delivers a disease at range which temporarily reduces the target's health potential.
entries.infect_1: Improved Infect This enhancement to the Infect ability delivers a strong disease at range which temporarily reduces the target's health potential.
entries.infect_2: Advanced Infect This enhancement to the Infect ability delivers a powerful disease at range which temporarily reduces the target's health potential.
entries.innate: /innate: determines which innate commands are available to you. /innate <innate ability> attempts to activate the innate ability. see /<innate ability> for further information.
entries.innocent: /innocent: You do your best to look innocent. /innocent self: You claim innocence. /innocent target: You do your best to look innocent for (target name).
entries.insertitemintoshipcomponentslot: Place an item (a missile pack, for example) into a component in a ship.
entries.inspacereload: /inspacereload: If you are stopped and not in a dangerous area, this command will summon a ship to arrive, give an estimate for reloading the player's magazine racks for countermeasures and missiles, and reload them if the player desires. The ammunition reloaded in the field will not be quite as good as what was originally in the magazine.
entries.inspacerepair: /inspacerepair: If you are stopped and not in a dangerous area, this command will summon a repair ship to arrive, give an estimate for repairs, and do them if the player desires. Repairs in the field will not be as good as those done at a station or otherwise.
entries.inspacerr: /inspacerr: This command combines the In Space Repair and In Space Reload commands into a single command, and the ship summoned will provide both services.
entries.inspire: This ability allows you to select a profession specific inspiration buff for your target.
entries.installmissionterminal: /installmissionterminal: Allows the mayor to place a mission terminal within the borders of his city.
entries.installshipcomponent: Install a ship component into a ship.
entries.interrogate: Interrogate This skill allows you to interrogate persons whom you suspect of masquerading as a member of your faction.  If you successfully Interrogate an Incognito person, their cover is blown.
entries.intimidate: Intimidate This melee ability reduces the amount of damage your opponent's attacks for a short period of time.
entries.intimidate1: When a target is intimidated, they are not able to hit their targets as often.
entries.intimidate2: When a target is intimidated, they are not able to hit their targets as easily.  This is more powerful than Intimidate 1.
entries.intimidate_1: Improved Intimidate This enhancement to the Intimidate ability further reduces the amount of damage of your opponent's attacks.
entries.intimidate_2: Advanced Intimidate This enhancement to the Intimidate ability further reduces the amount of damage of your opponent's attacks.
entries.intimidateshot: Intimidate Shot This ranged attack ability reduces an opponents damage capability for a short period of time.
entries.intimidationattack: Intimidation Attack This command allows the user to utilize the intimidation attack.
entries.introduce: /introduce: You introduce everyone to each other. /introduce self: WELL MET! You introduce yourself to everyone. /introduce target: Everyone, meet (target name).
entries.isafk: /isafk:  You notify every around you that you are going AFK.  Hurry back, now! /isafk self:  OK... You are really AFK now. /isafk target:  You point out that (target name) is AFK.
entries.ithorian_ability_1: Balance: You focus your efforts and take up an extremely stable combat stance greatly increasing your ability to block attacks. The amount of damage you prevent while blocking is also increased by 11 to 12 points per level. This special ability is a racial trait of the Ithorian species.
entries.jam: /jam: Just A Moment! /jam self: You announce you will be done in just a moment. /jam target: You inform (target name) that (he, she or it) only has just a moment to finish.
entries.jas: /jas: Just one more second! /jas self: 1-one-thousand. DING! Done yet? /jas target: You inform (target name) that (he, she or it) only has a few seconds left.
entries.jedimindtrick: Jedi Mind Trick This ability allows a Jedi to project his or her consciousness into the weak minded. This will affect NPCs or creatures that are currently under the control of another player, causing them to forget their master and turn rogue.
entries.jk: /jk: HA! Just kidding! /jk self: You let yourself know you were just kidding. /jk target: You inform (target name) that you were just kidding.
entries.jstart1: /jstart1: This command triggers a discharge from your weapon capacitor to recharge your target's shields. You must have a friendly player-controlled ship as your target, be close in proximity, and have at least a 50% charge in your weapon capacitor.
entries.jstart2: /jstart2: This command triggers a discharge from your weapon capacitor and shields to recharge your target's shields. You must have a friendly player-controlled ship as your target, be close in proximity, and have at least a 50% charge in your weapon capacitor. Up to 50% of your shield's max capacity will be used for recharging purposes.
entries.jstart3: /jstart3: This command triggers a discharge from your weapon capacitor and shields to recharge your target's shields. You must have a friendly player-controlled ship as your target, be close in proximity, and have at least a 50% charge in your weapon capacitor. Up to 90% of your shield's max capacity will be used for recharging purposes.
entries.kipupshot: Kip-up Shot A kip-up shot will cause you to spring to your feet while attacking, leaving you in a standing position.
entries.kiss: /kiss: You close your eyes and pucker up, ready for a kiss. /kiss self: You kiss yourself. /kiss target: You kiss (target name) gently on the lips.
entries.kisscheek: /kisscheek: You kiss anyone who might be in front of you. /kisscheek self: You kiss yourself. /kisscheek target: You give (target name) a friendly kiss on the cheek.
entries.kloohorn: This ability allows you to play songs with the Kloo Horn instrument.
entries.kneecapshot: Knee-cap Shot This ranged attack slows an opponent's movement rate for a short period of time.
entries.kneecapshot_1: Improved Knee-cap Shot This enhancement to the Knee-cap Shot ability is more powerful and slows the target's movement rate for a longer period of time.
entries.kneel: Kneeling brings you into a lower posture, which prohibits movement and makes you more vulnerable to melee attacks, but allows for better ranged accuracy
entries.knock: /knock: You knock. /knock self: You knock on wood. /knock target: You knock on (target name)'s head.
entries.knockbackstrike: Knockback Strike This melee attack ability does reduced damage with a change to knock an opponent back a short distance.
entries.knockbackstrike_1: Improved Knockback Strike This enhancement to the Knockback Strike ability increases the chance of knocking your opponent back.
entries.knockdownattack: Knockdown Attack This command utilizes the knock down attack.
entries.knockdownfire: Knockdown Fire This ranged attack blasts the target with a quick rush of flame aimed at their upper body, which can cause them to be bowled over by the sheer force directed at them, causing them to become dizzy as well.
entries.knockdownrecovery: Knockdown Recovery This ability allows you to recover immediately from being knocked down if you have enough ability points.
entries.knockwood: /knockwood:  You knock. /knockwood self:  You knock on wood. /knockwood target:  You knock on (target name)'s head.
entries.kowtow: /kowtow: You kowtow. /kowtow self: You kowtow to yourself. /kowtow target: You kowtow before (target name).
entries.lag: /lag: LAAAAAGGGGG!!! /lag self: You announce that you are lagging. /lag target: You point out that (target name) is lagging.
entries.lair_egg_buff: Egg Finder - You have developed your own device that assists in searching lairs for eggs.
entries.large: /large: You spread your arms out some and meter a large-ish size. /large self: You guess that it would be large. /large target: You indicate to (target name) that it was large.
entries.lasershow: Laser Show Performs a laser show effect.
entries.lastditch: Last Ditch This ranged attack ability is used as a last resort in battle using all of your remaining ability points and doing a scaled amount of damage depending on how close to death you are.
entries.laugh: /laugh: HAHA!! /laugh self: You laugh at yourself. /laugh target: You laugh at (target name).
entries.launchfirework: Launch Firework This command is used to launch a firework.
entries.lean: /lean: You lean forward. /lean self: You lean up against a wall. /lean target: You lean on (target name).
entries.leap: /leap: BOIING!! You leap high in the air! /leap self: You try to leap over yourself and land square on your head. /leap target: You jump up and down on (him, her, or it).
entries.leer: /leer: You leer enviously at everyone around you. /leer self: You leer enviously at yourself. /leer target: You leer enviously at (target name).
entries.left: /left: You point left. /left self: You point left. /left target: You turn to (target name) and point left.
entries.leghit: Leg Hit This melee attack causes a targeted hit to an opponent's legs and has a slight accuracy penalty.
entries.leghit_1: Improved Leg Hit This enhancement to the Leg Hit ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.leghit_2: Advanced Leg Hit This enhancement to the Leg Hit ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.legshake: /legshake: Your legs shake. /legshake self: You shake your leg, as if trying to get something off of it. /legshake target: You try to shake (him, her, or it) off your leg.
entries.legshot: Leg Shot This ranged attack causes a targeted hit to an opponent's legs has a slight accuracy penalty.
entries.legshot1: This ranged attack targets an opponent's legs in order to damage their Action pool.
entries.legshot2: This ranged attack targets an opponent's legs in order to damage their Action pool.
entries.legshot3: This powerful ranged attack targets an opponent's legs in order to devastate their Action pool.
entries.legshot_1: Improved Leg Shot This enhancement to the Leg Shot ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.legshot_2: Advanced Leg Shot This enhancement to the Leg Shot ability reduces the amount of the accuracy penalty and increases the amount of damage the attack does.
entries.legsweep: Leg Sweep This melee attack does minimal damage but has a good chance of knocking down an opponent.
entries.legsweep_1: Improved Leg Sweep This enhancement to the Leg Sweep ability gives a higher chance of knocking down your opponent.
entries.legsweep_2: Advanced Leg Sweep This enhancement to the Leg Sweep ability gives a higher chance of knocking down your opponent.
entries.lethalshot: Lethal Shot This ranged attack does more damage than Ranged Hit and Placed Shot but with higher ability costs.
entries.lick: /lick: You lick your lips. /lick self: You lick yourself. /lick target: You lick (him, her, or it).
entries.lives: /lives: You decide to let them live. /lives self: You contemplate the meaning of life. /lives target: You decide that (target name) will live, for now...
entries.lol: /lol: That was funny! /lol self: You try to hold it in, but burst out laughing. /lol target: You laugh out loud at (him, her, or it).
entries.loser: /loser: You let everyone know that you are the champion, and they are not. /loser self: Oh no, you've lost again! /loser target: You think (target name) is a loser.
entries.lost: /lost: Lost, eh? /lost self: You look around, utterly lost. /lost target: You think (he, she or it) is lost, eh?
entries.love: /love: Ain't love grand? /love self: You love being you! /love target: You profess your love to (him, her, or it).
entries.lowblow: Low Blow: This ranged attack ability causes a very painful attack that isn't very damaging but is almost guaranteed to slow down their attacks for a period of time.
entries.luck: /luck: Feeling lucky? /luck self: You wish yourself the best of luck! /luck target: Good luck, (target name)!
entries.lunge: Lunge This melee attack has an extended range potential.
entries.lunge_1: Improved Lunge This enhancement to the Lunge ability causes more damage to the opponent.
entries.lunge_2: Advanced Lunge This enhancement to the Lunge ability extends the range of the attack and increases the amount of damage done to the opponent.
entries.maintenance_fees_1: The merchant gains a 20% decrease in structure maintenance fees.
entries.makeroom: /makeroom: Hey everybody, make room! /makeroom self: You make a little room for yourself. /makeroom target: You tell (target name) to make some room!
entries.manage_militia: Gives the politician the ability to add and remove members of the city militia via the city management terminal.
entries.manage_taxes: The Politician who is also a city mayor has the ability to manage the taxation of his constituency.  Taxes may be collected in four areas: Property Tax, Civilian Tax, Sales Tax, and Travel Fees.
entries.mandoviol: This ability allows you to play songs with the Mandoviol instrument.
entries.manual: /manual: You produce the manual and suggest a quick read. /manual self: You refer to the manual. /manual target: You politely suggest reading the manual to (him, her, or it).
entries.maskscent: Mask Scent Masks your scent from aggressive creatures for a short time.
entries.me_ae_heal_1: Bacta Spray (Mark 1): A spray of bacta that heals all friendly targets in the area with a level 1 heal.
entries.me_ae_heal_2: Bacta Spray (Mark 2): A spray of bacta that heals all friendly targets in the area with a level 10 heal.
entries.me_ae_heal_3: Bacta Spray (Mark 3): A spray of bacta that heals all friendly targets in the area with a level 30 heal.
entries.me_ae_heal_4: Bacta Spray (Mark 4): A spray of bacta that heals all friendly targets in the area with a level 58 heal.
entries.me_ae_heal_5: Bacta Spray (Mark 5): A spray of bacta that heals all friendly targets in the area with a level 78 heal.
entries.me_ae_heal_6: Bacta Spray (Mark 6): A spray of bacta that heals all friendly targets in the area with a level 90 heal.
entries.me_bacta_ampule_1: Bacta Ampule (Mark 1): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Grenade, however it recharges much more quickly.
entries.me_bacta_ampule_2: Bacta Ampule (Mark 2): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Grenade, however it recharges much more quickly.
entries.me_bacta_ampule_3: Bacta Ampule (Mark 3): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Grenade, however it recharges much more quickly.
entries.me_bacta_ampule_4: Bacta Ampule (Mark 4): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Grenade, however it recharges much more quickly.
entries.me_bacta_ampule_5: Bacta Ampule (Mark 5): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Grenade, however it recharges much more quickly.
entries.me_bacta_ampule_6: Bacta Ampule (Mark 6): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Grenade, however it recharges much more quickly.
entries.me_bacta_bomb_1: Bacta Bomb (Mark 1): Long ranged healing ability that restores a large amount of Health to your target. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Jab and though much more efficient, takes longer to recharge.
entries.me_bacta_bomb_2: Bacta Bomb (Mark 2): Long ranged healing ability that restores a large amount of Health to your target. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Jab and though much more efficient, takes longer to recharge.

entries.me_bacta_grenade_1: Bacta Grenade (Mark 1): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Spray, however it recharges much more quickly.
entries.me_bacta_grenade_2: Bacta Grenade (Mark 2): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Spray, however it recharges more quickly.
