entries.me_bacta_grenade_5: Bacta Grenade (Mark 5): Restores some Health to your target from long range. This ability draws from the same bacta supply as your Bacta Spray, however it recharges more quickly.
entries.me_bacta_resistance_1: Bacta Corruption: Reduces the effectiveness of the target's healing abilities.
entries.me_blood_cleaners_1: Blood Cleansers: Removes the "Weakened" state, which is incurred upon incapacitation.
entries.me_buff_health: Nutrient Injection: A level 46 dose of nutrients that increase the target's health for a time.
entries.me_buff_health_1: Nutrient Injection (Mark 2): A level 46 dose of nutrients that increase the target's health for a time.
entries.me_buff_health_2: Nutrient Injection (Mark 1): A dose of nutrients that increase the target's health for a time.
entries.me_buff_health_3: Nutrient Injection (Mark 3): A dose of nutrients that increase the target's health for a time.
entries.me_burst_1: Burst (Mark 1): Unleashes a wild spray of gun fire in an attempt to cow opponents. This leaves them with a slightly decreased chance to score Critical Hits against you and increasing your chance to land a Strikethrough Hit or a Critical Hit. Requires an equipped Carbine.
entries.me_burst_2: Burst (Mark 2): Unleashes a wild spray of gun fire in an attempt to cow opponents. This leaves them with a slightly decreased chance to score Critical Hits against you and increasing your chance to land a Strikethrough Hit or a Critical Hit. Requires an equipped Carbine.

entries.me_cranial_smash_1: Flurry (Mark 1): Unleashes a flurry of melee attacks aimed at a number of vital areas leaving the opponent with reduced movement speed and damage output. Requires Melee.
entries.me_cranial_smash_2: Flurry (Mark 2): Unleashes a flurry of melee attacks aimed at a number of vital areas leaving the opponent with reduced movement speed and damage output. Requires Melee.

entries.me_cranial_smash_5: Flurry (Mark 5): Unleashes a flurry of melee attacks aimed at a number of vital areas leaving the opponent with reduced movement speed and damage output. Requires Melee.
entries.me_cure_affliction_1: Cure Affliction: Removes bleeding, poison, disease and fire damage over time effects from your target.
entries.me_dm_1: Vital Strike (Mark 1): The medic uses their extensive medical knowledge to strike their opponent in a vital spot with a level 4 attack.
entries.me_dm_2: Vital Strike (Mark 2): The medic uses their extensive medical knowledge to strike their opponent in a vital spot with a level 14 attack.
entries.me_dm_3: Vital Strike (Mark 3): The medic uses their extensive medical knowledge to strike their opponent in a vital spot with a level 18 attack.
entries.me_dm_4: Vital Strike (Mark 4): The medic uses their extensive medical knowledge to strike their opponent in a vital spot with a level 42 attack.

entries.me_dm_6: Vital Strike (Mark 6): The medic uses their extensive medical knowledge to strike their opponent in a vital spot with a level 66 attack.
entries.me_dm_7: Vital Strike (Mark 7): The medic uses their extensive medical knowledge to strike their opponent in a vital spot.
entries.me_dm_8: Vital Strike (Mark 7): The medic uses their extensive medical knowledge to strike their opponent in a vital spot with a level 86 attack.
entries.me_dm_dot_1: Neurotoxin (Mark 1): The medic inflicts a deadly level 7 disease on the target.
entries.me_dm_dot_2: Neurotoxin (Mark 2): The medic inflicts a deadly level 22 disease on the target.
entries.me_dm_dot_3: Neurotoxin (Mark 3): The medic launches a level 26 chemical attack on the target's nervous system.
entries.me_dm_dot_4: Neurotoxin (Mark 4): The medic launches a level 46 chemical attack on the target's nervous system.
entries.me_dm_dot_5: Neurotoxin (Mark 5): The medic launches a level 66 chemical attack on the target's nervous system.
entries.me_dm_dot_6: Neurotoxin (Mark 6): The medic launches a level 82 chemical attack on the target's nervous system.
entries.me_drag_1: Drag Corpse: Allows you to drag the corpses of all party members within range to your location.
entries.me_electrolyte_drain_1: Electrolyte Drain: Creates a chemical imbalance in the target leaving them listless and reducing movement speed.
entries.me_enhance_action_1: Metabolic Accelerators (Mark 1): Temporarily increases a being's metabolism allowing for more efficient conversion of stored calories to energy and increasing that being's total Action.
entries.me_enhance_action_2: Metabolic Accelerators (Mark 2): Temporarily increases a being's metabolism allowing for more efficient conversion of stored calories to energy and increasing that being's total Action.
entries.me_enhance_action_3: Metabolic Accelerators (Mark 3): Temporarily increases a being's metabolism allowing for more efficient conversion of stored calories to energy and increasing that being's total Action.
entries.me_enhance_agility_1: Enhance Agility (Mark 1): Enhances the target's Agility statistic.
entries.me_enhance_agility_2: Enhance Agility (Mark 2): Enhances the target's Agility statistic.
entries.me_enhance_agility_3: Enhance Agility (Mark 3): Enhances the target's Agility statistic.
entries.me_enhance_block_1: Enhance Block: Improves the target's block chance and block value.
entries.me_enhance_dodge_1: Enhance Dodge: Improves the target's chance to dodge an incoming attack.
entries.me_enhance_precision_1: Enhance Precision (Mark 1): Enhances the target's Precision statistic.
entries.me_enhance_precision_2: Enhance Precision (Mark 2): Enhances the target's Precision statistic.
entries.me_enhance_precision_3: Enhance Precision (Mark 3): Enhances the target's Precision statistic.
entries.me_enhance_strength_1: Enhance Strength (Mark 1): Enhances the target's Strength statistic.
entries.me_enhance_strength_2: Enhance Strength (Mark 2): Enhances the target's Strength statistic.
entries.me_enhance_strength_3: Enhance Strength (Mark 3): Enhances the target's Strength statistic.
entries.me_evasion_1: Evasion: You attempt to elude non-boss foes currently angry with you, ending combat and provides a defensive bonus for a short period of time.  Reduces hate on bosses.
entries.me_fld_dm_dot_1: Nerve Gas (Mark 1): A level 38 chemical charge that causes damage to the nervous systems of all targets in the area.
entries.me_fld_dm_dot_2: Nerve Gas (Mark 2): A level 50 charge that produces a corrosive cloud damaging all targets in the blast area.
entries.me_fld_dm_dot_3: Nerve Gas (Mark 3): A level 74 aerosol dispersal charge that leaves behind a corrosive gas cloud that causes internal bleeding to those inhaling it.
entries.me_hot_1: Bacta Infusion (Mark 1): A dose of Bacta that heals a target over time with a level 34 heal.
entries.me_hot_2: Bacta Infusion (Mark 2): A dose of Bacta that heals a target over time with a level 62 heal.
entries.me_hot_3: Bacta Infusion (Mark 3): A dose of Bacta that heals a target over time with a level 70 heal.
entries.me_induce_insanity_1: Rheumatic Calamity: Bleeding causes tissues to swell resulting in intense pain, when action is spent and damage over time.
entries.me_reckless_stimulation_1: Reckless Stimulation (Mark 1): Restores some Action to you. Though effective, it is extremely painful and causes a loss of Health.
entries.me_reckless_stimulation_2: Reckless Stimulation (Mark 2): Restores some Action to you. Though effective, it is extremely painful and causes a loss of Health.
entries.me_reckless_stimulation_3: Reckless Stimulation (Mark 3): Restores some Action to you. Though effective, it is extremely painful and causes a loss of Health.

entries.me_reckless_stimulation_6: Reckless Stimulation (Mark 6): Restores some Action to you. Though effective, it is extremely painful and causes a loss of Health.
entries.me_rv_area: Revive Player: This very powerful command enables you to revive a dead player, bypassing the need to clone. Unlike Resuscitate Player, this ability may be used while the medic is in combat.
entries.me_rv_combat: Area Revive: This very powerful command enables you to revive all dead players in an area, bypassing the need to clone. This ability may not be used while the medic is in combat.
entries.me_rv_ooc: Resuscitate Player: This very powerful command enables you to revive a dead player, bypassing the need to clone. This ability may not be used while the medic is in combat.
entries.me_rv_pvp_area: PVP Area Revive: This very powerful command enables you to revive all dead players in an area, bypassing the need to clone. This ability may be used only when the targeted player has been killed by another player.
entries.me_rv_pvp_single: PVP Resuscitate Player: This very powerful command enables you to revive a dead player, bypassing the need to clone.  This ability may be used only when the targeted player has been killed by another player.
entries.me_serotonin_boost_1: Serotonin Boost: Induces a feeling of well being and allows the target to remain upbeat in the face of extreme adversity. Removes a harmful debuff effect. Note that some effects, such as Cloning Sickness and Weakness, are too strong to be removed by this ability.
entries.me_serotonin_purge_1: Serotonin Purge: Induces depression and feelings of hopelessness on an enemy, shaking their will to fight. Removes a beneficial buff effect.
entries.me_sh_1: Bacta Jab: An emergency application of Bacta for the medic to heal their wounds with a level 82 heal.
entries.me_stasis_1: Stasis Field: The target receives an extreme defensive increase while movement is extremely hampered and offense capability all but negated.
entries.me_stasis_self_1: Stasis Field (Self): You receive an extreme defensive increase while movement is extremely hampered and offense capability all but negated.
entries.me_thyroid_rupture_1: Thyroid Rupture: Impedes the functioning of a number of vital organs reducing the target's damage output.
entries.me_traumatize_1: Traumatize (Mark 1): Induces extreme trauma to sensory systems reducing the target's Action pool.
entries.me_traumatize_2: Traumatize (Mark 2): Induces extreme trauma to sensory systems reducing the target's Action pool.
entries.me_traumatize_3: Traumatize (Mark 3): Induces extreme trauma to sensory systems reducing the target's Action pool.
entries.me_traumatize_4: Traumatize (Mark 4): Induces extreme trauma to sensory systems reducing the target's Action pool.
entries.me_traumatize_5: Traumatize (Mark 5): Induces extreme trauma to sensory systems reducing the target's Action pool.
entries.medicalforage: Medical Forage This command allows you to forage material from the area that can be used to create medical supplies.
entries.meditate: Meditate Allows the user to enter a trance-like state. In this state, those who are Force Sensitive can see visions for short periods of time. This command must be executed while sitting on the ground.
entries.medium: /medium: You spread your arms out a bit and signify a medium size. /medium self: You guess that it would be about medium sized. /medium target: You indicate to (target name) that it was about medium sized.
entries.melee1hblindhit1: This melee attack can temporarily blind a single target.
entries.melee1hblindhit2: This melee area attack can temporarily blind multiple targets at once.
entries.melee1hbodyhit1: This melee attack targets the body in order to damage the target's Health pool.
entries.melee1hbodyhit2: This melee attack targets an opponent's body in order to damage the target's Health pool.  It is stronger than One-Hand Body Hit 1.
entries.melee1hbodyhit3: This melee attack targets an opponent's body in order to damage the target's Health pool.  It is stronger than One-Hand Body Hit 2.
entries.melee1hdizzyhit1: This melee attack can make a single target dizzy.
entries.melee1hdizzyhit2: This melee area attack can cause multiple targets to become dizzy.
entries.melee1hhealthhit1: This melee attack targets an opponent's body in order to WOUND the target's Health pool.
entries.melee1hhealthhit2: This melee attack targets an opponent's body in order to WOUND the target's Health pool.  It can inflict more wound damage than One-Hand Health Hit 1.
entries.melee1hhit1: This melee attack inflicts more damage than the basic One-Hand attack.
entries.melee1hhit2: This melee attack inflicts more damage then One-Hand Hit 1.
entries.melee1hhit3: This powerful melee attack inflicts more damage than One-Hand Hit 2.
entries.melee1hlunge1: This melee attack allows you to slightly extend your range, and it can change the posture of your target.
entries.melee1hlunge2: This melee attack allows you to slightly extend your range, and it can knock your target down.
entries.melee1hscatterhit1: This melee attack can strike multiple body parts on a target at once.
entries.melee1hscatterhit2: This melee attack can strike multiple body parts at once.  This attack is more powerful than One-Hand Scatter Hit 1.
entries.melee1hspinattack1: This melee area attack can damage multiple targets at once.
entries.melee1hspinattack2: This melee area attack can damage multiple targets at once, with a chance to blind them.
entries.melee2harea1: This melee area attack can lower the posture of multiple targets at once.
entries.melee2harea2: This melee area attack can lower the posture of multiple targets at once.  This is more damaging than Two-Hand Area Attack 1.
entries.melee2harea3: This powerful melee area attack can blind, and damage and lower the posture of multiple targets simultaneously.  This is more damaging then Two-Hand Area Attack 2.
entries.melee2hheadhit1: This melee attack targets the head in order to damage the target's Mind pool.
entries.melee2hheadhit2: This melee attack targets an opponent's head in order to damage the target's Mind pool.  This is more damaging than Two-Hand Head Hit 1.
entries.melee2hheadhit3: This melee attack targets an opponent's head in order to damage the target's Mind pool.  This is more damaging than Two-Hand Head Hit 2.
entries.melee2hhit1: This melee attack inflicts more damage than the basic Two-Hand attack.
entries.melee2hhit2: This advanced melee attack inflicts more damage than Two-Hand Hit 1.
entries.melee2hhit3: This powerful melee attack inflicts more damage than Two-Hand Hit 2.
entries.melee2hlunge1: This melee attack allows you to slightly extend your range, and it can change the posture of your target.
entries.melee2hlunge2: This melee attack allows you to slightly extend your range, and it can knock down your target.
entries.melee2hmindhit1: This melee attack targets the head in order to WOUND the target's Mind pool.
entries.melee2hmindhit2: This melee attack targets an opponent's head in order to WOUND the target's Mind pool.  This is more damaging than Two-Hand Mind Hit 1.
entries.melee2hspinattack1: This melee area attack can damage multiple targets at once.
entries.melee2hspinattack2: This melee area attack can damage multiple targets at once.  This is more damaging than Two-Hand Spin Attack 1.
entries.melee2hsweep1: This melee attack can lower the posture of a single target.
entries.melee2hsweep2: This melee area attack can lower the posture of multiple targets at once.
entries.melee_damage_mitigation_1: This skill will limit the damage range done to you when you are attacked with a melee weapon.
entries.melee_damage_mitigation_2: This ability will further limit the damage range done to you when you are attacked with a melee weapon.
entries.melee_damage_mitigation_3: This ability will further limit the damage range done to you when you are attacked with a melee weapon.
entries.meleeassault: Melee Assault This melee attack does more damage than Melee Hit and Melee Strike but with higher ability costs.
entries.meleehit: Melee Hit This is the most basic melee ability with very low damage potential and low ability cost.  ff0000 Did you know that you can select any move as an auto-attack by holding down Ctrl and left clicking the move?
entries.meleestrike: Melee Strike This melee attack does more damage than Melee Hit but has a slight ability cost.
entries.melt: /melt: You melt. /melt self: You melt into your own arms. /melt target: You melt into (his, her, or its) arms.
entries.merchant_fees_1: The merchant gains a reduction in the cost of using the Galactic Commodities Bazaar.
entries.mercy: /mercy: You appeal for mercy. /mercy self: You appeal to your merciful side. /mercy target: You beg for mercy from (target name).
entries.milkcreature: This allows you to attempt to milk a creature.
entries.mimic: /mimic: You mimic passers-by. /mimic self: You mimic yourself. /mimic target: You mimic (target name).
entries.mindblast: Mind Blast This attack allows a Jedi to invade someone's mind, causing a chance for the target to become stunned or dizzy, as well as dealing a moderate amount of damage.
entries.mindblast1: This attack allows a Jedi to invade someone's mind, causing a chance for the target to become stunned or dizzy, as well as dealing a moderate amount of damage to a random pool.
entries.mindblast2: This attack allows a Jedi to project a wave of mental intrusion, dealing damage to a random pool of the target and those in the immediate area as well as causing a chance for those affected to become stunned, or dizzy.
entries.mindblast_1: Improved Mind Blast This enhancement to the mind blast ability increases the amount of damage dealt.
entries.mindhit: Mindhit This melee attack does no damage but reduces an opponent's Mind Ability points.
entries.mindshot: Mindshot This ranged attack does no damage but reduces an opponent's Mind Ability points.
entries.mindshot1: This ranged attack can wreak havoc with a target's Mind pool drain and regeneration rates.
entries.mindshot2: This ranged attack can wreak havoc with a target's Mind pool drain and regeneration rates.
entries.mirror: /mirror: You hold up a mirror. /mirror self: You pull a mirror from your pack and check your appearance. /mirror target: You hold up a mirror up for (target name).
entries.mock: /mock: You mock the chattering of the crowd. /mock self: You mock your own blabbering. /mock target: You mock (target name).
entries.model: /model: You model your new outfit - so nice! /model self: You model your clothing for yourself, but there is no mirror here! /model target: You model for (target name).
entries.moncal_ability_1: It's a Trap!: Through analysis of your opponent's strengths and weakness you determine a counter-strategy to increase your odds of defeating them. You unleash a cunning area attack that bypasses all opponent defenses, increasing their chance to be critical hit and decreases the effectiveness of their attack. This ability is a trait of the Mon Calamari species.
entries.mope: /mope: You mope. /mope self: You mope around. /mope target: You mope about (target name).
entries.mosh: /mosh: You mosh about, bumping into everyone. /mosh self: You mosh by yourself, looking quite strange. /mosh target: You mosh into (target name).
entries.mourn: /mourn: You mourn. /mourn self: You mourn the loss of friends. /mourn target: You mourn for (target name).
entries.multitargetpistolshot: Multitarget Pistol Shot This ranged attack for pistols can hit multiple targets at once.
entries.multitargetshot: Multitarget Shot This ranged attack can hit multiple targets at once.
entries.musician: This ability allows you to perform musician commands.
entries.mutedroid: This command sets the astromech/flight-computer interface to a non-audible setting. No further feedback should be heard from the ship-board systems management droid or flight-computer, whatever the case may be.
entries.mutter: /mutter: You mutter. /mutter self: You mutter about yourself. /mutter target: You mutter something snide about (target name).
entries.nails: /nails: You drag your nails down a stony surface creating an annoying, high-pitched sound. /nails self: You blow on your nails and buff them on your clothes. /nails target: You drag the edge of a fingernail down the side of (him, her, or it) neck.
entries.nalargon: This ability allows you to play songs with the Nalargon instrument.
entries.namestructure: This command allows the user to name a structure.
entries.nap: /nap: You take a quick nap. /nap self: You find a nice place to rest and settle in for a quick nap. /nap target: You curl up in (his, her, or its) lap and settle in for a catnap.
entries.nausea: /nausea: You feel nauseous. /nausea self: You suddenly feel nauseous and quickly cover your mouth. /nausea target: You look at (target name), suddenly feeling nauseous.
entries.nblast: /nblast: This command only works while the pilot is inside a nebula, where it triggers an explosion.
entries.nelson: /nelson: You practice your full nelson maneuver. /nelson self: You try to put yourself in a full nelson. /nelson target: With a single swift move, you put (target name) in a full nelson.
entries.neurotoxin: Neurotoxin This offensive medical ability delivers a poison at range which causes health damage over time.
entries.neurotoxin_1: Improved Neurotoxin This enhancement to the Neurotoxin ability delivers a strong poison at range which causes health damage.
entries.neurotoxin_2: Advanced Neurotoxin This enhancement to the Neurotoxin ability delivers a powerful poison at range which causes health damage.
entries.newbiehelper: This allows others to recognize you as a new player helper.
entries.nextcraftingstage: This command allows the user to enter the next crafting stage.
entries.nod: /nod: You nod. /nod self: You nod at yourself reassuringly. /nod target: You nod at (target name).
entries.nono: /nono: You wag your finger as if saying, "No-No". /nono self: You decline with the shake of an opened hand. /nono target: You wag a finger negatively at (target name).
entries.noogie: /noogie: You look for a noogie target. /noogie self: You give yourself a noogie. /noogie target: You give (him, her, or it) a noogie.
entries.nose: /nose: You put your nose in the air. /nose self: You touch the tip of your nose. /nose target: You raise your nose at (target name).
entries.npcconversationselect: This command allows the user to select a conversation with an NPC.
entries.npcconversationstart: This command is used to start a conversation with an NPC.
entries.npcconversationstop: This command stops a conversation with an NPC.
entries.nudge: /nudge: You nudge everyone. /nudge self: You try to nudge yourself. /nudge target: You nudge (him, her, or it).
entries.nutrientinjection: Nutrient Injection This medical enhancement ability allows the temporary enhancement of the Health pool.
entries.nutrientinjection_1: Improved Nutrient Injection This enhancement to the Nutrient Injection ability grants a larger amount of Health enhanced as well as a small boost to Health regeneration rate.
entries.nutrientinjection_2: Advanced Nutrient Injection This enhancement to the Nutrient Injection ability grants a larger amount of Health enhanced as well as a larger boost to Health regeneration rate..
entries.nuzzle: /nuzzle: You make a nuzzling motion. /nuzzle self: You nuzzle yourself. /nuzzle target: You nuzzle (his, her, or its) neck.
entries.of_ae_dm_cc_1: Shock Grenade (Mark 1): A level 46 attack that slows enemy movement within a small radius.
entries.of_ae_dm_cc_2: Shock Grenade (Mark 2): A level 70 attack that slows enemy movement within a moderate radius.
entries.of_ae_dm_cc_3: Shock Grenade (Mark 3): A level 86 attack that slows enemy movement within a large radius.
entries.of_aggro_channel: Misdirected Anger Portion of hate Gained by Officer is redirected to an ally.

entries.of_buff_def_9: Tactics (Mark 9): Decisive battlefield commands provide your group with bonus defenses.
entries.of_charge_1: Charge!: Increases damage output, reduces action cost, provides a speed boost and removes snaring effects for all members of your party.
entries.of_deb_def_1: Paint Target (Mark 1): A command directing your group's fire at a single target, lowering their defenses.
entries.of_deb_def_2: Paint Target (Mark 2): A command directing your group's fire at a single target, lowering their defenses.

entries.of_decapitate_1: Decapitate (Mark 1): A brutal slice to the neck damages your opponent and leaves them bleeding.
entries.of_decapitate_2: Decapitate (Mark 2): A brutal slice to the neck damages your opponent and leaves them bleeding.
