entries.of_decapitate_6: Decapitate (Mark 6): A brutal slice to the neck damages your opponent and leaves them bleeding.
entries.of_del_ae_dm_1: Artillery Strike (Mark 1): You call in an attack from emplacement guns to a specified area.
entries.of_del_ae_dm_2: Artillery Strike (Mark 2): You call in an aerial bombardment launched from an aircraft that swoops down to punish your opponents.
entries.of_del_ae_dm_3: Artillery Strike (Mark 3): You call in a strike from an orbiting ship to a specified area.
entries.of_del_ae_dm_dot_1: Core Bomb (Mark 1): A high explosive charge that causes burning damage.
entries.of_del_ae_dm_dot_2: Core Bomb (Mark 2): A high explosive charge that causes burning damage.
entries.of_del_ae_dm_dot_3: Core Bomb (Mark 3): A high explosive charge that causes burning damage.
entries.of_del_ae_dot_1: Dioxis Grenade: The cloud emitted by a bursting Dioxis grenade causes level 50 burning damage to all targets in the area as well as lingering health damage as the inhaled gas continues to damage the afflicted respiratory system.
entries.of_dm_1: Sure Shot (Mark 1): An attack taken with heightened accuracy to increase damage.
entries.of_dm_2: Sure Shot (Mark 2): An attack taken with heightened accuracy to increase damage.
entries.of_dm_3: Sure Shot (Mark 3): An attack taken with heightened accuracy to increase damage.
entries.of_dm_4: Sure Shot (Mark 4): An attack taken with heightened accuracy to increase damage.
entries.of_dm_5: Sure Shot (Mark 5): An attack taken with heightened accuracy to increase damage.
entries.of_dm_6: Sure Shot (Mark 6): An attack taken with heightened accuracy to increase damage.
entries.of_dm_7: Sure Shot (Mark 7): An attack taken with heightened accuracy to increase damage.
entries.of_dm_8: Sure Shot (Mark 8): An attack taken with heightened accuracy to increase damage.
entries.of_drillmaster_1: Pistol Drillmaster: Your group members benefit from your advanced knowledge of combat gaining increased damage output and reduced action cost.
entries.of_drop_1: Supply Drop: Calls in a supply transport to drop off a crate of supplies.
entries.of_firepower_1: Superior Firepower: When you absolutely positively have to level an area, it's time to break out the good stuff. While active this buff dramatically increases the damage output and critical hit chance of all grenade and artillery area effect special attacks.
entries.of_focus_fire_1: Focus Fire (Mark 1): Your group takes up a disciplined attack posture resulting in an increase in offensive statistics.
entries.of_focus_fire_2: Focus Fire (Mark 2): Your group takes up a disciplined attack posture resulting in an increase in offensive statistics.
entries.of_focus_fire_3: Focus Fire (Mark 3): Your group takes up a disciplined attack posture resulting in an increase in offensive statistics.
entries.of_focus_fire_4: Focus Fire (Mark 4): Your group takes up a disciplined attack posture resulting in an increase in offensive statistics.
entries.of_focus_fire_5: Focus Fire (Mark 5): Your group takes up a disciplined attack posture resulting in an increase in offensive statistics.
entries.of_focus_fire_6: Focus Fire (Mark 6): Your group takes up a disciplined attack posture resulting in an increase in offensive statistics.
entries.of_inspiration_1: Inspiration (Mark 1): Your leadership inspires those in your group resulting in some action restoration and a decrease in action cost for a short period of time.
entries.of_inspiration_2: Inspiration (Mark 2): Your leadership inspires those in your group resulting in some action restoration and a decrease in action cost for a short period of time.
entries.of_inspiration_3: Inspiration (Mark 3): Your leadership inspires those in your group resulting in some action restoration and a decrease in action cost for a short period of time.
entries.of_inspiration_4: Inspiration (Mark 4): Your leadership inspires those in your group resulting in some action restoration and a decrease in action cost for a short period of time.
entries.of_inspiration_5: Inspiration (Mark 5): Your leadership inspires those in your group resulting in some action restoration and a decrease in action cost for a short period of time.
entries.of_inspiration_6: Inspiration (Mark 6): Your leadership inspires those in your group resulting in some action restoration and a decrease in action cost for a short period of time.
entries.of_medical_sup_1: Medical Supply Drop (Mark 1): Calls in a supply transport for delivery of medical supplies in the field.
entries.of_medical_sup_2: Medical Supply Drop (Mark 2): Calls in a supply transport for delivery of medical supplies in the field.
entries.of_medical_sup_3: Medical Supply Drop (Mark 3): Calls in a supply transport for delivery of medical supplies in the field.
entries.of_medical_sup_4: Medical Supply Drop (Mark 4): Calls in a supply transport for delivery of medical supplies in the field.
entries.of_medical_sup_5: Medical Supply Drop (Mark 5): Calls in a supply transport for delivery of medical supplies in the field.
entries.of_medical_sup_6: Medical Supply Drop (Mark 6): Calls in a supply transport for delivery of medical supplies in the field.
entries.of_pistol_bleed: Pistol Burn A powerful pistol attack that has a chance to cause the target to bleed.
entries.of_pistol_dm: Pistol Overcharge Pistol attack that does double damage.
entries.of_purge_1: Environmental Purge: Nanites in your armor cleanse your body of various deleterious conditions, removing damage over time effects such as bleeding, disease, poison and being set on fire.
entries.of_rally_point_def: Rally Point (Defensive) Set a rally point for your troops to gather at. Once in the area, your group members will receive a defensive buff.
entries.of_rally_point_off: Rally Point (Offensive) Set a rally point for your troops to gather at. Once in the area, your group members will receive a buff that will increase their offensive attacks.
entries.of_reinforcements_1: Reinforcements (Mark 1): Deploys a soldier from headquarters who will serve under your command and assist you in combat until dismissed or killed in action.
entries.of_reinforcements_2: Reinforcements (Mark 2): Deploys a soldier from headquarters who will serve under your command and assist you in combat until dismissed or killed in action.
entries.of_reinforcements_3: Reinforcements (Mark 3): Deploys a soldier from headquarters who will serve under your command and assist you in combat until dismissed or killed in action.
entries.of_reinforcements_4: Reinforcements (Mark 4): Deploys a soldier from headquarters who will serve under your command and assist you in combat until dismissed or killed in action.
entries.of_reinforcements_5: Reinforcements (Mark 5): Deploys a soldier from headquarters who will serve under your command and assist you in combat until dismissed or killed in action.
entries.of_reinforcements_6: Reinforcements (Mark 6): Deploys a soldier from headquarters who will serve under your command and assist you in combat until dismissed or killed in action.
entries.of_scatter_1: Scatter!: A defensive command that increases run speed, glancing blow chance and removes snare effects for all group members.
entries.of_sh_0: Heal (Mark 1): A healing ability used to recover health.
entries.of_sh_1: Heal (Mark 2): A healing ability used to recover health.
entries.of_sh_2: Heal (Mark 3): A healing ability used to recover health.
entries.of_sh_3: Heal (Mark 4): A healing ability used to recover health.
entries.of_stimulator_1: Synaptic Stimulator: Electrodes implanted in your helmet can be activated to shake you out of a variety of harmful states so you can return to full leadership capacity. This ability will attempt to remove up to two debuffs.
entries.of_tactical_sup_1: Tactical Supply Drop (Mark 1): You call in to headquarters for delivery of tactical supplies in the field.
entries.of_tactical_sup_2: Tactical Supply Drop (Mark 2): You call in to headquarters for delivery of tactical supplies in the field.
entries.of_tactical_sup_3: Tactical Supply Drop (Mark 3): You call in to headquarters for delivery of tactical supplies in the field.
entries.of_tactical_sup_4: Tactical Supply Drop (Mark 4): You call in to headquarters for delivery of tactical supplies in the field.
entries.of_tactical_sup_5: Tactical Supply Drop (Mark 5): You call in to headquarters for delivery of tactical supplies in the field.
entries.of_tactical_sup_6: Tactical Supply Drop (Mark 6): You call in to headquarters for delivery of tactical supplies in the field.
entries.of_vortex_1: Crippling Vortex (Mark 1): A lightning fast sweeping attack punishes every enemy in your immediate area, leaving them bleeding and severely hampering their movement for a period of time.
entries.of_vortex_2: Crippling Vortex (Mark 2): A lightning fast sweeping attack punishes every enemy in your immediate area, leaving them bleeding and severely hampering their movement for a period of time.
entries.of_vortex_3: Crippling Vortex (Mark 3): A lightning fast sweeping attack punishes every enemy in your immediate area, leaving them bleeding and severely hampering their movement for a period of time.
entries.of_vortex_4: Crippling Vortex (Mark 4): A lightning fast sweeping attack punishes every enemy in your immediate area, leaving them bleeding and severely hampering their movement for a period of time.
entries.of_vortex_5: Crippling Vortex (Mark 5): A lightning fast sweeping attack punishes every enemy in your immediate area, leaving them bleeding and severely hampering their movement for a period of time.
entries.of_vortex_6: Crippling Vortex (Mark 6): A lightning fast sweeping attack punishes every enemy in your immediate area, leaving them bleeding and severely hampering their movement for a period of time.
entries.omg: /omg: OMG! /omg self: You clasp your hand over your forehead and exclaim, "Oh my gosh!" /omg target: Oh my gosh, (target name)!
entries.omnibox: This ability allows you to plays songs with the Ommni Box instrument.
entries.onehandthrow: One Handed Force Throw: This force ability allows you to throw a one-handed weapon and retrieve it from your enemy with the power of the force.
entries.oneknee: /oneknee: You take a knee. /oneknee self: You take a knee and bow your head. /oneknee target: You take a knee before (target name).
entries.opossum: /opossum: You play dead. /opossum self: You keel over and play dead. /opossum target: You look with fear upon (target name), fall to the ground, and play dead.
entries.overchargeshot: Overcharge Shot This ranged attack causes a higher amount of damage while increasing the potential to cause decay to the weapon due to excess stress.
entries.overchargeshot1: This ranged attack causes more damage to a target at the expense of your weapon's power supply.
entries.overchargeshot2: This ranged attack causes more damage to a target at the expense of your weapon's power supply.  This attack is more damaging than Overcharge Shot 1.
entries.overkillshot: Overkill Shot This attack overcharges a heavy weapon and releases all built up energy in one big blast.  For area effect weapons, only the primary target takes increased damage.  Due to the stress this attack inflicts on a weapon, this attack can only be used infrequently.
entries.overkillshot_1: Improved Overkill Shot This attack overcharges a heavy weapon and releases all built up energy in one big blast.  For area effect weapons, only the primary target takes increased damage.  Due to the stress this attack inflicts on a weapon, this attack can only be used infrequently.
entries.overkillshot_2: Advanced Overkill Shot This attack overcharges a heavy weapon and releases all built up energy in one big blast.  For area effect weapons, only the primary target takes increased damage.  Due to the stress this attack inflicts on a weapon, this attack can only be used infrequently.
entries.overwhelmingshot: Overwhelming Shot This ranged attack causes a reduction in the target's ability to resist state effects.
entries.overwhelmingshot_1: Improved Overwhelming Shot This enhancement to the Overwhelming Shot ability is much more powerful and will reduce more state resists.
entries.painttarget: Paint Target Increases the amount of damage done to the targeted enemy for a period of time.
entries.painttarget_1: Improved Paint Target Increases the amount of damage done to the targeted enemy for a period of time.
entries.painttarget_2: Advanced Paint Target Increases the amount of damage done to the targeted enemy for a period of time.
entries.panic: /panic: AAAAAAYYYYYYEEEEEEEE!!! /panic self: You panic about, waving your hands in the air. /panic target: You panic about (target name), waving your hands in the air.
entries.panicshot: Panic Shot This ranged attack ability fires wildly at a target preventing them from attacking for a short period of time.
entries.panicshot_1: Improved Panic Shot This enhancement to the Panic Shot ability increases the duration their attacks are delayed.
entries.pant: /pant: You pant. /pant self: You hang your tongue out and pant like a dog. /pant target: You pant at (target name).
entries.paralyze: Paralyze This offensive ranged medical ability prevents an opponent from being able to perform any action or move for a short period of time.  Any damage to the target during this period will break the effect and allow them to perform actions again.
entries.paralyze_1: Improved Paralyze This enhancement to the Paralyze ability has a greater chance of applying the paralyzing effect.
entries.parryriposte: Parry Riposte This stance grants a defensive benefit as well as reflecting a portion of the incoming damage back at the source.
entries.parryriposte_1: Improved Parry Riposte This enhancement to the Parry Riposte ability grants an even larger defensive benefit as well as a larger portion of the damage reflected.
entries.pat: /pat: You pat your head. /pat self: You pat yourself on the back. /pat target: You pat (him, her, or it) on the head.
entries.paymaintenance: This command can be used to pay maintenance on a building or mining structure.
entries.payup: /payup: You expect to be reimbursed! /payup self: Did you really owe yourself? /payup target: You ask (target name) to pay up!
entries.peace: Peace Peace allows you to stop attacking a target.  If you are attacked again after initiating peace, you will automatically re-initiate combat.
entries.peer: /peer: You peer around. /peer self: You peer at yourself. /peer target: You peer at (target name). What is (he, she or it) up to?
entries.peptalk: /peptalk: GO TEAM! /peptalk self: GO ME! /peptalk target: You can do it, (target name)!
entries.performcolorlights: Perform Color Lights This is an Entertainer visual flourish.
entries.performdazzle: Perform Dazzle This is an Entertainer visual flourish.
entries.performdistract: Performdistract This is an Entertainer visual flourish.
entries.performfirejets: Perform Fire Jets This is an Entertainer visual flourish.
entries.performsmokebomb: Perform Smokebomb This is an Entertainer visual flourish.
entries.performspotlight: Perform Spotlight This is an Entertainer visual flourish.
entries.performventriloquism: Perform Ventriloquism This is an Entertainer trick flourish.
entries.pet: /pet: You cradle your arms and pet an imaginary creature. /pet self: You pet yourself. /pet target: You pet (target name).
entries.pet_attack: Pet Attack This command will enable you to cause your pet to attack your target.
entries.pet_follow: Pet Follow This command makes your pet follow you around.
entries.pet_followother: Pet Follow Other This command instructs your pet to follow the target you have indicated.
entries.pet_formation: Pet Formation This enables you to bring multiple pets into a pre-determined formation, such as a wedge.
entries.pet_friend: Pet Friend This causes your pet to make friends with a target.
entries.pet_group: Pet Group This command enables you to add your pets to your group.  This makes them much easier to target quickly.
entries.pet_guard: Pet Guard This command causes your pets to guard an individual (target another player, tell your pet to guard, and the pet will automatically defend that player).
entries.pet_patrol: Pet Patrol This command causes your pets to patrol in a small area.
entries.pet_rangedattack: Pet Ranged Attack This command makes your pet use its ranged attack (if  it has one)
entries.pet_release: Pet Store This command stores the pet back into your pet control device.
entries.pet_specialattack1: Pet Special Attack One This command makes your pet use its primary special attack (if  it has one)
entries.pet_specialattack2: Pet Special Attack Two This command makes your pet use its secondary special attack (if  it has one)
entries.pet_stay: Pet Stay This command makes your pet stay where it is.
entries.pet_transfer: Pet Transfer This command enables you to give your pets to another person.  You are only able to give pets to another Creature Handler.
entries.pethigh: /pethigh: You reach up and pet... what is that you're petting? /pethigh self: You pet yourself. /pethigh target: You pet (target name).
entries.petlow: /petlow: You reach down and pet... what is that you're petting? /petlow self: You pet yourself. /petlow target: You pet (target name).
entries.peyoo: /peyoo: PEEEEEYYYOOOO!! /peyoo self: You sniff yourself and realize you reek. /peyoo target: You look at (him, her, or it) with a sour face and try to waft the stench away.
entries.pillow: /pillow: PILLOW FIGHT! /pillow self: You tear up a pillow, sending feathers everywhere. /pillow target: You throw a pillow at (him, her, or it).
entries.pinch: /pinch: You make pinching motions like a shenk. /pinch self: Are you dreaming? /pinch target: You pinch (him, her, or it).
entries.pistol_drillmaster: Pistol Drillmaster: Through instruction in advanced combat techniques, your group members and you gain increased damage output and reduced action cost while using Pistols.
entries.pistolmeleedefense1: This melee attack with your pistol is useful for close encounters.
entries.pistolmeleedefense2: This melee attack with your pistol is useful for close encounters.  This is more damaging than Pistol Melee Defense 1.
entries.pistolwhip: Pistolwhip This attack must be used when in melee range and allows the attack to hit an opponent with a pistol or similar small weapon.
entries.pistolwhip_1: This enhancement to the Pistol Whip ability causes an increased amount of damage.
entries.place_bank: Grants the Politician the ability to construct new banks in a city he controls.
entries.place_cantina: This gives you the ability to place and run your own Cantina.  Cantinas must be placed within a player city.
entries.place_cityhall: With this ability the politician can create a new city by placing a City Hall.  A new city MUST have 10 citizens (including the Mayor) within 24 hours of creation in order to be approved by the Planetary Civic Authority.
entries.place_cloning: This gives you the ability to place a Cloning Facility within a player city.
entries.place_exotic_garden: This ability lets the politician place an exotic decorative garden within his city borders.
entries.place_faction_terminal: This ability allows the mayor to place faction aligned mission terminals in their city.
entries.place_fountain: This ability lets the politician place a decorative fountain within his city borders.
entries.place_garage: This allows you to place a Garage within the city limits.
entries.place_hospital: This gives you the ability to place and run your own Hospital.  Hospitals must be placed within a player city.
entries.place_large_garden: This ability lets the politician place a large decorative garden within his city borders.
entries.place_medium_garden: This ability lets the politician place a medium decorative garden within his city borders.
entries.place_merchant_tent: Gives the merchant the ability to place a unique looking tent from which to sell goods.
entries.place_shuttleport: Grants the Politician the ability to construct new shuttleports in a city he controls.
entries.place_small_garden: This ability lets the politician place a small decorative garden within his city borders.
entries.place_statue: This ability lets the politician place a decorative statue within his city borders.
entries.place_streetlamp: This ability lets the politician place a decorative streetlamp within his city borders.
entries.place_theater: This gives you the ability to place and run your own Theater.  Theaters must be placed within a player city.
entries.placebattlefieldstructure: This command allows the user to place a battlefield structure.
entries.placedshot: Placed Shot This ranged attack does more damage than Ranged Shot but has a slight ability cost.
entries.placestructuremode: This command allows the user to go into the place structure mode.
entries.plugears: /plugears: You plug your ears. /plugears self: You stick your fingers in your ears. /plugears target: You plug your ears and try to tune (him, her, or it) out. LA LA LA LA LA.
entries.plugnose: /plugnose: You pinch your nose shut. /plugnose self: You pinch your nose shut with a clothes pin. /plugnose target: You plug your nose at (target name)'s stench.
entries.point: /point: You point the way. /point self: You point at yourself. /point target: You point at (target name).
entries.pointat: /pointat:  You point the way. /pointat self:  You point at yourself. /pointat target:  You point at (target name).
entries.pointblankarea: This ranged area attack can be performed at point blank range without suffering a penalty to hit.
entries.pointblankarea2: This advanced ranged area attack can be performed at point blank range without suffering a penalty to hit. This particular maneuver has an increased chance to cause more damage than Point Blank Area 1.
entries.pointblankshot: /pointblankshot: This ranged attack ability has no minimum range penalties however a short range weapon must be used.
entries.pointblanksingle1: This ranged attack can be performed at point blank range without suffering a penalty to hit.
entries.pointblanksingle2: This ranged attack can be performed at point blank range without suffering a penalty to hit.  This move is more damaging than Point Blank Single 1.
entries.pointdown: /pointdown: You point at the ground. /pointdown self: You're staying right here! /pointdown target: You tell (target name) to stay right here.
entries.pointleft: /pointleft: You point left. /pointleft self: You point left. /pointleft target: You turn to (target name) and point left.
entries.pointright: /pointright: You point right. /pointright self: You point right. /pointright target: You turn to (target name) and point right.
entries.pointup: /pointup: You point up. /pointup self: You point up. /pointup target: You turn to (target name) and point up.
entries.poisoninnoculation: Poison Inoculation This medical enhancement allows a person with the correct medical skill to temporarily enhance the Poison Resist of themselves or their target.
entries.poisoninnoculation_1: This enhancement to the Poison Inoculation ability will grant a higher enhancement value.
entries.poke: /poke: Poke. Poke. /poke self: You poke yourself in the ribs, looking very sheepish. /poke target: You poke (him, her, or it) in the ribs.
entries.polearmactionhit1: This polearm attack targets an opponent's legs in order to WOUND a target's Action pool.
entries.polearmactionhit2: This polearm attack targets an opponent's legs in order to WOUND a target's Action pool.  It can inflict more wound damage than Polearm Action Hit 1.
entries.polearmarea1: This polearm area attack can damage multiple targets at once.
entries.polearmarea2: This polearm area attack can damage, dizzy, and stun multiple targets at once.  It is more powerful than Polearm Area 1.
entries.polearmhit1: This polearm attack causes more damage than the default polearm attack.
entries.polearmhit2: This polearm attack inflicts more damage than Polearm Hit 1, and can stun a target.
entries.polearmhit3: This powerful polearm attack inflicts more damage than Polearm Hit 2, and can stun and lower the posture of a target.
entries.polearmleghit1: This polearm attack targets an opponent's legs in order to damage a target's Action pool.
entries.polearmleghit2: This polearm attack targets an opponent's legs in order to damage a target's Action pool.  This is more damaging than Polearm Leg Hit 1.
entries.polearmleghit3: This polearm attack targets an opponent's legs in order to damage a target's Action pool.  This is more damaging than Polearm Leg Hit 2.
entries.polearmlunge1: This polearm attack allows you to slightly extend your range, and it can change the posture of your target.
entries.polearmlunge2: This polearm attack allows you to slightly extend your range, and it can knock down your target.
entries.polearmspinattack1: This polearm attack can damage multiple targets at once, by spinning your body slightly while attacking.
entries.polearmspinattack2: This polearm area attack can damage and dizzy multiple targets at once, by spinning your body slightly while attacking.  This is more damaging than Polearm Spin Attack 1.
entries.polearmstun1: This polearm attack can stun a single target.
entries.polearmstun2: This polearm area attack can stun multiple targets at once.
entries.polearmstunhit1: This polearm attack has the ability to stun a single enemy for a short duration.
entries.polearmsweep1: This polearm sweep attack can knock down a single target.
entries.polearmsweep2: This polearm area sweep attack can knock down multiple targets at once.
entries.polearmthrow: Polearm Force Throw: This force ability allows you to throw a Polearm and retrieve it from your enemy with the power of the force.
entries.ponder: /ponder: You ponder. /ponder self: You ponder your existence. /ponder target: You ponder about (him, her, or it). Hrmmm.
entries.posturedownattack: This command utilizes the posture down attack.
entries.postureupattack: This command utilizes the posture up attack.
entries.pound: /pound: You pound on your chest! /pound self: You pound on your chest, daring anyone to take you on. /pound target: You pound your chest. Will (target name) take you on?
entries.pout: /pout: You pout. /pout self: You pout at yourself. /pout target: You pout at (him, her, or it).
entries.powerattack: Power Attack This melee attack does a significant amount of damage to the target.
entries.powerattack_1: Improved Power Attack This enhancement to the Power Attack ability increases the amount of damage done to an opponent.
entries.powerboost: Power Boost This meditative art allows the user to channel mental energies into their physical form for a temporary boost to physical performance. However, such extreme mental activities cause a significantly exhausting psychological cost.
entries.preen: /preen: You preen. /preen self: You preen like a feline. /preen target: You preen gloatingly at (him, her, or it).
entries.premium_auctions: For an additional fee, you can place a Premium Auction on the bazaar.  These auctions are highlighted on the list of sales, drawing additional attention to your item.
entries.primp: /primp: You primp. /primp self: You pull a mirror from your pack and primp yourself. /primp target: You primp yourself for (target name).
entries.prod: /prod: You extract a nerf prod from your pack and brandish it smugly. /prod self: You prod yourself into action. /prod target: You prod (him, her, or it), trying to evoke some emotion.
entries.prone: Going prone brings you into a laying position, which makes you more vulnerable to melee attacks, but allows for better ranged accuracy than standing or kneeling.
entries.prop_combat_fan: Allows you to use the metal fan prop.
entries.prop_double_ribbon: Allows you to use the double ribbon dancing prop.
entries.prop_double_ribbon_magic: Allows you to use the double mystical ribbon dancing prop.
entries.prop_double_ribbon_spark: Allows you to use the double sparkle ribbon dancing prop.
entries.prop_dual_wield: This allows you to hold a dancing prop in each hand at the same time.
entries.prop_glowstick: Allows you to use the glowstick dancing prop.
entries.prop_ribbon: Allows you to use the ribbon dancing prop.
entries.prop_ribbon_magic: Allows you to use the mystical ribbon dancing prop.
entries.prop_ribbon_spark: Allows you to use the sparkle ribbon dancing prop.
entries.prop_sparkler: Allows you to use the sparkler dancing prop.
entries.prop_staff: Allows you to use the basic staff dancing prop.
entries.prop_sword: Allows you to use the basic sword dancing prop.
entries.prop_torch: Allows you to use the torch dancing prop.
entries.protect: /protect: You stand your ground. /protect self: You indicate that you need protection. /protect target: You stand defensively in front of (target name).
entries.pshrug: /pshrug:  You shrug philosophically. /pshrug self:  You shrug your shoulders philosophically. /pshrug target:  You shrug philosophically at (target name).
entries.ptrap1: /ptrap1: This command suckers a group of pirates to the local area, where they'll probably attack just about everything.
entries.ptrap2: /ptrap2: This command suckers a strong group of pirates to the local area, where they'll probably attack just about everything.
entries.pucker: /pucker: You pucker. /pucker self: You make a sour face and pucker. /pucker target: You pucker and make "fish faces" at (him, her, or it).
entries.puke: /puke: You puke. /puke self: You puke all over yourself. /puke target: You puke all over (him, her, or it).
entries.pull: /pull: You call out, "PULL!" /pull self: You raise your hand in the air and pull it back down in a victorious manner. /pull target: You try to pull (him, her, or it) along.
entries.pumpreactor: Pump Reactor Temporarily increases reactor and engine output.
entries.punch: /punch: You shadow-box. /punch self: You punch yourself in the face, giving yourself a black eye. /punch target: You punch (target name) in the face.
entries.purchasereinforcement: This command utilizes the purchase reinforcement option.
entries.purchaseticket: This command allows the user to purchase a ticket.
entries.push: /push: You make a pushing motion as if trying to keep things away from yourself. /push self: You push yourself to the ground. /push target: You push (him, her, or it) away.
entries.puzzle: /puzzle: You puzzle over the current situation. /puzzle self: You puzzle over your own thoughts. /puzzle target: You puzzle over (him, her, or it).
entries.pvp: If you are aligned with either the Rebel or Imperial factions, this ability will allow you to join or leave the Special Forces unit when in the field.
entries.pvp_airstrike_ability: Airstrike: Your high rank in the Imperial army lets you call down a TIE Bomber to take care of the enemy. For obvious reasons, this ability can not be used indoors.
entries.pvp_airstrike_rebel_ability: Airstrike: Your high rank in the Rebel Alliance lets you call down a X-Wing to take care of the enemy. For obvious reasons, this ability can not be used indoors.
entries.pvp_aura_buff_rebel_self: Legendary Warrior: The warrior able to use this effect has won so many battles that he's become a legend among his faction. His presence alone will have a dramatic effect on the combat ability of soldiers near him.
entries.pvp_aura_buff_rebel_target: You're in the presence of a legendary warrior of your faction and feel like nothing can stop you now.
entries.pvp_aura_buff_self: Legendary Warrior: The warrior able to use this effect has won so many battles that he's become a legend among his faction. His presence alone will have a dramatic effect on the combat ability of soldiers near him.
entries.pvp_aura_buff_target: You're in the presence of a legendary warrior of your faction and feel like nothing can stop you now.
entries.question: /question: You question the intent. /question self: You question your own intent. /question target: You question (his, her, or its) intent.
entries.quickdraw: Quickdraw The ranged attack has a quick recharge rate.
entries.quickdraw_1: Improved Quick Draw This enhancement to the Quick Draw ability grants an decreased recycle time.
entries.quickdraw_2: Advanced Quick Draw This enhancement to the Quick Draw ability grants a much decreased recycle time.
entries.quickheal: Quick Heal This ability allows for an instant, medicine-free pool damage heal on a target, at a very heavy Mind cost to the Medic.  This ability also causes 10 Wounds to the Medic's Willpower and Focus pools, so it must not be used lightly.
entries.quiet: /quiet: You hold your finger to your lips, indicating to be quiet. /quiet self: You quiet yourself and place your finger vertically across your lips. /quiet target: You hold an extended finger over your lips, indicating to (target name) to be quiet.
entries.r: Reply to the last person you sent a tell to.
entries.raise: /raise: You raise your hand. /raise self: You raise your hands in the air. /raise target: You raise (his, her, or its) hand and declare (him, her, or it) the victor.
entries.rally: Rally This Squad Leader command improves the combat defense and to hit modifiers of everyone in the party.  The Squad Leader must be the party's leader in order for this to function.
entries.rallypoint: Rally Point This ability creates a new waypoint that is shared by all group members.
entries.ranged_damage_mitigation_1: This ability will limit the damage range done to you when you are attacked with a ranged weapon.
entries.ranged_damage_mitigation_2: This ability will further limit the damage range done to you when you are attacked with a ranged weapon.
entries.ranged_damage_mitigation_3: This ability will further limit the damage range done to you when you are attacked with a ranged weapon.
entries.rangedshot: Ranged Shot This is the most basic ranged ability with very low damage potential and low ability cost.  ff0000 Did you know that you can select any move as an auto-attack by holding down Ctrl and left clicking the move?
entries.rapidfire: Rapid Fire This ranged attack has a large damage capability.
entries.rapidfire_1: Improved Rapid Fire This enhancement to the Rapid Fire ability improves the damage potential of the attack.
entries.rapidfire_2: Advanced Rapid Fire This enhancement to the Rapid Fire ability improves the damage potential of the attack.
entries.raspberry: /raspberry: You give everyone a raspberry. PFFFFFFTTTT!! /raspberry self: You give yourself a raspberry. /raspberry target: You give (him, her, or it) a raspberry.
entries.ready: /ready: READY! /ready self: You check to see if you are ready. /ready target: I'm ready, (target name)!
entries.reassure: /reassure: You reassure everyone that it will turn out OK. /reassure self: You reassure yourself that everything will be OK. /reassure target: You reassure (him, her, or it) that everything will be fine.
entries.recklessshot: Reckless Shot Used as a last resort this ability unleashes a large barrage of shots at the target.  This attack will place you in a very vulnerable position and causes a defensive penalty to attacker.
entries.recklessshot_1: Improved Reckless Shot This enhancement to the Reckless Shot ability has an increased defensive penalty placed on the target.
entries.recklessshot_2: Advanced Reckless Shot This enhancement to the Reckless Shot ability has an increased defensive penalty placed on the target.
entries.recon_accuracy_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Reconnaissance type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 10% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.recon_accuracy_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Reconnaissance type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 30% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.recon_accuracy_mitigate_3: This ability counters the amount of weapon accuracy reduction imposed from wearing Reconnaissance type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 40% and lower Accuracy Hindrance values.
entries.recon_firerate_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of weapon speed reduction imposed from wearing Reconnaissance type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 30% and lower Rate of Fire Hindrance values.
entries.recon_firerate_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of weapon speed reduction imposed from wearing Reconnaissance type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 40% and lower Rate of Fire Hindrance values.
entries.recon_firerate_mitigate_3: This ability counters the amount of weapon speed reduction imposed from wearing Reconnaissance type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 60% and lower Rate of Fire Hindrance values.
entries.recon_move_mitigate_1: This ability counters the amount of movement speed reduction imposed from wearing Reconnaissance type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 10% and lower Movement Speed Hindrance values.
entries.recon_move_mitigate_2: This ability counters the amount of movement speed reduction imposed from wearing Reconnaissance type armors.  This level of mitigation will reduce up to 20% and lower Movement Speed Hindrance values.
entries.recruitskilltrainer: /recruitskilltrainer: Allows the politician to place a skill trainer within the borders of his city.
entries.recusitateplayer: Recusitate Player This medical ability will allow the medic to shock and coax a dying body back to life, albeit with very low health and stats.
entries.regainconsciousness: Regain Consciousness This ability allows a Jedi to instantly recover from an unconscious state.  The Jedi will still be weak and weary but can then proceed to use other Force abilities to return to normal.
entries.registered: Your city has been registered on the planetary map.
entries.registerwithlocation: Register Location Provided the appropriate skill-set for the venue, this command allows the user to register with an inactive planetary map location marking it as active ("manned").
entries.reload: This command allows the user to reload.
entries.remotecityhousepackup: /remoteCityHousePackup: This command allows you to attempt to pack up a City Abandoned Structure without having to access the house sign.  You must be within 10 meters of the house sign for this command to activate the City House Packup process.
entries.repairbattlefieldstructure: This command allows the user to repair a battlefield structure.
entries.repairshipcomponent: Repair  a ship component in a ship.
entries.reply: Automatically sends a tell to the last person who sent you one.
entries.requestcraftingsession: This command requests a crafting session for the user.
entries.requestin_disconnect: Requesting disconnection from satellite array.  Please wait...
entries.rescue: Rescue  This enables you to anger an NPC that is on a party member, so that the NPC attacks you instead of the person you are rescuing.  This is not guaranteed to work.
entries.restartcraftingsession: This command allows the user to restart a crafting session.
entries.restrainingshot: Restraining Shot This ranged attack ability reduces the targets movement speed.
entries.restrainingshot_1: Improved Restraining Shot This enhancement to the Restraining Shot ability has an improved movement reduction.
entries.retell: Reply to the last person you sent a tell to.
entries.retreat: Retreat This very powerful Squad Leader ability drains the Squad Leader's Action and Mind pools while giving their entire group Burst Run.  Intended for hard encounters gone horribly wrong, it allows the Squad Leader to show true leadership by sacrificing themself for the greater good of their group.
entries.right: /right: You point right. /right self: You point right. /right target: You turn to (target name) and point right.
entries.roar: /roar: ROOOOOOAAAAARRRRRR!!!! /roar self: You roar loudly at yourself. /roar target: You roar loudly at (target name).
entries.rodian_ability_1: Hunter's Tenacity: You focus your determination reducing all action costs for a period of time. This special ability is a trait of the Rodian species.
entries.rofl: /rofl: Want a hand getting up? /rofl self: You roll on the floor laughing at yourself. /rofl target: You roll on the floor laughing at (target name).
entries.roll: /roll: You roll your eyes. /roll self: You roll your eyes and they fall back into your skull. /roll target: You rolls your eyes at (target name).
entries.rolleyes: /rolleyes:  You roll your eyes. /rolleyes self:  You roll your eyes and they fall back into your skull. /rolleyes target:  You roll your eyes at (target name).
entries.rollshot: Roll Shot A roll shot will cause you to kneel and attack at the same time, leaving you in a kneeling position.
entries.rose: /rose: You extend a rose and offer it. /rose self: You give yourself a rose and smell deeply of its scent. /rose target: You give (target name) a rose.  -----`---,---<@
entries.rtell: Automatically sends a tell to the last person whom you sent one to.
entries.rubnose: /rubnose: You rub your nose. /rubnose self: You rub your nose on your sleeve. /rubnose target: You rub noses with (target name).
entries.rude: /rude: You offer an unknown salute. /rude self: You give yourself a rude gesture. /rude target: You give (target name) an unknown salute.
entries.ruffle: /ruffle: You look ruffled. /ruffle self: You ruffle your own hair. /ruffle target: You ruffle (his, her, or its) hair.
entries.saber1hcombohit1: This attack allows a Jedi to hit multiple locations on the target's body. This attack will do more damage than a normal one-handed saber attack.
entries.saber1hcombohit2: This attack allows a Jedi to hit multiple locations on the target's body and has a chance to lower the target's posture. This attack is more powerful than the Saber One Hand Combo Hit 1, and will likely do more damage.
entries.saber1hcombohit3: This attack allows a Jedi to hit multiple locations on the target's body and has a chance to lower the target's posture. This attack is more powerful than the Saber One Hand Combo Hit 2, and will likely do more damage.
entries.saber1hflurry: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a devastating move with a one-handed lightsaber that damages all enemies in the immediate area, as well as inflicting stun, blind, and dizziness.
entries.saber1hflurry2: This ultimate attack allows a Jedi to perform a devastating move with a one-handed lightsaber that damages all enemies in the immediate area, as well as inflicting stun, blind, and dizziness.
entries.saber1hheadhit1: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a strike against the target's head, increasing the chance of affecting its mind pool.
entries.saber1hheadhit2: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a strike against the target's head, increasing the chance of affecting its mind pool. This attack is more powerful than the Saber One Hand Head Hit 1, and has a chance of blinding the target.
entries.saber1hheadhit3: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a strike against the target's head, increasing the chance of affecting its mind pool. This attack is more powerful than the Saber One Hand Head Hit 2, and has a chance of blinding the target.
entries.saber1hhit1: This attack allows a Jedi to do more damage than normal with a one-handed lightsaber.
entries.saber1hhit2: This attack allows a Jedi to do significantly more damage than normal with a one-handed lightsaber. This attack is more powerful than the Saber One Hand Hit 1.
entries.saber1hhit3: This attack allows a Jedi to do significantly more damage than normal with a one-handed lightsaber. This attack is more powerful than the Saber One Hand Hit 2.
entries.saber2hbodyhit1: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a strike against the target's body, increasing the chance of affecting its health pool.
entries.saber2hbodyhit2: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a strike against the target's body, increasing the chance of affecting its health pool. This attack is more powerful than Saber Two Hand Body Hit 1.
entries.saber2hbodyhit3: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a strike against the target's body, increasing the chance of affecting its health pool. This attack is more powerful than Saber Two Hand Body Hit 2.
entries.saber2hfrenzy: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a devastating move with a two-handed lightsaber that damages all enemies in the immediate area, as well as inflicting stun, blind, and dizziness.
entries.saber2hhit1: This attack allows a Jedi to do more damage than normal with a two-handed lightsaber.
entries.saber2hhit2: This attack allows a Jedi to do significantly more damage than normal with a two-handed lightsaber. This attack is more powerful than Saber Two Hand Hit 1.
entries.saber2hhit3: This attack allows a Jedi to do much more damage than normal with a two-handed lightsaber. This attack is more powerful than Saber Two Hand Hit 2.
entries.saber2hphantom: This ultimate attack allows a Jedi to perform a devastating move with a two-handed lightsaber that damages all enemies in a cone radius outwards from the Jedi, as well as inflicting stun, blind, and dizziness.
entries.saber2hsweep1: This attack allows a Jedi to cause their target to lower its posture.
entries.saber2hsweep2: This attack allows a Jedi to cause their target to lower its posture, as well as a small damage increase over Saber Two Hand Sweep 1.
entries.saber2hsweep3: This attack allows a Jedi to cause their target to lower its posture, as well as dealing more damage than Saber Two Hand Sweep 2.
entries.saber_block: Saber Block Allows a Jedi to block many types of energy bolts and several types of projectiles with a lightsaber.
entries.saberarmorbreak: Saber Armor Break This lightsaber ability reduces your targets armor effectiveness for a short period of time.
entries.saberarmorbreak_1: Improved Saber Armor Break This enhancement to the Saber Armor Break ability is more effective at reducing your targets armor effectiveness.
entries.saberblind: Saber Blind This lightsaber attack allows a Jedi the chance to blind an opponent.
entries.saberblind_1: Improved Saber Blind This enhancement to the Saber Blind Hit ability increases the chance to blind an opponent.
entries.saberblock: Saber Block: A level 26 ability that increases your parry skill for a brief period of time by deflecting incoming attacks away from yourself.
entries.saberbodyhit: Saber Body Hit This attack allows a Jedi to perform a targeted hit to an opponent's torso and arms.
entries.saberbodyhit_1: Improved Saber Body Hit This enhancement to the Saber Body Hit ability increases the amount of damage dealt.
entries.saberdervish: Saber Dervish This attack allows a Jedi to perform a devastating move with a lightsaber that damages all enemies in the immediate area.
entries.saberheadhit: Saber Head Hit This attack allows a Jedi to perform a targeted hit to an opponent's head.
entries.saberheadhit_1: Improved Saber Head Hit This enhancement to the Saber Head Hit ability increases the amount of damage dealt.
entries.saberhit: Saber Hit This is the most basic saber ability with very low damage potential but no ability cost.
entries.saberleghit: Saber Leg Hit This attack allows a Jedi to perform a targeted hit to an opponent's legs.
entries.saberleghit_1: Improved Saber Leg Hit This enhancement to the Saber Leg Hit ability increases the amount of damage dealt.
entries.saberpolearmdervish: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a devastating move with a double-bladed lightsaber that damages all enemies in the immediate area, as well as inflicting stun, blind, and dizziness.
entries.saberpolearmdervish2: This ultimate attack allows a Jedi to perform a devastating move with a double-bladed lightsaber that damages all enemies in a cone radius outward from the Jedi, as well as inflicting stun, blind, and dizzyness.
entries.saberpolearmhit1: This attack allows a Jedi to do more damage than normal with a double-bladed lightsaber.
entries.saberpolearmhit2: This attack allows a Jedi to do significantly more damage than normal with a double-bladed lightsaber. This attack is more powerful than the Saber Polearm Hit 1, and also has a chance to stun the target.
entries.saberpolearmhit3: This attack allows a Jedi to do significantly more damage than normal with a double-bladed lightsaber. This attack is more powerful than the Saber Polearm Hit 2, and also has a chance to stun the target.
entries.saberpolearmleghit1: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a strike against the target's legs, increasing the chance of affecting its action pool.
entries.saberpolearmleghit2: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a precise against a target's legs, increasing the chance of affecting its action pool. This attack is more powerful than the Saber Polearm Leg Hit 1.
entries.saberpolearmleghit3: This attack allows a Jedi to perform a strike against a target's legs, increasing the chance of affecting its action pool. This attack is more powerful than the Saber Polearm Leg Hit 2.
entries.saberpolearmspinattack1: This attack allows a Jedi to deal damage to all enemies in the immediate area.
entries.saberpolearmspinattack2: This attack allows a Jedi to do increased damage to all enemies in the immediate area. This attack is more powerful than Saber Polearm Spin Attack 1, and also has a slightly increased range.
entries.saberpolearmspinattack3: This attack allows a Jedi to do increased damage to all enemies in the immediate area. This attack is more powerful than Saber Polearm Spin Attack 2, and also has a slightly increased range.
entries.saberpowerattack: Saber Power Attack This attack allows a Jedi to do much more damage than normal with a lightsaber.
entries.saberpowerattack_1: Improved Saber Power Attack This enhancement to the Saber Power Attack ability increases the amount of damage dealt.
entries.saberslash: Saber Slash This lightsaber attack allows a Jedi the chance to cause the target to bleed.
entries.saberslash1: This attack allows a Jedi to cause the target to bleed, as well as lower the target's posture. This attack can be used with all lightsaber types.
entries.saberslash2: This attack allows a Jedi to cause the target to bleed, as well as lower the target's posture. This attack is more powerful than Saber Slash 1 and can be used with all lightsaber types.
entries.saberslash_1: Improved Saber Slash This enhancement to the Saber Slash ability increases the chance to cause the target to bleed.
entries.saberspinattack: Saber Spin Attack This lightsaber attack allows a Jedi to deal damage to an area around the Jedi.
entries.saberspinattack_1: Improved Saber Spin Attack This enhancement to the Saber Spin Attack ability increases the amount of damage dealt.
entries.saberstrike: Saber Strike This lightsaber attack has low damage potential and very low ability cost.
entries.saberstrike_1: Improved Saber Strike This enhancement to the Saber Strike ability increases the amount of damage.
entries.saberstunstrike: Saber Stun Strike This lightsaber attack allows a Jedi the chance to cause the target to stun.
entries.saberstunstrike_1: Improved Saber Stun Strike This enhancement to the Saber Stun Strike ability increases the chance to cause the target to bleed.
entries.sabersweep: Saber Sweep This lightsaber attack allows a Jedi the chance to knockdown their target.
entries.sabersweep_1: Improved Saber Sweep This enhancement to the Saber Sweep ability increases the chance to knockdown the target.
entries.saberswipe: Saber Swipe This lightsaber attack allows a Jedi the chance to dizzy their target.
entries.saberswipe_1: Improved Saber Swipe This enhancement to the Saber Swipe ability increases the chance to dizzy the target.
entries.saberthrow: Saber Throw This attack allows a Jedi to attack from a distance by throwing his or her lightsaber.
entries.saberthrow1: This attack allows a Jedi to attack from a distance by throwing his or her lightsaber.
entries.saberthrow2: This attack allows a Jedi to do greater damage from a distance by throwing his or her lightsaber and guiding it with the Force. A successful attack will also cause a chance to knock your opponent down.
entries.saberthrow3: This attack allows a Jedi to attack multiple targets from a distance by throwing his or her lightsaber and guiding it with the Force. A successful attack will also cause a chance to knock your opponent down.
entries.saberthrow_1: Improved Saber Throw This enhancement to the Saber Throw ability increases the amount of damage dealt.
entries.saberthrow_2: Advanced Saber Throw This enhancement to the Saber Throw ability increases the amount of damage dealt.
entries.salute: /salute: You salute. /salute self: You stand at attention and salute yourself. /salute target: You salute (target name).
entries.sample: The sample command is used in conjunction with a sample tool.  When you sample your character will take a sample of whatever resource you last selected from the sample tool UI.  This allows you to perform sampling without using the sample tool UI.
entries.sampledna: Sample DNA This Bio-Engineer ability allows you to sample the DNA of a creature.  You must be fairly close to it for this to function correctly.
entries.scare: /scare: BOO! /scare self: You scare yourself. /scare target: You sneak up and try to scare (him, her, or it).
entries.scared: /scared: You jump and whip around to face the noise. /scared self: You shrink away, looking very scared. /scared target: You shrink away from (target name), looking very scared of (him, her, or it).
entries.scatterhit: Scatter Hit This melee attack ability distributes damage over multiple areas of the opponent.
entries.scatterhit_1: Improved Scatter Hit This enhancement to the Scatter Hit ability causes more damage to the opponent.
entries.scattershot: Scatter Shot This ranged attack distributes damage over multiple locations of the opponent.
entries.scattershot1: This ranged attack can hit multiple stat pools on a target at once.
entries.scattershot2: This ranged attack can hit multiple stat pools on a target at once. This is a more damaging attack than Scatter Shot 1.
entries.scattershot_1: Improved Scatter Shot This enhancement to the Scatter Shot ability increases the amount of damage done.
entries.scold: /scold: You produce a measuring stick and brandish it authoritatively. /scold self: You scold yourself with slap on the hand. /scold target: You scold (him, her, or it).
entries.scowl: /scowl: You scowl. /scowl self: You scowl at yourself. /scowl target: You scowl at (him, her, or it).
entries.scratch: /scratch: You scratch an itch. /scratch self: You scratch the nape of your neck pensively. /scratch target: You scratch (his, her, or its) back.
entries.scream: /scream: AAAARRRRRGGGGHHHHH!!! /scream self: You scream loudly at yourself in frustration. /scream target: You scream with frustration in (his, her, or its) ear.
entries.searchlair: Use this command to search the targeted lair for hidden treasures.
entries.secondchance: Second Chance This powerful ability allows a Master Squad Leader to improve the odds of surviving a desperate fight by distributing all damage and wounds evenly across all group members.
entries.seenoevil: /seenoevil: SEE NO EVIL!! /seenoevil self: You peek through your fingers covering your eyes. /seenoevil target: You peek through your fingers at (target name).
entries.selectdraftschematic: This command selects a draft schematic.
entries.send: This command allows the user to send a tell or mail to another player.
entries.serotonininjection: Serotonin Injection This medical enhancement ability allows the temporary enhancement to the rate of your Mind regeneration.
entries.serotonininjection_1: Improved  Serotonin Injection This enhancement to the Serotonin Injection ability grants a larger amount of Mind enhanced as well as a small boost to Mind regeneration rate.
entries.setformation: Set Formation Set the formation that a group should use in space.
entries.setformationslot: Set Formation Slot Set the targeted group member into a slot from 1 to 20.
entries.setspokenlanguage: This command sets a spoken language.
entries.shake: /shake: You shake your head negatively. /shake self: You shake your head negatively at yourself. /shake target: You shake your head negatively at (him, her, or it).
entries.sharpen: /sharpen: You sharpen your nails. /sharpen self: You sharpen your teeth with a file. /sharpen target: You sharpen a blade menacingly at (him, her, or it).
entries.shiver: /shiver: You shiver. /shiver self: You shiver and rub your arms in an attempt to warm up. /shiver target: You shiver at the coldness surrounding (target name).
entries.shock: Shock This offensive ranged medical ability causes a reduction in the target's ability to resist state effects.
entries.shock_1: Improved Shock This enhancement to the Shock ability is much more powerful and will reduce more state resists.
entries.shoo: /shoo: You ask everyone to just leave. /shoo self: You're asking yourself to leave? /shoo target: You tell (target name) to leave.
entries.shower: /shower: You go to take a shower. /shower self: You shower yourself in water from a jug. /shower target: You politely inform (target name) that (he, she or it) needs to take a shower.
entries.shrug: /shrug: You shrug. /shrug self: You shrug your shoulders helplessly. /shrug target: You shrug helplessly at (target name).
entries.shudder: /shudder: You shudder. /shudder self: You shudder at the thought. /shudder target: You shudder at (him, her, or it).
entries.shush: /shush: SHUSH! /shush self: You shush yourself. /shush target: You quickly shush (him, her, or it).
entries.sigh: /sigh: You sigh. /sigh self: You sigh with relief. /sigh target: You sigh at (him, her, or it).
entries.sit: This command will bring you into a sitting position, from which combat is not possible.  If furniture is not present, you will sit on the ground.
entries.skip: /skip: You skip around the area. /skip self: You skip in figure eights. /skip target: You skip around (target name).
entries.slap: /slap: WAKE UP! You slap yourself in the face. *SMACK!* /slap self: You slap yourself silly. /slap target: You slap (him, her, or it) across the face.
entries.slice_armor: With "Slicing: Armor" the smuggler gains the ability to make modifications to the stats of armor from the "Slice" radial menu option on the armor piece.
entries.slice_containers: With "Slicing: Containers" smugglers get the option to hack into locked containers with a "Slice" radial menu option.
entries.slice_sockets: With "Slicing: Sockets" the smuggler can hack equipment to potentially add an extra expansion socket to the item.
entries.slice_terminals: With "Slicing: Terminals" the smuggler gains the ability to hack mission terminals for extra pay using the "Slice" radial menu option.
entries.slice_weaponsadvanced: With "Slicing: Weapons (Advanced)" the smuggler gains the ability to make more effective modifications to the stats of a weapon from the "Slice" radial menu option on the weapon.
entries.slice_weaponsbasic: With "Slicing: Weapons (Basic)" the smuggler gains the ability to make small modifications to the stats of a weapon from the "Slice" radial menu option on the weapon.
entries.slit: /slit: Someone's gonna die. /slit self: You think you're not long for this world. /slit target: You don't think (target name) is long for this world.
entries.slitherhorn: This ability allows you to plays songs with the Slitherhorn instrument.
entries.slobber: /slobber: Need a bib? /slobber self: You slobber all over yourself. /slobber target: You slobber all over (him, her, or it).
entries.sm_ae_cover_fire: Cover Fire 1: A hail of gunfire used to slow the enemies' advance with a level 7 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_1: Fan Shot 1: A blaze of shots in a cone to hit multiple targets with a level 30 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_2: Fan Shot 2: A blaze of shots in a cone to hit multiple targets with a level 42 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_3: Fan Shot 3: A blaze of shots in a cone to hit multiple targets with a level 54 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_4: Fan Shot 4: A blaze of shots in a cone to hit multiple targets with a level 66 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_5: Fan Shot 5: A blaze of shots in a cone to hit multiple targets with a level 74 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_6: Fan Shot 6: A blaze of shots in a cone to hit multiple targets with a level 90 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_1: Cover Fire 2: A hail of gunfire used to slow the enemies' advance with a level 14 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_2: Cover Fire 3: A hail of gunfire used to slow the enemies' advance with a level 22 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_3: Cover Fire 4: A hail of gunfire used to slow the enemies' advance with a level 34 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_4: Cover Fire 5: A hail of gunfire used to slow the enemies' advance with a level 46 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_5: Cover Fire 6: A hail of gunfire used to slow the enemies' advance with a level 58 attack.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_melee_1: Pin Down 2: A level 14 melee attack that strikes multiple enemies and slows their advance.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_melee_2: Pin Down 3: A level 22 melee attack that strikes multiple enemies and slows their advance.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_melee_3: Pin Down 4: A level 34 melee attack that strikes multiple enemies and slows their advance.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_melee_4: Pin Down 5: A level 46 melee attack that strikes multiple enemies and slows their advance.
entries.sm_ae_dm_cc_melee_5: Pin Down 6: A level 58 melee attack that strikes multiple enemies and slows their advance.
entries.sm_ae_dm_melee_1: Brawler Swipe 1: A wild level 30 swipe that does bonus damage to nearby enemies.
entries.sm_ae_dm_melee_2: Brawler Swipe 2: A wild level 42 swipe that does bonus damage to nearby enemies.
entries.sm_ae_dm_melee_3: Brawler Swipe 3: A wild level 54 swipe that does bonus damage to nearby enemies.
entries.sm_ae_dm_melee_4: Brawler Swipe 4: A wild level 66 swipe that does bonus damage to nearby enemies.
entries.sm_ae_dm_melee_5: Brawler Swipe 5: A wild level 74 swipe that does bonus damage to nearby enemies.
entries.sm_ae_dm_melee_6: Brawler Swipe 6: A wild level 90 swipe that does bonus damage to nearby enemies.
entries.sm_ae_pin_down: Pin Down 1: A level 7 melee attack that strikes multiple enemies and slows their advance.
entries.sm_bad_odds_1: Bad Odds 1: A level 34 poisonous attack that causes your opponent to take damage over time.
entries.sm_bad_odds_2: Bad Odds 2: A level 46 poisonous attack that causes your opponent to take damage over time.
entries.sm_bad_odds_3: Bad Odds 3: A level 58 poisonous attack that causes your opponent to take damage over time.
entries.sm_bad_odds_4: Bad Odds 4: A level 74 poisonous attack that causes your opponent to take damage over time.
entries.sm_bad_odds_5: Bad Odds 5: A level 84 poisonous attack that causes your opponent to take damage over time.

entries.sm_end_of_the_line: End of the Line: Buffs you with the ability to deal double damage once, when you critical hit.
entries.sm_false_hope: False Hope: Toss a fake crate of goods booby trapped with a stun device.
entries.sm_fast_draw: Fast Draw: A quick level 1 attack that causes bonus damage.
entries.sm_fast_talk: Fast Talk: During combat on a smuggling run, you can Fast Talk to confuse your attackers about your illegal cargo.
entries.sm_how_are_you: We're all fine here now, thank you. How are you?: When used all individuals currently angry with the smuggler have a chance to leave the smuggler alone.
entries.sm_impossible_odds: Impossible Odds: A debuff that increases the chance for a target to be hit.
entries.sm_inside_information: Inside Information: Communicates with a contact within Jabba's palace to get information on bounties.
entries.sm_inspect_cargo: Inspect Cargo: Find Illicit Goods allows you to search a corpse for contraband.
entries.sm_modify_pistol_1: Modify Pistol 1: A level 30 modification that allows a 4% bonus to damage with pistols.  It requires one modification part from smuggling missions.
entries.sm_modify_pistol_2: Modify Pistol 2: A level 58 modification that allows a 8% bonus to damage with pistols.  It requires one modification part from smuggling missions.
entries.sm_modify_pistol_3: Modify Pistol 3: A level 86 modification that allows a 12% bonus to damage with pistols.  It requires one modification part from smuggling missions.
entries.sm_narrow_escape_1: Narrow Escape 1: A level 34 buff that cures you of snares and makes you temporarily immune to being snared.
entries.sm_narrow_escape_2: Narrow Escape 2: A level 50 buff that cures you of snares and makes you temporarily immune to being snared.

entries.sm_nerf_herder: Nerf Herder: A self buff that allows your next critical hit with a special action to root your opponent.
entries.sm_off_the_books: Off the Books: Communicates with a junk dealer to visit your location for party members to sell to.
entries.sm_off_the_cuff: Off the Cuff: Buffs you with the ability to strike a critical hit with your next attack.
entries.sm_pistol_whip_1: Pistol Whip 1: A melee attack with a pistol or melee weapon that causes damage.  It can be trained to stun an enemy, causing that enemy to be rooted and unable to attack.
entries.sm_pistol_whip_2: Pistol Whip 2: A melee attack with a pistol or melee weapon that causes damage.  It can be trained to stun an enemy, causing that enemy to be rooted and unable to attack.
entries.sm_pistol_whip_3: Pistol Whip 3: A melee attack with a pistol or melee weapon that causes damage.  It can be trained to stun an enemy, causing that enemy to be rooted and unable to attack.
entries.sm_pistol_whip_4: Pistol Whip 4: A melee attack with a pistol that causes damage.  It can be trained to stun an enemy, causing that enemy to be rooted and unable to attack.
entries.sm_precision_strike: Precision Strike 1: A precise level 1 strike that causes bonus damage.
entries.sm_sh_0: Heal: A level 7 healing ability used to recover a small amount of health
entries.sm_sh_1: Self Preservation: Use your smuggler instincts to cure battle wounds for a level 34 heal.
entries.sm_sh_2: Survival Instinct: Use your smuggler instincts to cure battle wounds for a level 58 heal.
entries.sm_sh_3: Vitality: Use your smuggler instincts to cure battle wounds for a level 82 heal.
entries.sm_shoot_first_1: Shoot First 1: A level 34 attack that does massive damage and can initiate combat with Bounty Hunters hunting you.
entries.sm_shoot_first_2: Shoot First 2: A level 46 attack that does massive damage and can initiate combat with Bounty Hunters hunting you.

entries.sm_skullduggery: Skullduggery: A debuff that increases a target's chance to miss.
entries.sm_sly_lie: Sly Lie: While on a smuggler quest, Sly Lie can be used before combat by telling a lie that your cargo is not illegal.
entries.sm_spot_a_sucker_1: Spot a Sucker 1: A powerful debuff that lowers precision on the target.
entries.sm_spot_a_sucker_2: Spot a Sucker 2: A powerful debuff that lowers precision on the target.
entries.sm_spot_a_sucker_3: Spot a Sucker 3: A powerful debuff that lowers precision on the target.

entries.sm_summon_medic: Call a Favor 2: The smuggler calls in a favor for a medic to aid in combat.
entries.sm_summon_smuggler: Call a Favor 1: Smuggler calls in a favor for aid in combat.
entries.small: /small: You hold your hands about 2 fists apart, signifying it was small. /small self: You guess that it would be small. /small target: You indicate to (target name) that is was small.
entries.smell: /smell: You smell the air. /smell self: You smell yourself. /smell target: You smell (him, her, or it).
entries.smile: /smile: You smile. /smile self: You smile at yourself. /smile target: You smile at (target name).
entries.smirk: /smirk: You smirk. /smirk self: You smirk at yourself. /smirk target: You smirk at (target name).
entries.smokebomb: Smoke Bomb Performs a smoke cloud effect.
entries.smokegrenade: Smoke Grenade Tosses a smoke grenade on the ground allowing you to briefly disappear from view, breaking your current enemy encounters.
entries.smokegrenade_1: Medium Smoke Grenade Tosses a smoke grenade on the ground allowing you to briefly disappear from view, breaking your current enemy encounters.
entries.smokegrenade_2: Heavy Smoke Grenade Tosses a smoke grenade on the ground allowing you to briefly disappear from view, breaking your current enemy encounters.
entries.snap: /snap: SNAP! /snap self: Shucks! /snap target: You snap beckoningly at (him, her, or it).
entries.snarl: /snarl: You snarl, baring your teeth. /snarl self: You snarl and grumble surly under your breath. /snarl target: You snarl at (him, her, or it).
entries.sneak: Sneak Sneak is an innate ability that allows you to slowly move while prone and taking cover.
entries.sneer: /sneer: You sneer. /sneer self: You sneer at the thought. /sneer target: You sneer at (him, her, or it).
entries.sneeze: /sneeze: AAAAACHOOOO! /sneeze self: You sneeze, covering your hands in a mucous substance. /sneeze target: You sneeze at (target name), covering (him, her, or it) with slime.
entries.snicker: /snicker: You snicker. /snicker self: You snicker at your own evil thoughts. /snicker target: You snicker at (him, her, or it).
entries.sniff: /sniff: You sniff sadly. /sniff self: You sniff sadly to yourself. /sniff target: You sniff sadly at (him, her, or it).
entries.sniffle: /sniffle: You sniffle. /sniffle self: You sniffle to yourself. /sniffle target: You sniffle at (target name).
entries.snipershot: Sniper Shot This ranged attack takes a long time to set up but delivers a significant amount of damage from long ranges.  You must be at least 20 meters away from your target to use this ability.
entries.snipershot_1: Improved Sniper Shot This enhancement to the Sniper Shot ability increases the amount of damage done to an opponent. You must be at least 20 meters away from your target to use this ability.
entries.snipershot_2: Advanced Sniper Shot This enhancement to the Sniper Shot ability increases the amount of damage done to an opponent and reduces the amount of time it takes to set up the attack.  You must be at least 20 meters away from your target to use this ability.
entries.snog: /snog: ~ /snog self: You attempt snogging yourself. /snog target: You attempt to engage in some serious snogging with (target name).
entries.snore: /snore: You snore loudly. /snore self: You snore softly. /snore target: You snore loudly at (target name), displaying your boredom.
entries.snort: /snort: SNORT! /snort self: You snort derisively. /snort target: You snort at (target name).
entries.soapbox: /soapbox: You place a soapbox on the ground and offer the use of it. /soapbox self: You place a soapbox on the ground, climb upon it, and begin to speak. /soapbox target: You try to pull (him, her, or it) down from (his, her, or its) soapbox.
entries.softclap: /softclap: You show your approval with a soft applause. /softclap self: You give yourself a soft applause. /softclap target: You give (him, her, or it) an approving, soft applause.
entries.sp_action_regen: Fight or Flight: Survival instincts kick in, your action regeneration and movement speeds are increased for a short period of time.
entries.sp_ambush_snipe_0: Grants the Ambush (melee) and Snipe (ranged) high damage attack lines made from stealth.
entries.sp_assassins_mark: Marks the target for death causing attacks to sometimes deal an additional default attack.

entries.sp_hide_device_1: Conceal Device: Granted at level 90, this allows you to hide concealable devices such as traps from view.  No one will see the device but you.

entries.sp_neutralize_device_1: Neutralize Device: Granted at level 90, this allows you to make an attempt to neutralize a hostile device such as a trap or mine.  If you are not successful in your attempt, you will likely suffer grave injury.
entries.sp_preparation: Preparation: This level 34 ability grants a short damage increase buff for a burst of damage output.
entries.sp_ranged_stealth_4: Snipe 5: A powerful level 60 ranged attack from stealth that causes a very large increase in damage.
entries.sp_reveal_shadows: Reveal Shadows: This level 10 ability will attempt to reveal all hidden targets in the vicinity of the spy.
entries.sp_run_its_course: Run its Course: This Level 10 ability removes all poison, disease and bleed DOT effects from the spy and makes the spy immune to further DOT application for the duration.

entries.sp_shifty_setup: Shifty Setup: This ability allows a spy to prepare for a single strike against a target.  The buff decreases a target's chance to dodge, block, parry, or be glancing blowed by 20% and decreases your chance to critical hit and strike-through by 20%.  It is removed after using one ability.
entries.sp_smoke_mirrors: Smoke and Mirrors: Allows the use of stealth only abilities while active.
