entries.sp_without_a_trace: Without a Trace: This level 34 improved smoke bomb can allow the spy to escape from combat and hide from enemy detection for a short time.
entries.space_navigator: The Sullustan race is very savvy at navigating space lanes. Their hyperspace recycle time is much shorter than normal species.
entries.spam: /spam: SPAM! /spam self: You send yourself reeling and your head spinning. /spam target: You tell (him, her, or it) to QUIT SPAMMING!
entries.speaknoevil: /speaknoevil: You cover your mouth. /speaknoevil self: You stare blankly forward with your hand over your mouth. /speaknoevil target: You cover your mouth and refuse to speak.
entries.spin: /spin: You spin around to see who is behind you. /spin self: You spin around and make yourself dizzy. /spin target: You spin (target name) around until (him, her, or it) is dizzy.
entries.spinattack: Spin Attack This melee attack causes damage to all opponents in melee range.
entries.spinattack_1: Improved Spin Attack This enhancement to the Spin Attack ability increases the amount of damage done to opponents.
entries.spit: /spit: You spit. /spit self: You spit in your hands and prepare to get down to business. /spit target: You spit at (him, her, or it).
entries.splitcreditswithgroup: /splitCreditsWithGroup <amount>: allows a group member to split the specified amount of coins amongst nearby player group members.
entries.sprayshot: Spray Shot This ranged attack damages all opponents in a tight cone in front of the attacker.
entries.sprayshot_1: Improved Spray Shot This enhancement to the Spray Shot ability increases the amount of damage done.
entries.squeeze: /squeeze: You squeeze your emotion management toy. /squeeze self: You squeeze yourself. /squeeze target: You squeeze (target name) tightly.
entries.squirm: /squirm: You squirm. /squirm self: You squirm uneasily. /squirm target: You try to squirm away from (target name).
entries.stabilizers: Stabilizers This medical ability grants the medic the chance to clear state effects from a target.  This ability will not always clear all states nor always succeed.
entries.stabilizers_1: Improved Stabilizers This enhancement to the Stabilizers ability has a greater chance to remove states.
entries.stand: This command will bring you to a standing position.
entries.stare: /stare: You stare blankly into space. /stare self: You try to stare yourself down and go cross-eyed. /stare target: You stare at (target name).
entries.startdance+peiyi: Pei Yi Starts the Pei Yi dance.
entries.startleshot: Startle Shot This ranged attack directed in front of an opponent an sweeping towards them causes minimal damage but will force them up a posture level.
entries.startleshot1: This ranged attack is meant to startle your opponent into a raised position.  If they were lying prone, they kneel, if they were kneeling, they stand up.
entries.startleshot2: This ranged attack is meant to startle your opponent into a raised position.  If they were lying prone, they kneel, if they were kneeling, they stand up.  This causes more damage than Startle Shot 1.
entries.startleshot_1: Improved Startle Shot This enhancement to the Startle Shot ability increases the amount of damage done.
entries.startleshot_2: Advanced Startle Shot This enhancement to the Startle Shot ability increases the amount of damage and delays an opponents ability to attack back for a short period.
entries.stasis: Stasis This ability allows the Jedi to daze an opponent, completely stopping their ability to move or attack for a short period of time.  Any damage done to the target during that time will bring them back to their sense and allow them to react again.
entries.steadyaim: Steady Aim This group ability increases the accuracy of all group members.  Only one group enhancement can be active at time.
entries.steal: Steal: This level 14 ability allows you to relieve a humanoid from some of their belongings.
entries.steam: /steam: You boil with rage as steam pours from the top of your head. /steam self: You notice that steam is pouring off your body. /steam target: You boil over with rage at (target name).
entries.stink: /stink: What is that smell?! /stink self: UGH! You DO stink! /stink target: That bad huh? Guess so since you just told (him, her, or it).
entries.stomp: /stomp: *STOMP* *STOMP* /stomp self: You stomp around, ready to mosh. /stomp target: You stomp on (him, her, or it).
entries.stop: /stop: Everybody stop! /stop self: You bravely try to stop the onrushing world. /stop target: You order (target name) to stop.
entries.stopbleeding: Stop Bleeding Causes the target to stop bleeding, negating that particular damage over time state.
entries.stopcraftingsession: This command allows the user to stop a crafting session.
entries.stopfollow: Use this command to immediately stop following somebody (initiated via /follow).
entries.stoppingshot: Stopping Shot This ranged attack to an opponents legs and feet has the ability to stop their forward movement for a very short time however very little damage is usually done.
entries.stoppingshot_1: Improved Stopping Shot This enhancement to the Stopping Shot ability increases the amount of time that the opponents movement is delayed.
entries.stoppingshot_2: Advanced Stopping Shot This enhancement to the Stopping Shot ability increases the amount of time that the opponents movement is delayed.
entries.storyassistantinvite: Invite a player to be your assistant in running your story.
entries.storyassistantremoval: Remove one of your storyteller assistants.
entries.storyautodeclineinvites: This command will cause you to automatically decline all Storyteller invitations that you receive. This includes automatically declining invitations to be a Storyteller Assistant. Using the command again will allow you to receive Storyteller invitations normally.
entries.storyquit: Leave the story of which you are currently a member.
entries.storyremoval: Remove a player from your story.
entries.strafeshot1: This ranged attack clears your enemy out of a covered state, making them more vulnerable to attack.
entries.strafeshot2: This ranged attack clears your enemy out of a covered state, making them more vulnerable to attack.
entries.strangle: /strangle: You strangle yourself. /strangle self: Your eyes bulge from your skull due to lack of breathable air. /strangle target: You strangle (him, her, or it).
entries.stretch: /stretch: You stretch. /stretch self: You warm up with a few stretching exercises. /stretch target: You help (him, her, or it) stretch.
entries.structurestatus: This command allows the user to view the status of a structure.
entries.strut: /strut: You strut. /strut self: You strut about like a lantern bird displaying his feathers. /strut target: You strut around (him, her, or it).
entries.stunattack: Stun Attack This command utilizes the stun attack sequence.
entries.stungrenade: Stun Grenade Throws a stun grenade at your target causing all enemies within range to be stunned.  Enemies cannot take actions while stunned.  Causing damage to a stunned enemy will break the stun.
entries.stungrenade_1: Advanced Stun Grenade Throws a stun grenade at your target causing all enemies within range to be stunned.  Enemies cannot take actions while stunned.  Causing damage to a stunned enemy will break the stun.
entries.stungrenade_2: Superior Stun Grenade Throws a stun grenade at your target causing all enemies within range to be stunned.  Enemies cannot take actions while stunned.  Causing damage to a stunned enemy will break the stun.
entries.stunningblow: Stunning Blow This melee attack does minimal damage but has a chance to stun an opponent preventing them from regenerating ability points for a short period of time.
entries.stunningblow_1: Improved Stunning Blow This enhancement to Stunning Blow increases the chance of stunning an opponent.
entries.stunrecovery: Stun Recovery This ability allows you to recover immediately from being stunned if you have enough ability points.
entries.sulk: /sulk: You sulk. /sulk self: You sulk to yourself. /sulk target: You sulk at (him, her, or it).
entries.sullustan_ability_1: Tech Knowledge: You focus your keen powers of observation to determine the optimum spot to attack an opponent, greatly increasing your chance for a critical hit. This special ability is a trait of the Sullustan species.
entries.summon: /summon: You make a summoning gesture. /summon self: You summon all of your strength and courage. /summon target: You summon (him, her, or it).
entries.suppressionfire: Suppression Fire This ranged attack ability sprays a cone of effect in front of the attacker that significantly impedes all opponents ability to move towards the attacker.  This ability requires an automatic weapon to perform.
entries.suppressionfire1: This ranged attack is used to drive your opponent into a lower position.  If they were standing, they kneel, if they were kneeling, they go prone.
entries.suppressionfire2: This ranged attack is used to drive your opponent into a lower position.  If they were standing, they kneel, if they were kneeling, they go prone.
entries.suppressionfire_1: Improved Suppression Fire This enhancement to the Suppression Fire ability increases the size of the cone affected by the ability.
entries.suppressionfire_2: Advanced Suppression Fire This enhancement to the Suppression Fire ability increases the size of the cone affected by the ability.
entries.surprised: /surprised: Surprising, isn't it? /surprised self: You look at yourself, completely surprised. /surprised target: You look at (him, her, or it), completely surprised.
entries.surpriseshot: Surprise Shot This ranged sneak attack must be performed from cover.
entries.surrender: /surrender: You surrender. /surrender self: You surrender yourself to your base instincts. /surrender target: You concede and surrender to (target name).
entries.surrenderskill: This command is used to surrender a skill.
entries.survey: Survey  The survey command is used in conjunction with a sample tool.  When you survey your character will survey for whatever resource you last selected in the sample tool UI.  This allows you to perform a survey without using the sample tool UI.
entries.swat: /swat: You swat at the air frantically. /swat self: You swat yourself. /swat target: You swat (him, her, or it) like an insect.
entries.sweat: /sweat: You sweat profusely. /sweat self: You wipe the sweat from your brow and fling it to the ground. /sweat target: You shake your body like a canine sending sweat flying at (him, her, or it).
entries.sweep: /sweep: You sweep the floor. /sweep self: You try your best to look busy and sweep the floor. /sweep target: You hand (him, her, or it) a broom.
entries.sweepattack: Sweep Attack This melee attack does minimal damage with a good chance of knocking down any opponent in melee range.
entries.sweepattack_1: Improved Sweep Attack This enhancement to the Sweep Attack ability increases your chance of knocking down opponents in the immediate area.
entries.sweepattack_2: Advanced Sweep Attack This enhancement to the Sweep Attack ability almost guarantees the chance to knock down opponents in the immediate area.
entries.swordflurry: Sword Flurry This melee attack has an improved damage capability as well as granting a defensive benefit.
entries.swordflurry_1: Improved Sword Flurry This enhancement to the Sword Flurry ability grants an improved damage potential as well as larger defensive benefit.
entries.sysgroup: Group System Message This command sends a system message to your group members, so that they see it immediately and in the center of their screens.
entries.sysmessage: Group System Message This command sends a system message to your group members, so that they see it immediately and in the center of their screens. just type "/sysGroup <your message>". If you would like to add your target's name, add %TT to your message.
entries.tackle: /tackle: You hunker down into a three-point stance. /tackle self: You tackle yourself to the ground. /tackle target: You tackle (him, her, or it) to the ground.
entries.tactics: Tactics This group ability increases the defense ratings of all group members.  Only one group enhancement can be active at time.
entries.tag: /tag: You announce that you are playing tag. /tag self: Who's it? /tag target: TAG! You're it, (target name).
entries.take_cover: Take Cover Taking Cover allows the use of certain sneak attacks and gives you additional defense.  While in Cover, you can not move unless you have the Sneak skill.
entries.takecover: Take Cover Taking Cover allows the use of certain sneak attacks and gives you additional defense.  While in Cover, you can not move unless you have the Sneak skill.
entries.tame: Tame Allows you to try to tame a creature.
entries.tantrum: /tantrum: You throw a tantrum. /tantrum self: You know you were wrong but throw a fit anyway. /tantrum target: You throw a tantrum at (him, her, or it).
entries.tap: /tap: You tap your foot impatiently. /tap self: You tap your fingers on the table. /tap target: You tap (target name) on (his, her, or its) shoulder.
entries.targetanatomy: Target Anatomy Uses your medical knowledge to cause greater damage to your opponent's by targeting vital portions of their anatomy.
entries.targetanatomy_1: Improved Target Anatomy Uses your medical knowledge to cause greater damage to your opponent's by targeting vital portions of their anatomy.
entries.targetanatomy_2: Advanced Target Anatomy Uses your medical knowledge to cause greater damage to your opponent's by targeting vital portions of their anatomy.
entries.taunt: Taunt Increases the aggro that a mob in combat has towards you. This ability is useful to get mobs to attack you instead of other party members.
entries.taunt_1: Improved Taunt This enhancement to the Taunt ability has a greater chance of increasing the aggro that a mob in combat has towards you.
entries.teach: This command allows a user to teach another player what he/she knows about a certain skill. Unlike training with a skill trainer, learning from another player has no cost.
entries.tease: /tease: Just teasing! /tease self: You tease your hair. /tease target: You tease (him, her, or it).
entries.tell: This allows you to send a message instantly across the galaxy to a person whose name you know.  You can also send messages to multiple people via the following format: /tell ogakk,echuta,gekko <message> will send the same message to Ogakk, Echuta, and Gekko at the same time.  There must be no spaces between the commas and names for this additional function to work correctly.
entries.tellpetattack: Attack Order: Order all active pets within 100m to attack your target.
entries.tellpetfollow: Fall In: Order all active pets within 100m to follow you.
entries.tenddamage: Tend Damage This ability heals health and action damage without the need for a stimpack.  Using this causes minor wounding to your focus and willpower.
entries.tendwound: Tend Wound This ability heals the wounds of a specified physical attribute without the need for medicine.  Using this causes minor wounding to your focus and willpower.
entries.terminatetarget: Terminate Target Makes use of your special ops combat training to land a particularly lethal attack on your opponent.
entries.terminatetarget_1: Improved Terminate Target Makes use of your special ops combat training to land a particularly lethal attack on your opponent.
entries.terminatetarget_2: Advanced Terminate Target Makes use of your special ops combat training to land a particularly lethal attack on your opponent.
entries.thank: /thank: You thank everyone. /thank self: You thank yourself. /thank target: You thank (him, her, or it).
entries.thirst: /thirst: Feeling parched? /thirst self: You feel so thirsty and beg for a drink. /thirst target: You beg (target name) for a drink.
entries.threatenshot: Threaten Shot This ranged attack is useful for making skittish things flee from you.
entries.throw: /throw: You throw pebble-sized stones, aimlessly passing the time. /throw self: You throw yourself at the enemy. /throw target: You throw (target name) at the enemy.
entries.throwat: /throwat:  You throw pebble-sized stones, aimlessly passing the time. /throwat self:  You throw yourself at the enemy. /throwat target:  You throw (target name) at the enemy.
entries.throwdown: /throwdown: You throw down the gauntlet. /throwdown self: There can only be one! /throwdown target: You throw down the gauntlet at (his, her, or its) feet.
entries.throwgrenade: Throw Grenade This command allows the user to throw a grenade.
entries.throwtrap: Throw Trap This command is what you use to throw traps at creatures.  It's easier to simply hotkey the inventory item when using traps, however.
entries.thumbdown: /thumbdown: You show your disapproval. /thumbdown self: You should have known better. /thumbdown target: You show (target name) your disapproval.
entries.thumbsdown: /thumbsdown: You show your disapproval. /thumbsdown self: You should have known better. /thumbsdown target: You show (target name) your disapproval.
entries.thumbsup: /thumbsup: You show your approval. /thumbsup self: Life is pretty good after all! /thumbsup target: You show (target name) your approval.
entries.thumbup: /thumbup: You show your approval. /thumbup self: Life is pretty good after all! /thumbup target: You show (target name) your approval.
entries.thxinfo: /thxinfo: THX INFO! /thxinfo self: k.thxinfo.byebye now. /thxinfo target: You thank (him, her, or it) for the information.
entries.thyroidrupture: Thyroid Rupture This offensive ranged medical ability causes a reduction in the attack speed of the target.
entries.thyroidrupture_1: Improved Thyroid Rupture This enhancement to the Thyroid Rupture ability has a greater chance of reducing the attack speed.
entries.tickle: /tickle: Time for the feather tickle torture? /tickle self: You tickle yourself. /tickle target: You tickle (him, her, or it) mercilessly.
entries.tiny: /tiny: You mark an approximation with your forefinger and thumb. It was tiny. /tiny self: You guess that it would be tiny. /tiny target: You indicate to (target name) with your forefinger and thumb that it was tiny.
entries.tip: /tip: You tip your hat. /tip self: You tip your hat to yourself. /tip target: You tip your hat to (him, her, or it).
entries.tiphat: /tiphat:  You tip your hat. /tiphat self:  You tip your hat to yourself. /tiphat target:  You tip your hat to (him, her, or it).
entries.tiptoe: /tiptoe: You tiptoe through the area. /tiptoe self: You practice tiptoeing silently. /tiptoe target: You try to tiptoe past (target name).
entries.tmi: /tmi: TOO MUCH INFO!! /tmi self: Sorry everyone! TMI! /tmi target: You politely inform (him, her, or it) that was too much info.
entries.togglebeastdefensive: Beast Defensive: Your beast will respond to you being attacked.
entries.togglebeastpassive: Beast Passive: Your beast will not respond to you being attacked.
entries.tongue: /tongue: You stick your tongue out. /tongue self: You stick your tongue out and try to touch your nose. /tongue target: You stick your tongue out at (target name).
entries.torsoshot: Torso Shot This ranged attack to an opponent's torso has a chance of hitting vital areas causing additional bleeding damage.
entries.toss: /toss: You extend your arms like a child wanting to be tossed. /toss self: You toss yourself into the air and land flat on your face. /toss target: You toss (him, her, or it) into the air.
entries.totalheal: Total Heal Completely heals all of your Health damage, repairs all wounds, and removes all of your battle fatigue.
entries.totalhealother: Total Heal Other Completely heals all the Health, Action, and Mind damage, repairs all wounds, and removes all battle fatigue from the target player.
entries.totalhealself: Total Heal Self Completely heals all of your Health, Action, and Mind damage, repairs all wounds, and removes all of your battle fatigue.
entries.toughen: Toughen This enhancement increases the defense ratings of a single target.
entries.train_mount: Train Mount This ability allows you to train certain pets to be mounts that can be ridden.
entries.trainpet: Train Pet This command allows you to train your pet with known Pet Abilities. Just using the command will display all known abilities.
entries.trandoshan_ability_1: Regeneration: You activate your astonishing powers of regeneration to heal 20 Health per level every second for several seconds. This special ability is a trait of the Trandoshan species.
entries.transferforce: Transfer Force This ability allows a Jedi to transfer some of his stored Force power to another player Jedi.
entries.traumatize: Traumatize This offensive ranged medical ability causes a reduction in the mind regeneration of the target.
entries.traumatize_1: Improved Traumatize This enhancement to the Traumatize ability has a greater chance of reducing the mind regeneration.
entries.traz: This ability allows you to play songs with the Traz instrument.
entries.trick1: Trick 1 This command instructs your pet do a trick.  Tricks heal pet Mind damage.
entries.trick2: Trick 2 This command instructs your pet to do a trick.  Tricks heal pet Mind damage.
entries.tsktsk: /tsktsk: You rub one index finger over the other. Tsk Tsk. /tsktsk self: You should've known better! Tsk Tsk is right. /tsktsk target: Tsk Tsk, (target name).
entries.tug: /tug: You tug your gear to make sure it is secure. /tug self: You tug your sleeves and straighten out your clothes. /tug target: You tug on (his, her, or its) sleeve.
entries.tumbletokneeling: Tumble to Kneeling This command will attack while rolling your character forward into a kneeling posture.
entries.tumbletoprone: Tumble to Prone This command will attack while diving into a prone posture.
entries.tumbletostanding: Tumble to Standing This command will roll you out of a kneeling or diving posture and leave you standing.
entries.tweak: /tweak: You tweak your neck. OUCH! /tweak self: You tweak your own nose. /tweak target: You tweak (his, her, or its) nose.
entries.twibble: /twibble: Twibble. Twibble. /twibble self: You twibble about in circles. /twibble target: You twibble aimlessly about (him, her, or it).
entries.twiddle: /twiddle: You twiddle your thumbs. /twiddle self: You patiently twiddle your thumbs. /twiddle target: You twiddle your thumbs at (target name).
entries.twilek_ability_1: Footwork: By focusing your efforts and recalling memories of past combats, you greatly increase your ability to anticipate and dodge enemy attacks. This special ability is a racial trait of the Twi'lek species.
entries.twirl: /twirl: You twirl around gracefully. /twirl self: You put a finger on top of your head and twirl like a dancer. /twirl target: You twirl (him, her, or it) around gracefully.
entries.twistarm: /twistarm: OK. OK. Twist my arm. /twistarm self: Twist it just a bit more! /twistarm target: You twist (his, her, or its) arm.
entries.twitch: /twitch: You twitch. /twitch self: You twitch nervously. /twitch target: You twitch at (his, her, or its) comments.
entries.twohandthrow: Two Handed Force Throw: This force ability allows you to throw a two-handed weapon and retrieve it from your enemy with the power of the force.
entries.unarmedblind1: Blind This unarmed attack can blind a single target.
entries.unarmedbodyhit1: Body Hit This unarmed attack targets an opponent's body.
entries.unarmedcombo1: Combo This unarmed attack can hit the head and body of a target simultaneously.
entries.unarmedcombo2: Improved Combo This improvement of the Combo attack results in more damage being done.
entries.unarmeddizzy1: Dizzy This unarmed attack can dizzy a single target.
entries.unarmedheadhit1: This unarmed attack targets the head.
entries.unarmedhit1: This unarmed attack inflicts more damage than the basic unarmed attack.
entries.unarmedhit2: This strong unarmed attack inflicts more damage to a single target than Unarmed Hit 1.
entries.unarmedhit3: This powerful unarmed attack inflicts more damage to a single target than Unarmed Hit 2.
entries.unarmedknockdown1: This unarmed attack can knock down a single target.
entries.unarmedknockdown2: This unarmed attack can knock down and dizzy a single target.
entries.unarmedleghit1: This unarmed attack targets the legs in order to damage a target's Action pool.
entries.unarmedlunge1: This unarmed attack can slightly extend your range, and has a chance to lower the posture of your target.
entries.unarmedlunge2: This unarmed attack can slightly extend your range, and has a chance to knock down your target.
entries.unarmedspinattack1: This unarmed area attack can damage multiple targets at once.
entries.unarmedspinattack2: This unarmed area attack can damage multiple targets at once.  This is more powerful than Unarmed Spin Attack 1.
entries.unarmedstun1: This unarmed attack can stun a single target.
entries.uncle: /uncle: UNCLE!! UNCLE!! /uncle self: Say Uncle! Say Uncle! /uncle target: You beg (him, her, or it) to stop. UNCLE!
entries.unconsent: This command brings up a window with all of the players who you have consented to move your corpse.  To remove them from this list, click on their name and then click OK.
entries.underhandshot: Underhand Shot This ranged attack has a chance of catching a target off guard and knocking them down.
entries.underhandshot_1: Improved Underhand Shot This enhancement to the Underhand Shot has a higher possibility of knocking an opponent down.
entries.undock: Undock Undock from a space station.
entries.uninstallshipcomponent: Uninstall a ship component from a ship.
entries.unregistered: Your city has been unregistered from the planetary map.
entries.up: /up: You point up. /up self: You point up. /up target: You turn to (target name) and point up.
entries.urbanstealth: Urban Stealth This ability allows you to make use of a Holographic Environment Projector (H.E.P) to render yourself virtually invisible in urban environments.   Remember that a H.E.P only functions in urban environments.
entries.valahorn: This ability allows you to play songs with the Valahorn instrument.
entries.vendor_fees_1: The merchant gains a reduction in the cost of maintaining vendors.
entries.ventriloquism: /ventriloquism <target>: Performs a visual effect around your target
entries.verbalassault: Verbal Assault This enhancement increases the amount of aggression generated by an enemy for a single target.
entries.veteranplayerbuff: Favor of the Elders: You and those in your group benefit from your previous experience.
entries.veto: /veto: VETO! /veto self: You veto your own idea. /veto target: You veto (him, her, or it).
entries.volleyfire: Volley Fire This Squad Leader command paints a target on target enemies, giving group members a damage and accuracy boost to all attacks performed on that creature or person.  This enables a Squad Leader's group to cut through a group of difficult enemies far more efficiently than a group without a Squad Leader would perform.
entries.volleyfireattack: Volley Fire Attack: This command utilizes the volley fire attack.
entries.vrepair: /vrepair: Ship's Systems Emergency Repair - This command performs a 'vampiric' repair by routing most of the load of your most heavily damaged component through other lesser damaged components, at the cost of fusing connections, melting wires, etc. This has the game effect of increasing the health of your most heavily damaged ship component, but damaging the others, moving toward evening out the condition of all your components.
entries.vrepairother: /vrepairother: Other Ship's Systems Emergency Repair - This command performs a 'vampiric' repair to currently targeted friendly vessels that are in close proximity.
entries.waft: /waft: You try to waft the stench away. /waft self: Taking a bath might help! /waft target: You try to keep (his, her, or its) stench away.
entries.wait: /wait: You wait. /wait self: WAIT UP! /wait target: You wait on (him, her, or it).
entries.warcry: Warcry This melee ability startles the opponent making them hesitate and slow down their attacks.
entries.warcry1: This combat move can increase the round-time of your opponent's attack, in effect slowing them down.
entries.warcry2: This area combat attack can increase the round times of a cone (frontal area) of multiple enemies simultaneously.
entries.warcry_1: Improved Warcry This enhancement to the Warcry ability increases the amount of time that an opponent is delayed for.
entries.warcry_2: Advanced Warcry This enhancement to the Warcry ability increases the amount of time that an opponent is delayed for.
entries.ward: /ward: STAY AWAY! /ward self: Superstitious? You rub a charm to ward off misfortune. /ward target: You make warding signs at (him, her, or it).
entries.warningshot: Warning Shot Causes them to hesitate making them vulnerable to other attacks.
entries.wave: /wave: You wave. /wave self: You wave to yourself. /wave target: You wave to (him, her, or it).
entries.wear_all_armor: Your training has given you the strength and flexibility necessary to wear most types of armor.
entries.welcome: /welcome: WELCOME ALL! /welcome self: You welcome yourself. /welcome target: Welcome, (target name).
entries.whap: /whap: You whap everyone. /whap self: You whap yourself repeatedly. /whap target: You whap (him, her, or it) upside the head.
entries.whatthe: /whatthe: What the? /whatthe self: What were you thinking? /whatthe target: You wonder what (target name) was thinking?
entries.whimper: /whimper: You whimper. /whimper self: You whimper softly to yourself. /whimper target: You whimper softly at (target name).
entries.whistle: /whistle: You whistle innocently. /whistle self: You whistle a chipper tune. /whistle target: You whistle appreciatively at (him, her, or it).
entries.wildernessstealth: Wilderness Stealth This ability allows you to move about in the wilderness, whilst camouflaged.  For this skill to be used successfully you must either have an appropriate camouflage kit in your inventory or you must already be camouflaged.  This skill has a higher chance of failure if you don't use the Camouflage Self skill first.
entries.wildpanic: /wildpanic: AAAAAAYYYYYYEEEEEEEE!!! /wildpanic self: You panic about, waving your hands in the air. /wildpanic target: You panic about (target name), waving your hands in the air.
entries.wildshot1: This ranged attack can stun a single target.
entries.wildshot2: This ranged attack can stun multiple targets at once.
entries.wince: /wince: You wince. /wince self: You wince in pain. /wince target: You wince at (him, her, or it).
entries.wink: /wink: Wink. /wink self: You wink suggestively. /wink target: You wink suggestively at (target name).
entries.wookiee_ability_1: Wookiee Roar: You let loose with a ferocious roar that is absolutely terrifying. The attack bypasses all opponent defenses, inflicts harm, partially paralyzes and reduces the combat effectiveness of all enemies around you. This special ability is a trait of the Wookiee species.
entries.wookieeroar: /wookieeRoar <target>: This can Intimidate a cone (frontal area) of multiple enemies at once, alias for "/innate wookieeRoar"
entries.worship: /worship: You are not worthy! /worship self: You are not worthy. /worship target: You worship (target name).
entries.wrinkle: /wrinkle: You wrinkle your nose and make a sour face. /wrinkle self: You wrinkle your nose at yourself. /wrinkle target: You wrinkle your nose at (target name).
entries.wtg: /wtg: Way to go! /wtg self: You think you did a great job. /wtg target: You tell (target name) way to go!
entries.xantha: This ability allows you to play songs with the Xantha instrument.
entries.yawn: /yawn: YAAAWWWNN! /yawn self: You try to hide a yawn. /yawn target: You yawn at (him, her, or it).
entries.yes: /yes: You nod affirmatively. Yes. /yes self: You nod at yourself. /yes target: You nod affirmatively to (target name).
entries.zabrak_ability_1: Equilibrium: You perform an astonishing feat of sheer will, drawing upon your inner reserves to push yourself to the limits of endurance and restore balance to your body in the face of exhaustion. When used you will heal 40 points of health and action per level. This ability is a trait of the Zabrak species.
entries.zip: /zip: You zip your lips. /zip self: You check your zipper to make sure it's closed. /zip target: You instruct (target name) to zip (his, her, or its) lips.
entries.zone: /zone: You zone out. /zone self: You zone out and ignore your surroundings. /zone target: You zone out and ignore (target name).
entries.chroniclergetreserve: Use this command to see your reserve of Chronicles XP and Chronicles Tokens earned when other people complete your Chronicle Quests.  Usage: /chroniclerGetReserve
entries.costume_undead_wookie: An Afflicted Wookiee costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_burning_ewok: A Burning Ewok costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_chiss_01: A Chiss costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_exar_kun_cultist: An Exar Kun Cultist costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_lifeday_monkey_lizard: A Life Day Kowakian Monkey-Lizard Costume. To use this costume, you must have a Holiday Holoshroud.
entries.gcwscore: The GCW Score command displays a local invasion's score.  This command is usable within the city boundaries of Bestine on Tatooine, Dearic on Talus, and Keren on Naboo.
entries.gcwskirmishcityhelp: A summary of how the GCW conflict cities work.
entries.factionalhelper: If you are neutral in the galactic civil war, this command will allow you to temporarily lend your support to either the Imperial or the Rebel faction.
entries.groupdance: The /groupdance command toggles on/off entertainer dance commands from affecting you in a group and your ability to issue group dance commands.
entries.fs_saber_intercept_1: Saber Intercept: A force power that allows your target's incoming damage to be directed towards you.
entries.droid+droidcommand_zonetokessel: This command allows the pilot to perform a hyperspace jump to the Kessel System.
entries.droid+droidcommand_zonetoimperialdeepspa: This command allows the pilot to perform a hyperspace jump to Deep Space. A neutral pilot performing the jump will be identified as an imperial pilot on arrival.
entries.droid+droidcommand_zonetorebeldeepspace: This command allows the pilot to perform a hyperspace jump to Deep Space. A neutral pilot performing the jump will be identified as a rebel pilot on arrival.
entries.spaceimperialhelper: Factional Helper: Imperial Combatant This command will allow you to register yourself as an Imperial Combatant. You will no longer be able to attack (or be attacked by) Imperial ships, however Rebel ships will now attack you on sight. Landing or respawning will reset the command.
entries.spacerebelhelper: Factional Helper: Rebel Combatant This command will allow you to register yourself as a Rebel Combatant. You will no longer be able to attack (or be attacked by) Rebel ships, however Imperial ships will now attack you on sight. Landing or respawning will reset the command.
entries.spacepvprebel: Special Forces: Rebel This command will register you as a Special Forces pilot for the Rebel Navy. You will be able to attack and be attacked by Imperial Special Forces players. You will remain flagged as a special forces pilot until you respawn or land.
entries.spacepvpimperial: Special Forces: Imperial This command will register you as a Special Forces pilot for the Imperial Navy. You will be able to attack and be attacked by Rebel Special Forces players. You will remain flagged as a special forces pilot until you respawn or land.
entries.spacefaction: This command will report your pilot squadron and your factional status.
entries.fs_flurry_1: Saber Flurry 1: A triple saber attack that is charged up by striking your enemies.

entries.chroniclesloottoggle: This command allows you to stop getting Chronicles loot drops (relics and fragments) from activities that can normally produce them. If you are in a group, Chronicles loot will continue to have a chance to drop from combat unless everyone in the group disables it.  If you have disabled Chronicles Loot, then using this command will re-enable Chronicles loot drops.
entries.costume_esb_leia: A Princess Leia costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
entries.costume_esb_luke: A Luke Skywalker costume. To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.

entries.callforsnowspeeder: Call For Snowspeeder Pickup: Calls a Snowspeeder to pick you up and take you to up to 2 previously set locations throughout the Galaxy.
entries.costume_esb_boba_fett: A Boba Fett Costume.  To use this costume, you must have a Standard Holoshroud.
